story:
BMN is a collection of innovative and powerful news brands that deliver compelling and visually engaging content via the Onyx® Set-Top-Box, ushering in A new Era In Black Media.

BMN will feature world-class brands including Morning Day®, 197.5 The Drop®, Politics as Usual®,  "1st & Ten Sports Broadcast®, "Black Industry ®, Dollars and Sense Financial®, Nightly News®, Original Documentaries, Original Series, film and more. Providing the best in breaking news, live video coverage, original journalism, lifestyle features, commentary, citizen reporting and more.

Introducing new faces, skills and talent with the aim to contend against the representation of mainstream and popular media through IPTV (Internet Protocol Television) similar to AppleTV®, Roku®, Google® and Amazon® - reaching audiences of more than 15 million young and mature African Americans.

When it comes to quality journalism, we need to call attention to the full spectrum of African Americans and not the push of mainstream and popular media.  

Any and all funds received from the campaign will be allotted to acquiring the necessary equipment needed to record, play and broadcast content over IPTV (Internet Protocol Television) or web and manufacturing of the ONYX® STB (Set-Top-Box).

story:
Dan Minshaw is a young and very talented driver, from Lowestoft, England. He has been secured a place on the prestigious MSA Academy. Like many young drivers, to date Dan has been supported by his parents, who have spent every spare penny they had to support Dan through his karting.

2015 has seen a turning point in Dan's karting, he has had a number of very strong finishes, and has shown that he is not only quick, but also has a very professional approach, and this has got him noticed by some influential sources in Motorsport; F1, British Touring Car Championship (BTCC), and the MSA Young Driver Development Programme.

We are offering you the opportunity to come along for the ride, and you will have the satisfaction of knowing that you have supported a talented young driver, and played a key part in the development of a future champion driver.

We need to raise £1500 to fund Dan's first professional drive in a race car on 11th October 2015.

Please take a look at our Facebook page 'Dan Minshaw Racing'. If you want any more details, or want to support us, please get in touch via the Facebook Page.

story:
Hi! Welcome to the Save Malawi fundraising page. 

Over the past few days Malawi has been devastated by unprecedented floods. The aim of this page is to raise funds for the victims of the Malawi floods. As of current half of Malawi has been declared a ' disaster zone'. Almost 200,000 people have been displaced and over 200 people have been killed as a result of the torrential rains. The flood has not only destroyed many people’s homes but has done extensive damage to crops and the infrastructure. 

The funds raised will be used to rebuild houses, food, clothes and various everyday essentials. Any  money  raised, will be implemented in rebuilding the community - whether it reaches the goal or not or goes above. No amount is too small!

"There is no exercise better for the heart than reaching down and lifting people up" -John Holmes

All funds will be donated  to the Malawi disaster fund through the Malawi Embassy.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you cannot donate any money please spread the word. Malawi is so remote that we depend on you to make our case known!

Hashtag #SaveMalawi

Repost this link

Tweet, Facebook or Instragram!

Simply spread the word! 

If you have any questions about the campaign please do not hesitate to contact me on savemalawi@hotmail.co.uk

Thank you so much for your time,

Alexina Phiri

story:
Greetings friends of Colombia, Latin America and the world!

We are the CBS Foundation (Colegio Bolivar de Soacha) in Colombia. We are hard working to improve the facilities of our institution. The College has served 74 years and most of the buildings have completed their cycle of use, some of them were built by hand and with the passage of time as the school has expanded. We need new facilities according to the requirements of formation of this time and the volume of students, We project by modern buildings and allow us greater capacity to serve more children and youth.

This will allow us to strengthen our academic programs. We need your help to make this dream a reality, children will thank you forever, a seed sown and gather great fruits, join us in this immense task of forming great people, for a better future ... for a future in PEACE!

Saludos amigos de Colombia, Latinoamerica y el mundo entero !

Somos la fundación CBS (Colegio Bolivar de Soacha), en Colombia. Estamos trabajando fuerte por mejorar las instalaciones de nuestra institución. El Colegio  ha cumplido 74 años y la mayoria de los edificios ya cumplieron su ciclo de uso, algunos de ellos fueron construidos artesanalmente y con el paso del tiempo a medida que el colegio se ha ido expandiendo. Necesitamos nuevas instalaciones acordes a las exigencias de formacion de este tiempo y al volumen de estudiantes, Nos proyectamos por edificios modernos y que nos permitan una mayor capacidad para atender mas niños y jovenes.

Esto nos permitirá fortalecer nuestros programas académicos. Necesitamos tu ayuda para hacer de este gran sueño una realidad, los niños te lo agradecerán por siempre, una gran semilla que se siembra y recogerá grandes frutos , acompáñanos en este inmensa labor de formar grandes personas, por un mejor futuro ... por un futuro en PAZ!

What we need and what you get

  • We need funding to improve our institution and to give so a better standard of education in our community.
  • We have many rewards for your help, we will give for example; the blessings of our community, virtual cards submitted by our children and the smiles and sincere thanks from our youth. (See rewards section)
  • The funds raised at this early stage will be designated for the preparation of the draft and reconstruction project that will allow us to know the total and detailed cost of our project.
  • Failure to reach our current goal in this campaign, we continue forward, we are confident that we will reach the goal at some point.

Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes

  • Necesitamos financiamiento para mejorar la planta de nuestra institucion y poder dar asi dar un mejor estandard de educacion a nuestra comunidad.
  • Tenemos muchas recompensas a cambio de tu ayuda, te daremos por ejemplo; las bendiciones de nuestra comunidad, las tarjetas virtuales enviadas por nuestros niños y las sonrisas y gracias sinceras de nuestros jovenes. ( ver seccion de recompensas)
  • Los fondos recogidos en esta primera etapa estaran designados para la elaboracion del anteproyecto y proyecto de reconstrucción que nos permitira saber el costo total y detallado de nuestro proyecto.
  • En caso de no alcanzar nuestra meta actual en esta campaña , seguiremos adelante, estamos seguros que llegaremos a la meta en algun momento.

The Impact 

All a large community will be benefit

  • Our project is valuable to a city, a region, our country and for all exchange students who wish to come.
  • We have succeeded in improving our international exchange program and we are in constant growth with equity.
  • We invite you to visit our website and see where we go.

El impacto

Toda una gran comunidad en beneficio

  • Nuestro proyecto es valioso para toda una ciudad, una region , nuestro pais y para todos los estudiantes de intercambio que deseen venir.
  • Hemos logrado mejorar nuestro programa internacional y estamos en constante crecimiento con recursos propios.
  • Te invitamos a visitar nuestra pagina web y ver hacia donde vamos.

Other ways you can help

If you can not help us financially, you can do morally or helping us spread this campaign, please send an greetings, advice or a recommendation, we greatly appreciate the support of all kids.

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

Si no puedes ayudarnos economicamente , puedes hacerlo moralmente o ayudandonos a difundir esta campaña, envianos un saludos , un consejo o una recomendacion , valoramos mucho el apoyo en todas sus formas

Nuestros Patrocinadores (our Sponsors) :

                         

                              GL Arquitectos                              Implicit Marketing 

Know the city of Soacha (Cundinamarca , Colombia):

story:
Mark Your Calendars! OCTOBER 2-4, 2015  in Taos, New Mexico, USA

We are creating an International gathering from OCTOBER 2-4, 2015 in TAOS, NEW MEXICO by bringing women leaders from different tribes in the world, who have been holding that knowledge & teachings.THIS CAMPAIGN IS LAUNCHED TO HELP FUND LEADERS TO TRAVEL TO THE EVENT AND COVER LODGING COSTS AT THE EVENT.  The women leaders we are bringing together, are coming from the Maori Tribe, Maya-Mexica Tribe, Malaysia, Italy, Lakota Tribe, Palestinian-Jordon and many other across the globe.They are willing to share their knowledge, their ways and their wisdom globally for the betterment of humanity. So we can finally begin to create a world that comes from a place of peace, balance and unity. 

YOUR CONTRIBUTION WILL MAKE IT HAPPEN!!!!!!!!!

Knowing how to create from peace is far more important than creating a perpetuating cycle from pain, abandonment, dissatisfaction or victimization. Taking decisions from a place of oneness is far more important than acting from separation. We are one. It is the time to come back into balance within ourselves, so can begin to create a balanced world outside- with our families, our communities and globally. This shared wisdom will unite and co-create a new vision for the world. 

Know our Speakers! Click on our posted videos, listen to them on the radio links posted under updates! Know what you are contributing towards!!!

The donations/contributions go directly towards the airfare of the speakers and towards the event costs.

 Register for the event here:

http://www.sacredwoman.org/Gatheringofthefemnin...

About the directors of KOLO & Sacred Woman 

Danica Anderson and Magdala Ramirez, the Leaders of Kolo and Sacred Woman, developed the vision for bringing together women from around the world to share their oral traditions and weave their wisdom.

Magdala is the executive director and founder of Sacred Woman. Sacred Woman values honor, holism, multiculturalism, community, sisterhood,  and the wisdom of the ages.  Their programs and ceremonies provide the space, resources and facilitation for people to grow in themselves and to learn in ways that embrace and consummate the traditions of many cultures and the wisdom of the ages. Magdala Ramirez Garcia is a spiritual leader and healer from the Maya Mexika lineage.  She was born as medicine woman,  from a long linage of medicine people,   in Mexico where she began walking her path at an early age working with the medicine people and the pyramids of Mexico.  She brings the ancient knowledge to the world through original seminars, books, ceremonies, and journeys.


Dr. Anderson is the executive director of Kolo: Women’s Cross Cultural Collaboration which she founded in 2000 to bear witness to women and families in places and spaces where humanity ends. Her interests remain consistent in exploring trauma’s impact as not a death sentence but an enrollment into intensive learning and growth.  As Danica points out, the essence is summed up in the concise collaborative social Justice and self-sustainability found in healing our own local communities and ourselves.  It’s about ennobling and empowering those who have suffered catastrophic violence and crisis.

story:
Back in the good ol’ days, the U.S. Marines used a slogan to attract volunteers.  It went something like “The Marines are looking for a few good men”.  Well, that fits our situation exactly.  Flight Sciences and Kitplanes For Africa is looking for the funding required to bring the bird (Flyer) shown in the pretty pictures to market. 

What is it?  FLYER is a new generation General Aviation Aircraft intended to give the competition fits.  The Flyer will be available as a Light Sport Aircraft (Flyer LSA) or a Light Aircraft (Flyer LA).  The Aircraft will be supplied in kit form to be constructed by a home builder or as a fly-away factory build aircraft.  Future plans are to develop the Flyer as a 4 seat aircraft.

What’s so special about FLYER?  It’s been designed to produce significant advances in performance, fuel economy, handling qualities, noise, visibility, ease of entrance and exit (kinda like your car), cabin room and cockpit ergonomics.  Advances in these areas will ultimately lead to an aircraft that is substantially safer to fly. Besides all that, it’s sexy.

Who will benefit from the project?  The Flyer project could have been launched from anywhere in the world.  We decided to keep the project in South Africa for a number of reasons.  One of those reasons is to contribute actively to social upliftment in our area.  The project will benefit many poor and unemployed individuals in and around the Johannesburg metro-poll. As far as possible, the mechanizing of systems and processes will be kept to the minimum so as to employ as many skilled and unskilled people as possible.

How about an example of all this good stuff?  Sure (keep the price of petrol in mind).  How does 7.3 l/100km at 160 Mph sound? (that’s JOHANNESBURG TO CAPE TOWN (785miles) in 4.9 hours at a fuel cost of R1450 (127USD). FOR TWO.  You get the picture. 

What’s the status of the project?  We’ve done a whole lot of work and homework, including EXTENSIVE wind tunnel tests at the CSIR facilities as well as engine and propeller tests.  Basically whats left is that we’ve got some detail design work to do, then construction of the prototype and flight testing followed by production.

Who are you guys?  We’re a mix of South African guys and Yanks.  Kitplanes For Africa (South Africans, owned by Stefan Coetzee) have been producing aircraft for the past 22 years and are the oldest private kit aircraft manufacturer in Africa.  Flight Sciences (Yanks,) is headed up by Mike Antoniou. Mike is a retired US navy Test Pilot and Aeronautical Engineer who worked on many certification projects in his 60 year career.  This included military as well as private companies.  The Flyer concept was Mike's brain child and incorporates all his years of experience as a test pilot in one design.

Why are you crowd sourcing?  Because we need to raise roughly $ 180,000 to get the project of the ground and to full production.  We've raised about $ 30,000 and need help with the balance.

If you’re an airplane person, (not too faint hearted) and you think you’d like to be involved in something like this then this is your oportunity to contribute to a worthy cause.

Yours Sincerely,

The FLYER folks (Mike and Stefan)

p.s.  This project is being executed by professionals, not amateurs.

story:
Short Summary

Healing Vessels International (HVI) is on a mission to promote the health and well-being of people in developing countries through partnership efforts with various organizations and volunteers from multiple disciplines. This year, volunteers from HVI have identified pressing needs in a community in Tumsar, Maharashtra India. Among several others, we will be serving with members of this community in the areas of providing basic healthcare, supporting the citizens in their efforts toward sustainable food and clothing supply; providing emotional and spiritual support and educating the people on how to maximize available community resources. We hope that this will be the first of many years of long-term
partnership with members of this community.

What We Need & What You Get

We're raising $35,000 toward this interdisciplinary Mission Trip to India.
We ask you to donate any amount you can for this cause. We also need medications, clothes, food items and abundance of toys for this community.
For a donation of $50 or more, you will receive a certificate of Global Impact Partnership from Healing Vessels International. You will also be invited to our Global Impact Partners' Appreciation Event that will be hosted this year. Trae McMaken, musician, folklorist and traditional bearer has donated 25 of his Long Winter Nights CDs to anyone who chooses to have a copy for a donation of $25 or more.  Thank you so much for your assistance toward this project. 

The Impact

Your partnership will go a long way to effect significant changes:

Healing Vessels will be able to initiate a long-term collaborative relationship with the people of Tumsar; we will be able to impact their healthcare needs and help families acquire skills that they could use to sustain their loved ones.

Your gift will help support our diverse team of healthcare professionals and students as they learn to serve in a different culture, grow personally and professionally, and make lasting impact in Tumsar.

This first mission trip will especially benefit children as we plan to assist with the completion of a building where kids will be taught and taken care of. Additionally, by helping to serve the healthcare needs of entire families, your contribution will help to bridge the gap in the health status of this community.

Risks & Challenges

Traveling is a major risk these days. However, with proper safety measures put in place, most of the dangers associated with traveling abroad can be minimized. Furthermore, with every mission trip, there is the challenge of being able to mobilize community-based support to sustain the activities initiated. We will work hard to form a strong network of support from local citizens, community leaders and organizations to make sure that we share in their vision for the community and situate ourselves as collaborators for the well-being of Tumsar.

Other Ways You Can Help

Aside from monetary donations, please feel free to contribute medications including multivitamins, over-the counter drugs; medical supplies such as blood pressure measuring devices, thermometers; personal protective equipment; clothes, food items; toys; books; personal hygiene items (soaps, lotions, sanitary pads, etc.), and many other items that would benefit the people of Tumsar. 
Furthermore, please kindly  help us in spreading the word; share this campaign by word of mouth, via email, social media, and using the share buttons provided by Indiegogo. Thank you so much in advance for your great help.
story_txt:
Short SummaryHealing Vessels International (HVI) is on a mission to promote the health 
and well-being of people in developing countries through partnership
 efforts with various organizations and volunteers from multiple disciplines. This year, volunteers from HVI have identified pressing needs in a community in Tumsar, Maharashtra India. Among several others, we will be serving with members of this community in the areas of providing basic healthcare, supporting the citizens in their efforts toward sustainable food and clothing supply; providing emotional and spiritual support and educating the people on how to maximize available community resources. We hope that this will be the first of many years of long-termpartnership with members of this community.
  What We Need & What You GetWe're raising $35,000 toward this interdisciplinary Mission Trip to India.We ask you to donate any amount you can for this cause. We also need medications, clothes, food items and abundance of toys for this community.For a donation of $50 or more, you will receive a certificate of Global Impact Partnership from Healing Vessels International. You will also be invited to our Global Impact Partners' Appreciation Event that will be hosted this year. Trae McMaken, musician, folklorist and traditional bearer has donated 25 of his Long Winter Nights CDs to anyone who chooses to have a copy for a donation of $25 or more.  Thank you so much for your assistance toward this project.    The Impact
Your partnership will go a long way to effect significant changes:
Healing Vessels will be able to initiate a long-term collaborative relationship with the people of Tumsar; we will be able to impact their healthcare needs and help families acquire skills that they could use to sustain their loved ones.
Your gift will help support our diverse team of healthcare professionals and students as they learn to serve in a different culture, grow personally and professionally, and make lasting impact in Tumsar.
This first mission trip will especially benefit children as we plan to assist with the completion of a building where kids will be taught and taken care of. Additionally, by helping to serve the healthcare needs of entire families, your contribution will help to bridge the gap in the health status of this community.
  Risks & ChallengesTraveling is a major risk these days. However, with proper safety measures put in place, most of the dangers associated with traveling abroad can be minimized. Furthermore, with every mission trip, there is the challenge of being able to mobilize community-based support to sustain the activities initiated. We will work hard to form a strong network of support from local citizens, community leaders and organizations to make sure that we share in their vision for the community and situate ourselves as collaborators for the well-being of Tumsar. 
  Other Ways You Can HelpAside from monetary donations, please feel free to contribute medications including multivitamins, over-the counter drugs; medical supplies such as blood pressure measuring devices, thermometers; personal protective equipment; clothes, food items; toys; books; personal hygiene items (soaps, lotions, sanitary pads, etc.), and many other items that would benefit the people of Tumsar. 
Furthermore, please kindly  help us in spreading the word; share this campaign by word of mouth, via email, social media, and using the share buttons provided by Indiegogo. Thank you so much in advance for your great help.

story:
Our Mission

To make the best men better. We're Rusty Lion Academy.

Our Vision, Our Passion

We are here to create a positive, powerful change in the businesses and lives of Young Lions, ambitious entrepreneurial men between the ages of 30 and 49.

We coach men on how to build immensely profitable businesses. We show them how to create hugely favorable exits that will allow them, one day, to sell these businesses and set a foundation for their family’s wealth. But that is only half the story.

No man has ever been happy with a pocket full of cash and a life devoid of love, relationships, health, purpose, and more. The entrepreneurial journey can put huge demands on the lives of every entrepreneur - long hours, working weekends, constant travel, lonely family, and high-stress levels, to name but a few. And unless these demands are checked and juggled without dropping a ball, they can wreak havoc on our personal lives: broken marriages, estranged kids, difficult relationships, poor health. Hardly the picture of a successful man living an extraordinary life.

But your business doesn’t have to suck your life away. We want to show good, talented, hard-working men—men who are exactly where we used to be in life—how to build a truly well-rounded life that fluidly adapts to its ebbs and flows. Our curriculum, two-on-one individual coaching, and life-changing retreats have been specifically designed to help busy entrepreneurs achieve the harmonious life-work balance they've always wanted.

To The Lion

If you’re a Young Lion at heart, you’ve already got the raw talent, burning ambition, and practical brilliance it takes to succeed. What you now need are a couple of experienced guides to help direct your drive, and a strong group of like-minded men to support you along the journey.

Welcome to the pride. We’re excited you've joined us.


To The Lioness

And if you’re a Lioness reading this, filled with that powerful female drive that supports Young Lions and nurtures their cubs, standing with them shoulder to shoulder in the family pride while following her own path to leadership and success, know that we value you immensely. Since our programs take a full-on, professional-and-personal approach to teaching, coaching, and mentoring that covers all aspects of a man’s life, we don’t claim to be the best mentors for your development in your own complex role as a professional woman, wife, and mother.

But if you share our ideals and would love to give the Young Lions in your life a true chance at success, then do send us your men and back up their entrepreneurial journey by supporting our campaign. We’d love to have you in our extended pride.

The Problem We Face

We’re currently teaching local courses and holding face-to-face coaching sessions for men in our area. And the response has been tremendous: our students love the coaching we offer and keep telling us we need to bring our teaching to their friends, too. But there are only so many hours in a day and only so many miles two men can journey. Time constraints and geographical restrictions, unfortunately, keep us from reaching many of the men who’ve reached out to us and asked us to help them change their lives.

And this is where YOU come in! We need you to help us make this change happen. 

Changing the Way We Help Men Reach Their Goals

After expert consultation and plenty of experimentation, we have determined that the most effective way to reach men around the globe and educate them about building a successful life and business is through video classes. Unlike reading a book, which can be a taxing and isolating after a day’s hard work, a video class can not only be a lot more fun, it can also be much more engaging and interactive—offering question&comment sections waiting for instructor feedback—and much easier to understand and follow.

For this reason, we have decided to bring our teaching online and reach ambitious men wherever they happen to be. We’ve taken our best material, tested and fine-tuned through the coaching and classes we offer to our local students, and have designed engaging video classes for Young Lions all around the world.

And these classes aren’t just for men either: anyone can enjoy our educational videos, and learn from their rich content, whether man or woman, young or old, entrepreneurial or not—there’s really something for everyone.

This phase of our project will create the first five of our fifteen free video training classes. 

How We’ll Use the Funds

100% of the campaign funds will go directly to the production of high-quality video classes. Our video partner is Remedy Films in Atlanta, Georgia. All of us are ready to start shooting as soon as the campaign ends and we meet our funding goal.

All videos we shoot will be FREE for everyone to watch at the online Resource Library of Rusty Lion Academy. 

The First Five FREE Video Classes

Here are the first five classes that are all set for production:

1.  Setting Your Goals: See it, Believe It, and You Can Achieve It

2.  Your Lighthouse Values: What Guides the Course of Your Life?

3.  Conquer the Beast: Eliminate What Holds You Back

4.  What Setting Your 25-Year "Extraordinary Life" Intentions Can Do For You

5.  Warrior Mornings: How to Start the Perfect Day (a student favorite!)

We know our online video classes will be as effective as coaching a student face-to-face or teaching onstage at one of our retreats. 

Production Timeline

Mid-March 2015        Close Indiegogo Campaign
End April 2015            Begin shooting our first five videos
End June 2015            Remedy Films will finish production and make the videos                                                      available on our website (barring, of course, any unexpected                                              mishaps).

We (Remedy Films, Robert, Bill) promise to do our best to honor this timeline, and we’ll keep you updated on our progress in our weekly emails!
What If We Overfund This Campaign?

Oh, that's easy.

First, we'll smile and feel very humbled, grateful, and privileged that all of you believed in us, our passion, and this project.

Then, we'll keep shooting more of our FREE video series!!

We’ve got a total of fifteen videos in our free class portfolio. This campaign’s goal is to raise enough money for the first five classes. If we received more than we’ve planned, we’re fully prepared to shoot more videos right away.

We'd love to have an "overfund" issue to deal with! Thank you :-)

Stretch Goal 1

Here is Phase 2, the next ten free video courses, we will produce in 2015 if we overfund this campaign:

We estimate that phase 2, which comprises the next ten free videos of the series, will cost us around $36,500. As you can see, we expect to save some costs once we find our rhythm and build our methods with the first five videos.

Here are the next ten titles of the series: 

1.  From Chaos to Order: Covey’s Four Quadrants of Priority

2.  Effective Feedback & Discipline for Leaders

3.  Smart Delegation for Quick Results and More Free Time (yours!)

4.  Unexpected Energy Drainers: How to Identify and Avoid Them

5.  Fear Vs. Faith: Change Can’t-Do Into Can-Do

6.  Life Hacks: Your Life, In Order, In Minutes (a student favorite!)

7.  How to Listen Like a Leader (and man, and father, and husband, and son, and             brother…)

8.  Achieving Emotional Control: Because Roller-Coasters Are Only Fun at Fun-                 Parks

9.  Motivating Employees In A Way That You And They Love

10.  Stress CAN Kill You. Seriously.

Stretch Goal 2

There is a phase 3 percolating in our minds. It comprises another eleven video classes, for a grand total of 26, and we’re estimating it’ll cost around $40,000. At the moment, we’ve got these classes all neatly planned in our minds (well, a napkin, actually—bar-stool inspiration and all that…), but can’t quite share the titles yet. What we can say is that as soon as production of phases 1 and 2 is underway, we will polish these last classes off and add them to the plan for late 2015 and early 2016. We’ll keep you updated via email, of course!

Check Out Our Coaching Perks!

Some of our perks are self-explanatory. 
Some of our best perks like our 2-on-1 Individual and Group Coaching are, well, a bit complicated.

Note that all our coaching is done virtually, i.e, Skype, email, website, and telephone. If you've selected one of our VIP packages, then we'll have the privilege of connecting with you face-to-face! That will give us the chance to experience your world which will make your virtual coaching that much more effective

Check Out Our Retreats Perks!

Two of our most valuable perks provide you with a reserved spot to one of our breakthrough retreats. These retreats take place in Jackson, Wyoming, which is the secret ingredient to the experience we provide.

Majestic, Inspiring, Serenity. Simply Unforgettable: Jackson Hole Wyoming.

The awe-inspiring majesty of Jackson Hole is something everyone should experience at least once in their life. See the Grand Tetons shimmering with snow, watch electric pink Rocky Mountain sunsets, and savor endless opportunities for outdoor fun. Here, breathtaking beauty and unlimited adventure abound!

Where else can you see some of the most iconic wildlife in North America on the 15-minute drive from the airport to your hotel? There’s a good chance you’ll spot bison, elk, pronghorn antelope, and maybe even a moose before you even get to the edge of town.

The iconic beauty of two National Parks, numbers of National Forests, and countless National Wildlife Management areas lie within driving distance of your hotel. In town, you'll find five-star accommodations and restaurants to enjoy every night. Shopping, museums, art, landmarks, history, spas, events, and more also await you every day. 

Jackson is truly a wild, unforgettable, and for our retreat participants, life changing!

Meet The Academy, The Founders, and The Coaches

The Rusty Lion Academy has been built upon our shared vision for a “space” (physical, virtual, and emotional) where men can grow and excel both professionally and personally. When the two of us met in the late 90s, we bonded over similar interests and values in a friendship that went far deeper than just the casual phone-call. We've stuck together supporting each other through the thinnest and thickest of times.

As a team we share an intense drive to accomplish our goals and a desire to explore life outside our comfort zones. But beyond our commonalities, we also have our differences: the distinct talents and strengths of one that complement and augment those of the other, so much so that we like to say that in our case, 1+1=3.

In 2013, we joined our life visions officially with the creation of Rusty Lion Academy. We funded the projected entirely out of our life savings, and sought advice from some of the world’s most formidable experts such as Brendon Burchard (and his Experts Academy, where the picture above was taken), and have been coached by such powerhouse names as John Lee Dumas, Dan Miller, Steve Graves, and James Roche, just to name a few.

From the very beginning of this joint adventure, we’ve stuck to our blood oath: “World-class not half-ass.” That commitment to excellence has made our journey long and arduous, but above all, worth every second of our time put into delivering our absolute best to our students!

Bottom-line, it's easy to understand what we do. There are hunting guides, mountain guides, fishing guides, museum guides, and tour guides. We're the "Extraordinary Life" guides. 

Robert Mallon

Uncompromising, formidable excellence

Robert Mallon is a nationally recognized, professional speaker, business coach, mentor, and meeting facilitator. His students also like to call him an “Extraordinary Life Guide.” Over the last 35 years, he’s worked for several nationally known corporations as a leader and manager. In 2002, he became an entrepreneur and was soon experienced in starting and running many of his own businesses. His great passion in life is helping men and their companies grow to their full potential, a mission he’s now fulfilling through the Rusty Lion Academy. Robert is happily married to Sandy, who’s been a constant help and support throughout his entrepreneurial journey, not once calling him or his ideas crazy. The two of them live in Gainesville, Georgia. Together they have five spectacular children and a most cherished and precious granddaughter.


Bill Watkins

Understated, commanding authority

Bill Watkins spent the first half of his life jumping from achievement to achievement to achievement. A West Point graduate, he first served as an Army Engineer Officer, while also competing as a world-class cycling athlete, and later became a Fortune 500 corporate executive. Always the entrepreneur at heart, however, Bill left that world to start The Marena Group, which went from shipping from his garage to employing hundreds and exporting to over 80 countries. When he sold this business in 2012, Bill had achieved life freedom. But, he wasn’t quite done yet. In this second part of his life, Bill means to give back everything he’s learnt through his struggles and experiences, and nothing thrills him quite like seeing the change in the lives of his students. He wants the next generation of men to master what he knows and has enjoyed: wealth, significance, and an extraordinary life. Bill is happily married to Donna, who cheer him on and encourages his dreams. The two of them live in Jackson, Wyoming, where every day is filled with joy as they experience the beauty and adventure of the area. They enjoy three grown children—two from Bill’s first marriage and a very special son-in-law.


Here's What Others Have Said About Us, Our Coaching and Retreats.

It may not seem like it but we're not really ones to talk much about ourselves. We do want you to have confidence we're authentic, "the real deal." You can see what others have said about us by scrolling down below.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Before working with Bill and Robert, the goals I was driving toward in my life were fueled by the vapors of long term business success without the foundation of day to day happiness. Mindful of the imbalance between my personal and business life, I spent years reading various books, articles, and blogs.  But no matter what I tried, I would slip back into old routines of working harder building my business at the sacrifice of building my relationships and my personal well being.  When I considered working with a coach, I was skeptical that one could provide any structure or insight that I could not achieve on my own through study and practice. When I started working with Bill and Robert, my old notions of what it would be like to work with a coach was thrown out the window. Bill and Robert have such an incredible ability to help men like me achieve monumental life change.  Their work with me as guides has been nothing short of transformational. Now, my life has a whole new rhythm to it. Bill and Robert have earned my respect, trust, friendship, and sincere gratitude.

Scott Fitzgerald, Owner, Fitzgerald Bicycles 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I met Robert at the right time in my life.  Although things were going well, I had this itching that I was coasting and not employing my full potential.  Robert was like a skilled physician during our first meeting.  He listened, questioned, and examined where I was in life and was quickly able to make an assessment. From that day on Robert put me on a growth plan that keeps accelerating. He started me with small steps until I could begin running on my own.  Now that I am running, Robert is helping to guide the direction that my energy is taking me.  I had studied many of the principles that Robert introduced to me but until you have someone to teach them to you properly, you will never be able to get the most out of them.

Mike Holman, Plant Manager, Baldor Electric

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Bill Watkins is one of the most inspirational figures of my life. He has always challenged me to imagine and pursue a career that is both fulfilling and meaningful, while not compromising family life in the process. It’s not just a dream! He had creditability with me from the start because I saw him doing it. In many ways I feel like I got a secret MBA during my time with Bill. The education I received from Bill was far more valuable than any paper degree from an institution. An institution doesn’t challenge you to follow your dreams, pursue your passions and live an uncompromising life the way Bill does. Bill is a great listener and teacher who has the uncanny ability to walk you through your thoughts to enlighten your own path ahead. He helps you see the potential you have to live a life of accomplishment and happiness for both yourself and the people you care about.

John Rogelstad, Senior Business Consultant, Quintiq

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I have been working with Robert Mallon for over a year now and it has been one of the best decisions of my life. Robert has helped revolutionize my thinking in all areas of my life. He has challenged me in the area of goal setting to levels I have never experienced. Robert is one of the most trustworthy men I have ever been around. He has helped me improve not only my career but my personal life as well. My life balance as a result of this coaching relationship has been amazing. The results from the investment of time and resources has exceeded my expectations.

Bobby Shoemaker, Chic-fil-A Operater

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Some years ago I learned an amazing statistical reality that with a good coach I could be 86% more effective in my goal accomplishment. 

Bill Watkins has been my coach for the last few years.  He has been with me through major transitions and decisions offering guidance, perspective, and experience.  He’s been there and done it.  He has started and built profitable organizations.  His experience, his maturity, his character, and ability to communicate have been invaluable to me.  I get the real sense that he believes in me.  He’s not only my coach, but my friend, and has invested heavily in me, and even my family.  He’s a 10 out of 10.  I don’t know why he calls his organization Rusty Lion Academy.  There’s nothing rusty about Bill, except perhaps his beard.

Rod Entrekin, Senior Pastor, Christ Church Suwanee

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I reached a point in my business in 2012 when I realized if I wanted New Leaf to continue to grow then I would need to partner with a business coach that could challenge and encourage me as well as my core management team.  I met Robert Mallon several years ago. Over the last two years our team has been more focused on growing our business, our team, implementing core values, setting policies and standards to build upon.  Robert’s thirty plus years of experience has uniquely positioned him to teach, build into, and challenge our team. I believe his business knowledge and servant’s heart sets him apart from the pack.

Steve Murray, CEO, New Leaf Landscape Services

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ I’ve come to see that building confident, trusting, mentoring relationships is just who Bill is. A keen observer of life experiences, an ever-willing participant, a dedicated listener and absorber of information, Bill is not only hearing you, but actively taking the leap to try to think about and see things as you do, the better to understand.

Like the most prolific coach & quarterback relationships, Bill coaches you to make your own good decisions or will help coach you out of the melee caused by your last poor decision… or the chaos in which you find yourself from random events. Of course, experience counts.  But what matters more is being able to turn experiences (positive or negative) into useful life lessons to be honed and reapplied over time. It’s a special, if not rare skill and one in which Bill excels. 

Unlike many consultants, coaches, and mentors who seem most interested in convincing you of their worth, you’ll find that Rusty Lions are wired to elevate your worth by unleashing your inner lion.

Ben Serotta, Best of Cycling, LLC

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Robert has been a godsend to our business. His ability to listen, advise, give practical suggestions and referrals has proven fruitful for us. Because of his guidance, we are able to work more efficiently and productively. We are working smarter, not harder since Robert has been our coach.

Ava White, Founder, Ava White Academy

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


A Movie And A Mirror

From the beginning, we envisioned The Academy as more than ourselves lasting more than our lifetime. We envisioned a global network of leaders, coaches and mentors using the curriculum we established to improve the lives of men everywhere for generations.

In our early conversations about The Academy, there’s a film out there that we connected over – the ending in particular. In the final ten-minute scene of Mr. Holland's Opus, the main character (Richard Dreyfuss) is surrounded by the people whose lives he made a positive difference in for the last forty years. The auditorium is packed, and he never saw it coming. He just did what he loved all that time but he never felt important or impactful. He was. In his final day, lots of people went to the trouble to come together and tell him so. 

With the deepest of humility, we see ourselves in his story.

It Will Have Been The Best Of Adventures

Our vision of our final moments at The Academy has never been waiting for a paycheck, accolades, or an award. It was to to find ourselves on a stage, as life-long friends, arm-in-arm, looking out happily, humbly, and gratefully on a sea of men – and their families – who we’ve had the privilege to impact powerfully and positively. Within that pensive silence, we'll know that we'll have done what we were supposed to do, something we were very, very good at it, and something that mattered to us and everyone in the audience. And, then, with the crowd looking back at us with one final, collective smile, we'll simply walk off stage into the next chapter of our lives.

Completing This Project

Unless one or, worse, both of us fall off a cliff hiking the Tetons, we can't see a reason why we won't get this done on time, within budget, and to the world-class standards we've set for ourselves and the Academy.

Why?

Three reasons:

  1. We have been teaching these Principles, Foundational Maxims, and classes for years. We know the material and already have the scripts in our heads.
  2. We've already shot two videos with Remedy Films in Atlanta. Our Indiegogo introduction you saw above was one of them. They are an awesome production company and a world-class partner! They're simply waiting for us to pull the trigger and give them the "green light" to begin shooting our teaching videos. We've already talked with them about the where, who, what, how, and when for shooting this first set of five free videos. 
  3. We're comfortable "on camera." We've been on stage many, many times. Robert's a professional motivational speaker. Bill was a company leader happy to talk anytime in front of employees, customers, vendors, and industry leaders. There'll be no "we need to learn public speaking" delay once our Indiegogo campaign is completed. 

Join Our Pride!

We’re hugely grateful for your interest to our campaign, and couldn’t be happier that you took the time to learn about our vision and goals.

If you’re a contributor to the campaign, we’d like to THANK YOU for being a part of the Rusty Lion movement. Your financial contribution to our project will help us coach Young Lions into becoming better men with highly profitable businesses and happy families.

If you’re unable to contribute financially to our campaign at this point, we still want to THANK YOU for your interest in our project and for cheering us on. We couldn’t be doing this without your support.

If you share our vision for creating a world of better men, help us spread the word and reach more full-hearted Lions by sharing our campaign with all your friends on your favorite social media platform. 

Get ready to ROAR!

Robert and Bill

Oh, that's easy.
First, we'll smile and feel very humbled, grateful, and privileged that all of you believed in us, our passion, and this project.
Then, we'll keep shooting more of our FREE video series!!


We’ve got a total of
fifteen videos in our free class portfolio. This campaign’s goal is to raise
enough money for the first five classes. If we received more than we’ve
planned, we’re fully prepared to shoot more videos right away.
We'd love to have an "overfund" issue to deal with! Thank you :-)

Stretch Goal 1
Here is Phase 2, the next ten free video courses, we will produce in 2015 if we overfund this campaign:
We estimate that phase 2, which comprises the next ten free videos of the series, will cost us around $36,500. As you can see, we expect to save some costs once we find our rhythm and build our methods with the first five videos.
Here are the next ten
titles of the series: 
1. 
From Chaos
to Order: Covey’s Four Quadrants of Priority
2. 
Effective
Feedback & Discipline for Leaders
3. 
Smart
Delegation for Quick Results and More Free Time (yours!)
4. 
Unexpected
Energy Drainers: How to Identify and Avoid Them
5. 
Fear Vs.
Faith: Change Can’t-Do Into Can-Do
6. 
Life Hacks: Your Life, In Order, In Minutes (a student favorite!)
7. 
How to
Listen Like a Leader (and man, and father, and husband, and son, and             brother…)
8. 
Achieving
Emotional Control: Because Roller-Coasters Are Only Fun at Fun-                 Parks
9. 
Motivating
Employees In A Way That You And They Love
10.  Stress CAN Kill You. Seriously.


Stretch Goal 2

There is a phase 3 percolating in our minds. It comprises
another eleven video classes, for a grand total of 26, and we’re estimating it’ll
cost around $40,000. At the moment, we’ve got these classes all neatly planned
in our minds (well, a napkin, actually—bar-stool inspiration and all that…),
but can’t quite share the titles yet. What we can say is that as soon as
production of phases 1 and 2 is underway, we will polish these last classes off
and add them to the plan for late 2015 and early 2016. We’ll keep you updated
via email, of course!

Check Out Our Coaching Perks!
Some of our perks are self-explanatory. 
Some of our best perks like our 2-on-1 Individual and Group Coaching are, well, a bit complicated.
Note that all our coaching is done virtually, i.e, Skype, email, website, and telephone. If you've selected one of our VIP packages, then we'll have the privilege of connecting with you face-to-face! That will give us the chance to experience your world which will make your virtual coaching that much more effective
Check Out Our Retreats Perks!


Two of
our most valuable perks provide you with a reserved spot to one of our breakthrough retreats. These
retreats take place in Jackson, Wyoming, which is the secret ingredient to the
experience we provide.

Majestic, Inspiring, Serenity. Simply Unforgettable: Jackson Hole Wyoming.
The awe-inspiring majesty of Jackson Hole is something everyone should experience at least once in their life. See the Grand Tetons shimmering with snow, watch electric pink Rocky Mountain sunsets, and savor endless opportunities for outdoor fun. Here, breathtaking beauty and unlimited adventure abound!
Where else can you see some of the most iconic wildlife in North America on the 15-minute drive from the airport to your hotel? There’s a good chance you’ll spot bison, elk, pronghorn antelope, and maybe even a moose before you even get to the edge of town.
The iconic beauty of two National Parks, numbers of National Forests, and countless National Wildlife Management areas lie within driving distance of your hotel. In town, you'll find five-star accommodations and restaurants to enjoy every night. Shopping, museums, art, landmarks, history, spas, events, and more also await you every day. 
Jackson is truly a wild, unforgettable, and for our retreat participants, life changing!




Meet The Academy, The Founders, and The Coaches

The Rusty
Lion Academy has been built upon our shared vision for a “space” (physical,
virtual, and emotional) where men can grow and excel both professionally and
personally. When the two of us met in the late 90s, we bonded over similar
interests and values in a friendship that went far deeper than just the casual
phone-call. We've stuck together supporting each other through the thinnest
and thickest of times. 
As a team
we share an intense drive to accomplish our goals and a desire to explore life outside
our comfort zones. But beyond our commonalities, we also have our differences:
the distinct talents and strengths of one that complement and augment those of
the other, so much so that we like to say that in our case, 1+1=3.
In 2013, we joined our life visions officially with the creation of Rusty Lion Academy.
We funded the projected entirely out of our life savings, and sought advice
from some of the world’s most formidable experts such as Brendon Burchard (and
his Experts Academy, where the picture above was taken), and have been coached
by such powerhouse names as John Lee Dumas, Dan Miller, Steve Graves, and James
Roche, just to name a few.
From the
very beginning of this joint adventure, we’ve stuck to our blood oath:
“World-class not half-ass.” That commitment to excellence has made our
journey long and arduous, but above all, worth every second of our time put
into delivering our absolute best to our students!

Bottom-line, it's easy to understand what we do. There are hunting guides, mountain guides, fishing guides, museum guides, and tour guides. We're the "Extraordinary Life" guides. 


Robert Mallon


Uncompromising, formidable
excellence


Robert
Mallon is a nationally recognized, professional speaker, business coach,
mentor, and meeting facilitator. His students also like to call him an
“Extraordinary Life Guide.” Over the last 35 years, he’s worked for several
nationally known corporations as a leader and manager. In 2002, he became an
entrepreneur and was soon experienced in starting and running many of his own
businesses. His great passion in life is helping men and their companies
grow to their full potential, a mission he’s now fulfilling through the Rusty
Lion Academy. Robert is happily married to Sandy, who’s been a constant help
and support throughout his entrepreneurial journey, not once calling him or his
ideas crazy. The two of them live in Gainesville, Georgia. Together they
have five spectacular children and a most cherished and precious granddaughter.

Bill Watkins
Understated, commanding authority


Bill
Watkins spent the first half of his life jumping from achievement to
achievement to achievement. A West Point graduate, he first served as an Army
Engineer Officer, while also competing as a world-class cycling athlete, and
later became a Fortune 500 corporate executive. Always the
entrepreneur at heart, however, Bill left that world to start The Marena Group,
which went from shipping from his garage to employing hundreds and exporting to over 80 countries.
When he sold this business in 2012, Bill had achieved life freedom. But, he
wasn’t quite done yet. In this second part of his life, Bill means to give back
everything he’s learnt through his struggles and experiences, and nothing
thrills him quite like seeing the change in the lives of his students. He wants
the next generation of men to master what he knows and has enjoyed: wealth,
significance, and an extraordinary life. Bill is happily married to Donna, who
cheer him on and encourages his dreams. The two of them live in Jackson,
Wyoming, where every day is filled with joy as they experience the beauty and
adventure of the area. They enjoy three grown children—two from Bill’s first
marriage and a very special son-in-law.




Here's What Others Have Said About Us, Our Coaching and Retreats.

It may not seem like it but we're not really ones to talk much about ourselves. We do want you to have confidence we're authentic, "the real deal." You can see what others have said about us by scrolling down below.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Before working with Bill and Robert, the goals I was driving toward in my life were fueled by the vapors of long term business success without the foundation of day to day happiness. Mindful of the imbalance between my personal and business life, I spent years reading various books, articles, and blogs.  But no matter what I tried, I would slip back into old routines of working harder building my business at the sacrifice of building my relationships and my personal well being.  When I considered working with a coach, I was skeptical that one could provide any structure or insight that I could not achieve on my own through study and practice. When I started working with Bill and Robert, my old notions of what it would be like to work with a coach was thrown out the window. Bill and Robert have such an incredible ability to help men like me achieve monumental life change.  Their work with me as guides has been nothing short of transformational. Now, my life has a whole new rhythm to it. Bill and Robert have earned my respect, trust, friendship, and sincere gratitude.
Scott Fitzgerald, Owner, Fitzgerald Bicycles 
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I met Robert at the right time in my life.  Although things were going well, I had this itching that I was coasting and not employing my full potential.  Robert was like a skilled physician during our first meeting.  He listened, questioned, and examined where I was in life and was quickly able to make an assessment. From that day on Robert put me on a growth plan that keeps accelerating. He started me with small steps until I could begin running on my own.  Now that I am running, Robert is helping to guide the direction that my energy is taking me.  I had studied many of the principles that Robert introduced to me but until you have someone to teach them to you properly, you will never be able to get the most out of them.


Mike Holman, Plant Manager, Baldor Electric----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Bill Watkins is one of the most inspirational figures of my life. He has always challenged me to imagine and pursue a career that is both fulfilling and meaningful, while not compromising family life in the process. It’s not just a dream! He had creditability with me from the start because I saw him doing it. In many ways I feel like I got a secret MBA during my time with Bill. The education I received from Bill was far more valuable than any paper degree from an institution. An institution doesn’t challenge you to follow your dreams, pursue your passions and live an uncompromising life the way Bill does. Bill is a great listener and teacher who has the uncanny ability to walk you through your thoughts to enlighten your own path ahead. He helps you see the potential you have to live a life of accomplishment and happiness for both yourself and the people you care about.
John Rogelstad, Senior Business Consultant, Quintiq
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I have been working with Robert Mallon for over a year now and it has been one of the best decisions of my life. Robert has helped revolutionize my thinking in all areas of my life. He has challenged me in the area of goal setting to levels I have never experienced. Robert is one of the most trustworthy men I have ever been around. He has helped me improve not only my career but my personal life as well. My life balance as a result of this coaching relationship has been amazing. The results from the investment of time and resources has exceeded my expectations.
Bobby Shoemaker, Chic-fil-A Operater------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Some years ago I learned an amazing statistical reality that with a good coach I could be 86% more effective in my goal accomplishment. 


Bill Watkins has been my coach for the last few years.  He has been with me through major transitions and decisions offering guidance, perspective, and experience.  He’s been there and done it.  He has started and built profitable organizations.  His experience, his maturity, his character, and ability to communicate have been invaluable to me.  I get the real sense that he believes in me.  He’s not only my coach, but my friend, and has invested heavily in me, and even my family.  He’s a 10 out of 10.  I don’t know why he calls his organization Rusty Lion Academy.  There’s nothing rusty about Bill, except perhaps his beard.
Rod Entrekin, Senior Pastor, Christ Church Suwanee

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------I reached a point in my business in 2012 when I realized if I wanted New Leaf to continue to grow then I would need to partner with a business coach that could challenge and encourage me as well as my core management team.  I met Robert Mallon several years ago. Over the last two years our team has been more focused on growing our business, our team, implementing core values, setting policies and standards to build upon.  Robert’s thirty plus years of experience has uniquely positioned him to teach, build into, and challenge our team. I believe his business knowledge and servant’s heart sets him apart from the pack.
Steve Murray, CEO, New Leaf Landscape Services
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I’ve come to see that building confident, trusting, mentoring relationships is just who Bill is. A keen observer of life experiences, an ever-willing participant, a dedicated listener and absorber of information, Bill is not only hearing you, but actively taking the leap to try to think about and see things as you do, the better to understand.
Like the most prolific coach & quarterback relationships, Bill coaches you to make your own good decisions or will help coach you out of the melee caused by your last poor decision… or the chaos in which you find yourself from random events. Of course, experience counts.  But what matters more is being able to turn experiences (positive or negative) into useful life lessons to be honed and reapplied over time. It’s a special, if not rare skill and one in which Bill excels. 
Unlike many consultants, coaches, and mentors who seem most interested in convincing you of their worth, you’ll find that Rusty Lions are wired to elevate your worth by unleashing your inner lion.
Ben Serotta, Best of Cycling, LLC
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Robert has been a godsend to our business. His ability to listen, advise, give practical suggestions and referrals has proven fruitful for us. Because of his guidance, we are able to work more efficiently and productively. We are working smarter, not harder since Robert has been our coach.
Ava White, Founder, Ava White Academy
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------








A Movie And A Mirror

From the beginning, we envisioned The Academy as more than ourselves lasting more than our lifetime. We envisioned a global network of leaders, coaches and mentors using the curriculum we established to improve the lives of men everywhere for generations.
In our early conversations about The Academy, there’s a film out there that we connected over – the ending in particular. In the final ten-minute scene of Mr. Holland's Opus, the main character (Richard Dreyfuss) is surrounded by the people whose lives he made a positive difference in for the last forty years. The auditorium is packed, and he never saw it coming. He just did what he loved all that time but he never felt important or impactful. He was. In his final day, lots of people went to the trouble to come together and tell him so. 
With the deepest of humility, we see ourselves in his story.



It Will Have Been The Best Of AdventuresOur vision of our final moments at The Academy has never been waiting for a paycheck, accolades, or an award. It was to to find ourselves on a stage, as life-long friends, arm-in-arm, looking out happily, humbly, and gratefully on a sea of men – and their families – who we’ve had the privilege to impact powerfully and positively. Within that pensive silence, we'll know that we'll have done what we were supposed to do, something we were very, very good at it, and something that mattered to us and everyone in the audience. And, then, with the crowd looking back at us with one final, collective smile, we'll simply walk off stage into the next chapter of our lives.

Completing This Project
Unless one or, worse, both of us fall off a cliff hiking the Tetons, we can't see a reason why we won't get this done on time, within budget, and to the world-class standards we've set for ourselves and the Academy.
Why?
Three reasons:



We have been teaching these Principles, Foundational Maxims, and classes for years. We know the material and already have the scripts in our heads.


We've already shot two videos with Remedy Films in Atlanta. Our Indiegogo introduction you saw above was one of them. They are an awesome production company and a world-class partner! They're simply waiting for us to pull the trigger and give them the "green light" to begin shooting our teaching videos. We've already talked with them about the where, who, what, how, and when for shooting this first set of five free videos. 


We're comfortable "on camera." We've been on stage many, many times. Robert's a professional motivational speaker. Bill was a company leader happy to talk anytime in front of employees, customers, vendors, and industry leaders. There'll be no "we need to learn public speaking" delay once our Indiegogo campaign is completed. 

Join Our Pride!




We’re
hugely grateful for your interest to our campaign, and couldn’t be happier that
you took the time to learn about our vision and goals. 
If you’re
a contributor to the campaign, we’d like to THANK YOU for being a part of the
Rusty Lion movement. Your financial contribution to our project will help us
coach Young Lions into becoming better men with highly profitable businesses
and happy families. 
If you’re
unable to contribute financially to our campaign at this point, we still want
to THANK YOU for your interest in our project and for cheering us on. We
couldn’t be doing this without your support. 
If you
share our vision for creating a world of better men, help us spread the word and
reach more full-hearted Lions by sharing our campaign with all your friends on
your favorite social media platform. 

Get ready to ROAR!
Robert and Bill

story:
A bit about Soul River and its mission
CEO and Creative Director Chad Brown, M.Sc. is passionate about our community and Mother Nature. A decorated Navy veteran, having received multiple honors Chad now battles with post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD). This daily struggle and reality drove him to the rivers when Chad was introduced to fly fishing. He still recalls the feeling of the first time he hooked in on a fish where he felt himself fill with happiness, smiling for the first time in months. This was his sign to connect with the outdoors as well as advocate for some of our most disadvantaged groups to gain ultimate accessibility to the outdoors. In 2010, Chad began Soul River Inc., (an entity of Soul River Runs Deep) with the hopes to connect inner city youth and military veterans with hands-on opportunities in the outdoors. Rooted in the healing sport of fly fishing and operated by veterans, professional anglers, and community outreach specialists, Soul River Runs Wild (aka Soul River Inc.) inspires all participants to become ambassadors and advocates of our natural environment and intends to do it all at zero-cost to the participants.

Check out our segment on OPB Television program
Urban Youth & the Zen of Fly-Fishing


Fly fishing helps Oregon veteran fight anxiety, depression






The Alaska Trip and Why it's Worth Getting Behind
This trip will give youth growing up in an urban environment the opportunity to be enriched by nature and mentored by vets who benefit as much as they do through the healing of fly fishing. For the first time in their lives, youth who participate in this trip will have  access to the outdoors and the opportunity to learn life-coping skills that translate beyond nature and into the real world. The hope is the youth gain outdoor leadership skills as well as become ambassadors for Mother Nature, conservation, and learn fly fishing. 
The relationships forged between all participants will promote mental health and bring both groups to places where it is safe to be themselves and heal.
               

                                          










The Goal of the Alaska Trip
The goal of the Cross-Cultural Exploration 2015 is to expose and educate 20 youth and 14 veterans from the Portland-metro area (including City of Vancouver Parks and Recreation) to an Alaskan culture that relies heavily on the natural world and wildlife for sustenance and sustainability. This is designed to have balance between both worlds therefore we will pair up each Portland- metro youth with an Alaskan youth so they can learn from one another. This project is partnership with the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service in both Alaska and Oregon, and the youth will be visiting Kenai National Wildlife Refuge.  We will provide a variety of structured workshops throughout each day that will be teaching a variety of topics such as but not limited to fly fishing, entomology, cultural awareness and education, conservation/environmental issues, and careers in the STEAM subject areas.

         

                             


                                                      Our cool official Sticker Patch!


What We Need & What You Get

The budget in detail
Soul River has a projected budget of $65,000 to bring 20 youth and 14 veterans to Alaska. U.S. Fish and Wildlife has already pledged $15,000, therefore our current goal is to raise $50,000. If we raise anything beyond that, we will be able to bring along more participants.

Perks to contributing!

$25 - Thank You card & "Stay Wild" sticker This is no ordinary thank you card...you'll keep this on the fridge for months! You'll also receive a signature Soul River "Stay Wild" sticker that looks great on any water bottle, skateboard, bumper, or any other surface. All artwork is artistically conceptualized and created by Chad Brown.

$50 - Artistic Hand-Crafted Fly set Some of the Pacific Northwest's top anglers and tiers will create a pair of custom, hand-crafted flies that look great on the line or mounted on the wall. These are true pieces of art that anyone can appreciate.

$100 - Soul River Scents Collection Chad Brown of Soul River has created and captured the scents of four unique rivers located in the Pacific Northwest - McKenzie River, Deschutes River, Metolius River, and Yakima River. With your generous pledge, you will receive the full collection perfect for your home, office, or riverside camp table. Each unique soy-based candle instantly envelops your senses as if you’re sitting right next to the river.

$300 - Fly Fishing Rod Loop's INCITE single hand 5wt 9ft is great for novices and advanced anglers alike. With your pledge, you have the option to keep this beautiful rod for your own use, OR donate it to a veteran or youth through Soul River, Inc to help spread the love of angling.

$500 - Soul River Represent! Soul River T-Shirt: This beautiful apparel line is inspired and rooted in fly fishing and is designed and created by Chad Brown. Colors (black, espresso, brown,or gray) and sizes (small to xx-l) vary, 100% cotton. Soul River Trucker Hat: Look fly on the water in a classic Soul River trucker hat! Waypoint Messenger OR Backpack (choose one): Carry your gear in style and balanced by combining urban fashion and outdoor lifestyle , function, high quality throughout and unbeatable durability.

$1,000 - The Steelhead Package Ok, not really, but close to its worthiness! With your generous pledge you receive: Soul River's signature "Wild Soul" sticker Soul River Scent of your choice Trucker Hat Soul River T-Shirt Loop Spey Rod Waypoint Messenger Bag OR Backpack

$5,000 - Above and Beyond Package In addition to The Steelhead Package, Soul River will treat you and one other person to an Oregon wine country experience! Relax in a calm, tranquil setting with friends, nature, gourmet lunch, and delicious local wines from our friends at Alexana Vineyards and Winery in Dundee, Oregon. Included in the package is an instructional experience on the private lake with your new Loop fly rod. Instructors are at your speed, and the experience is all about relaxation. Perfect for anyone!

Where the funds go if we don't reach our entire goal
If the entire goal is not reached, the trip would be redesigned to go to a more affordable location than Alaska with less participants.

The Impact - Why your donations matter!
These outings will tangibly alter participants lives by providing them with opportunities to establish new friendships and outdoor leadership skills, and gain awareness and education around issues impacting our environment and conservation. Soul River has already held many successful outings with youth and veterans. See what the results here:
http://soulriverrunsdeep.com/veterans-youth-out...

Risks & Challenges


Other Ways You Can Help

story:
Ecuaexperience

Hello! My name is Carolina Zamora and I am a pre-med student at Portland State University. This summer, I will be traveling to Ecuador to volunteer, by helping build houses for the less fortunate, as well as to shadow physicians and explore Ecuador along the way. 

What I Need From YOU

In order to accomplish our goal of building houses for the less fortunate, we need YOUR donations! 
It takes about $5600 to build each home. Our goal this year is to build a total of 21 homes for the unprivileged families we will be helping. 

ALL of the fundraised money goes towards building homes for underprivileged families. Every year the town we select is in a rural area where the families receiving the homes are living below the poverty line. The hope in us building these homes is that it will enable them to reallocate the money they pay for rent to other necessities such as education for their children. 

ALL of the contributions made, no matter how small, will help make a difference in someone else's life. 
Even if the fundraising goal is not achieved, every contributed dollar will go towards the building of houses in Ecuador.

Other Ways You Can Help
PLEASE spread the word! It's for a great cause. Make use of social media and share this campaign with family and friends!
