story:
It’s a ruthless cycle. When we don’t move, we tend to become sick, overweight and depressed. When we move, we get to deal with all kinds of injuries. I think we just don’t get how much we don’t know about how we move through our days and our lives. People generally resist taking action to improve their posture.

            

                                                           

I can help! If I can spread the word on how to StraightenUP, we all would possess great posture and body awareness.

My name is Lorie Kiviat and I’ve been trying to figure this mess out for over 40 years. After four decades of teaching yoga, giving shiatsu therapy and other various body-mind practices, I got it that there was a certain level of awareness and connection to our body that I just couldn’t pin down. Then about five years ago, I came across some very early 20th century work on body mechanics and posture. That work made something click in me, and for the next three years, I worked on an idea that together with my experience and what Dr. Mensendieck figured out over a century ago, led me to this project.

There is a fairly simple solution to learn to move in ways that help maintain mental and physical clarity and better health. I call it StraightenUP, and with some help from my friends, I wrote a book. The book itself consists of my story, detailed movement guides and photos to illustrate the movements. It combines all the knowledge and information that I have discovered on this subject.

So I find myself with a message that I truly believe could help almost anyone look and feel better, and move with a grace and confidence that we recognize in those who do. Martial artists, Dancers, Royalty and even Navy seals have it, an awareness of alignment, breath and muscle control that is unmistakable. I think I’ve cracked the code and can make it possible for all who will try this.  It works because when done again and again, the information is imprinted on your brain for a lifetime.

The book is printed and it is lovely. Check the gallery link above for some sample pages. I made an audio of the book, spent three years teaching this and have more testimonials as to how awesome and real it is than I can count. There isn’t anyone that cannot devote five minutes a day for a month to see how phenomenal this is.

Now I need the public to join my campaign to get this out there. It is my dream, and I believe in it heart and soul. It has been my gift and now I want to pay it forward for all the blessings I have had in my life.

StraightenUp will be a way to remember things we all should know, and I suspect once did. Please help me get this out there, as little things like this can make a big difference in your life.


It is time for StraightenUP to get the exposure it deserves!

This concept is designed for the general population as well as schools, fitness programs, yoga studios, Pilates, personal trainers and physical therapists. The possibilities are endless. Together with my investors, we can positively impact this silent epidemic of negative and dangerous postural problems. Therefore, I am asking for your support here on Indiegogo.

What's Needed

The book and audio version of StraightenUP have been completed. The next steps are connecting with....

Public Relations/Ad Agency --- an initial deposit is needed  to secure the services of a first-rate agency to maximize exposure of the StraightenUP program.

Grant Writing Assistance --- experienced grant writer to help get StraightenUP into schools and public programs.. 


Kudos to my creative and talented team who helped me put this project together; Angel Photography Productions, Rick Borgia, David Picard, David Kiviat, Lizzy Siskind, Sue Kravitz and Violeta Angelova and Howard Kiviat. I am ever so grateful for their support and understanding. Everyone that has experienced this remarkable system embraces the importance of this endeavor.

Please help me bring my mission to fruition and support this very important project. Thank you

Blessings to you all!

What You Get

Several different backers points are suggested only as a guideline for the rewards which include The BOOK, The AUDIO EDITION of the book, Very nice SU pens, Personal Consultations and our sincere gratitude!

The Impact 

There would much less suffering in the world!

StraightenUP Testimonials

Congratulations to Lorie Kiviat.  She has developed a Body Sculpting system that can be incorporated into one’s daily life.  My alignment, posture and strength has improved after practicing just a few months.  I feel and look better. 

  Felice Zaslow Retired teacher

After many modalities of trying to heal a tear in my shoulder with disappointing results, I tried Yoga, which did help.  However, after Lorie introduced the Body Sculpture Workshop (StraightenUP) I regained total mobility and am pain free. 

  Helena Wresch Singer/Music coach

I am fortunate to have had Lorie be my teacher, meditation and lifestyle coach for thirty years.  Using B.S.W. techniques has been gratifying and awesome. I have improved my posture. I am stronger, with better balance and an overall sense of wellness.

   Geri Gruebel

BSW techniques become a part of your every day living.  I recommend it to everyone regardless of age, size or level of activity. 

  Carol Bernard  Banking

BSW has strengthened my entire body, improved my posture, sitting, standing and walking.  My body is exercised throughout the day. 

  Marty Gaffney ACSN  CASAC

I have a neck issue.  Lorie’s supportive and educated way of instruction has helped me to feel and move better.  I am more aware of my body and know how to manage my neck problem. 

  Lee Goldstein Writer

BSW has helped me develop an increased awareness of my body and especially my posture all throughout the day.  I am certain this consciousness will be part of my life as I grow older and better. 

  Leslie Popkin Teacher

A soft approach to conditioning that has deepened my concentration.  I have become more aware of my strengths and weaknesses.

  Faith Rothblatt  Fund raiser

Since studying with Lorie I have seen much improvement in my body.  Lorie makes the learning easy because she understands the body and explains things so well.

   Marilyn Hollander

Lorie is the most gifted teacher.  After 20 years nothing has given me the consciousness and daily awareness of my alignment and posture like that of BSW. It lasts for life.

   Eve Boden  Psychotherapist

BSW has given me a further understanding of the importance of correct posture, and how to achieve this.  Also, I now know how to manage aches and pains. It has been a phenomenal gift.  I pass her teachings on to my young students and they tell me they feel more comfortable in their bodies also.

  Susan Panzer Reading Coach

After practicing Straighten UP, the awareness of how I hold my body has influenced every part of my life, especially how “not to fall of my horse”!!!

   Shelly Rajman  Equestrian

Lorie’s knowledge, expertise and ability to make each student understand proper body mechanics is truly a wonderful experience. Students learn how to be their own teacher as well.

  Barbie Levine Massage Therapist     

I was given a gift through Lorie to become aware of my body without comparison or shame.  I am working on myself as I grow from within.  I will always be grateful for this gift.

   Margie Flores BA  c.a.s.ac

Studying with Lorie has enabled me to decrease my muscle pain and become more aware of movement and how it affects my health. It has made a world of difference.

   Sharyn Levine Social worker

Body Sculpting, a system I live with every day has changed my entire being. It effects my every movement and the way I feel about myself.

I feel in command of my body and have the confidence that I can correct and heal almost anything that might occur.  I have better balance and people comment about my posture quite often.

Lorie, my teacher and mentor for over thirty years has come to Body Sculpting through many years of dance, yoga studying and research. Her journey and evolution has been such a gift to her students.  She truly lives what she teaches. She is a consummate teacher whose own body has been her workshop.

I thank her for the ability and encouragement to live on a physically and emotionally healthy plane.

  Barriesue Zicherman Artist, Teacher 

No matter what your contribution, it will bring us closer to the goal of hiring the necessary and valuable help of a first rate public relations and marketing firm.

That is all we ask, to be able to make a difference in people's lives by bringing a new and complete awareness to posture consciousness. 

    Anyone Can Help

    Crowd funding works if there is a large crowd so please help us spread the word, like us on Facebook to stay connected, e-mail your friends our Indiegogo campaign. Help us by being creative. You can donate anything you want the perks are suggested price points.

    Please email me with any questions or comments.

story:
Please help LegacyComplete.com make a positive impact on families, and entire communities, by making effective estate planning accessible to everyone.

Estate planning...reinvented.  

Most people have something of value they have worked hard to acquire. This might include their home.  Their savings. Sentimental items. Even life lessons and wisdom. But will this legacy they've created be handed down to whom they want, when they want, the way they want?  Not everyone knows the steps to ensure that this will happen.

Take a moment to listen to Lisa's story

There are many stories like Lisa’s that end in chaos and heartache!   Wisdom and wealth are lost.  Families are torn apart.  Tragically, loved ones are forced to start from square one rather than building upon the previous generation's hard work.  All of this, as a result of not planning.

LegacyComplete is estate planning...reinvented. 

The good news is that all of this chaos and heartache can be easily avoided with proper education and an effective, affordable planning tool. Using a customized revocable living trust as the foundation of the estate plan, the LegacyComplete Program is unique and so much more than a document preparation website. 

More than a document preparation website

The LegacyComplete Program is an award-winning, patent-pending, living trust planning program that can be completed online and includes attorney guidance.  The LegacyComplete Program empowers and educates everyday Americans to:

  • remain in control of what they have while they are alive and well; 
  • appoint trusted helpers to manage their financial affairs if they should become incapacitated; 
  • leave what they have, to whom they want, when they want, the way they want, while passing down their life lessons in addition to their assets, after they are gone.

LegacyComplete realizes that “one size does not fit all.” For this reason, the LegacyComplete Program can be customized to address customers' individual needs.   

LegacyComplete.com: effective, easy-to-understand and affordable

From an idea to a prize-winning program to an opportunity for you

The idea for creating a mechanism to provide effective, affordable estate planning was sparked in Chicago Goldman Sachs 10,000 Small Business Program in December 2012.

The idea for this planning tool became a reality in October 2014, when the LegacyComplete.com Program won FIRST PLACE in a competition hosted by the University of Chicago's I.J. Clinic on Entrepreneurship and the Chicago Innovation Exchange (competition was sponsored by the Chicago White Sox and Microsoft).

We need your help!

Each dollar you donate moves us one step closer to making effective, affordable, legacy-focused, estate planning available to everyone! Think of the families that can be strengthened and, in turn, the communities that can thrive if creating effective estate planning goes viral. Your generosity can help others fulfill their legacy.
We plan to launch in 2 months.  Prior to starting this crowd-funding page, we raised $75,000 of the $100,000 we needed to launch LegacyComplete.  However, we need to raise the remaining $25,000 before we can launch. 

Our goal of $25,000 will cover the following items:

  • Completing the website and additional software
  • Marketing & social media management
  • Filing utility patent application
  • Technology-related operating expenses
  • Designing additional educational programming
  • Presenting at national conventions (please contact Kimberly Brown if you have an event in which you would like us to participate)

Living Trust Giveaway

One lucky supporters will be randomly selected on May 17, 2015 to win one of our Protecting Legacies Living Trust Programs (valued at $650 - view rules.)

Can't donate at this time?  We want everyone to have the opportunity to enter the LegacyComplete Giveaway for a free Protecting Legacies Living Trust Package.  If you cannot donate to our campaign at this time, but you want to support us, here are a few ways you can enter:

1) Like us on Facebook, then post a link to our campaign on your page (1 entry), or, 
2) Follow us on LinkedIn, then post a link to our campaign on your page (1 entry).

Don't Need the Perk?

If you have already created an effective estate plan and you want to donate the discount to someone else, feel free to do so.  We can also help you locate a needy family to whom you can donate your perk.

Other Ways You Can Help

We would really appreciate it if you would take a moment and share our campaign on your social media pages.

Kimberly Brown is an Illinois Attorney and this may be considered Attorney Advertisement.

story:
SCROLL DOWN FOR PORTUGESE

_____________________________________________________________________________

Landlubbers and Sailors!


After a 10,000 mile journey the Alternative Sailing Community needs your support to repair our two community boats!


###Exclusively watch Libertalia Episode 2, a documentary on the beginnings of our community###

We are a community of eco-conscious travellers sailing around the world. Using  art, music, performance and recycling to sustain our voyage around the earth.
Our mission along the way is to:

  • teach sailing to as many people as possible, including backpackers, travellers, schoolchildren and locals
  • spread smiles through circus performance and music
  • share what we know about sustainable living methods
  • learn what we can about the cultures around the world, how they interact with the planet and each other
  • recycle whenever possible. Boat parts, food, clothing, and anything else we can to move away from a consumerist society
  • live as a community of travellers, a world family of sailors and sea gypsies
  • connect alternative land based communities around the world by moving goods and people from place to place
  • provide an alternative means of travel by harnessing the wind and moving away from our dependance on fossil fuels and limited resources
  • tell the stories of our journey together, the cultures we encounter, and living in a traveling community on the cross-media storytelling platform voiiage.org


We have just finished our crossing of the pacific, celebrated our one year anniversary, and are continuing our voyage around the world sailing north from New Zealand in May. Our first stop will be the Fiji island group.

After a 10,000 mile journey our first boat Starseeker needs some refitting and our new boat needs gear to get her ready for offshore voyaging.

WOO-HOO!

Thats right! We are super excited to introduce to you LARE. Our community's second vessel, a 45ft gaff rigged schooner. She's a traditional schooner painted black, we got ourselves a pirate ship!

We need you and we count on you!

Our project is grassroots. We don't have any banners and don't sell space for commercials on our website or voiiage.org. We want the project to remain financially independent from big sponsors and companies and that's why we count on your support!

We cannot do this without you! We need $5000 to complete the repairs on our boats and keep them seaworthy. With a small donation from you we can continue our voyage, helping to create the change we want to see on our planet!

After having refit our vessels they will be used to teach as many travellers as possible how to sail. We will be giving sailing lessons in Northland, New Zealand around April 2015. The lessons will be open to anyone who is interested! 
Every last coin of the money raised will go into buying parts and completing repairs!


We do all the work ourselves to keep the costs as low as possible!


The Perks


Community life for us is about sharing and we want to give back to all the beautiful people around the world that make this journey possible! That is why we spent endless hours to come up with things we can give back to you.
The result are different Perks that you can see and choose from on the left. 

DECKHAND/$25


For 25$ we will send you an exclusive link to our documentary "Libertalia" that tells the story of the very beginning of our community.

It's a seven part web series by the incredible film makers Arnault Labaronne & Caroline Gerdolle. Watch the first Part here:


SECOND MATE/50$

Receive an exclusive download link to 15 wallpapers taken by our own photographer Ramin Krause in New Zealand. May they make you smile every time you look at them! Of course you can share them with your friends and family.

FIRST MATE/100$

Have you been staring at the empty spot at you wall for some time now? Fill it with a printed photo by Ramin Krause. Choose one of the wallpapers or any other photo on www.raminkrause.com and we will send you the link to a High-Resolution Photo file with the GPS-Coordinates and the story behind the photo.
 

BOSWAIN/250$


Let us scream out your name far out on sea, while drinking rum and telling stories!
___________________________________________________________________________
The more funds we reach the more boats we can access! That way we can enable even more people to experience the sea, traveling in a community and sharing our vision of a new sustainable planet. And once they have learned it they can go out to share it with even more people. A Snowball of sorts. Yay!


The Dream


To create a world wide network of sailing vessels, harnessing the wind to move goods and people around the planet. To travel in a caravan of sailing boats, combining ocean travel with communal living. Effecting positive change wherever we travel. Become a part of the shift towards a more conscious sustainable planet. We aren't trying to fight the existing paradigm. Our revolution comes through creating a new paradigm that will render the old obsolete.


The Storytelling


On our travels we encounter some of the most remote cultures on the planet in the islands of the vast Pacific. We bring circus shows and laughter, play music at schools, give workshops on permaculture and recycling. To share the message of free living and traveling by the wind we are going to post all these stories on the platform voiiage.org.

Texts, photos, videos, maps, statistics and audio pieces of music and interviews will come together to create fluent stories of our journey and state of the world in the year 2015.

Local recipes, dances, music, drawings, handicrafts, tales and faces coming together on one website, open to any storyteller around the world. To create cultural understanding and to spread the message of how to live in a sustainable, peaceful, and free way together, worldwide. All non-profit and feedback based.

We can make this dream come true. Now, today. Support us and join to help this seed grow by becoming part of our community, wherever you are!

Other ways you can help


We have many capable sailors, captains, and mechanics. There are many more travelers who want to learn, than space on boats. We are looking for more vessels.  We do not want new boats, we are looking for boats that are currently not in use that we can repair and get back out into the oceans. Anyone who helps us find a boat by donating a boat or connecting us with someone who does can know that they have helped both our community and the planet by taking something unused and turning it into a piece of the change we want to see. These vessels will be a catalyst for teaching and change. They will get used and loved. Once a boat is communal she no longer exists as private property but as community property, owned by everyone sailing on her, captained by an elected community member with the skills and knowledge to keep the boat and crew safe at sea. So if you have a boat you are not using or know someone with a boat please get in touch. We are thankful for any hints and tips that could possibly help us grow our fleet.

We are a community and there are so many other possibilities to help us than just money or boats. We value every skill so if you like what you read and would want to get involved, please contact us.

Currently we are  looking for volunteer translators, helpers, lawyers, story tellers and social media people but also clowns, cooks, gardeners, captains, musicians, artists, or anyone with a great message to share with communities around the world!

And now all we can do is wait and hope and prepare for our big journey! Thank you for taking time to read this!


__________________________________________________________________________

PORTUGESE/


Landlubbers e velejadores!

Depois de 10.000 milhas marítimas de jornada, a comunidade alternativa de veleiros necessita do seu apoio para reparar nossos dois barcos comunais!

Nos somos uma comunidade de viajantes preocupados com o meio ambiente, velejando ao redor do muno usando a arte, a musica, performances e reciclando para manter nossa viajem ao redor do planeta..

Nossa missão ao longo do caminho é:

·  Ensinar velejar o máximo de pessoas possível, incluindo mochileiros, viajantes, crianças em escolas e locais.

  • Espalhar sorrisos através de performances de circo e musica
  • Compartilhar o que sabemos sobre maneiras sustentáveis de viver
  • Aprender o que podemos sobre as culturas ao redor do mundo e como elas interagem com o planeta e com o próximo.
  • Reciclar sempre que possível partes de barcos, comida, roupas e qualquer coisa fora da sociedade do consumo.
  • Viver como uma comunidade de viajantes, uma família mundial de velejadores e ciganos do mar.
  • Conectar comunidades alternativas ao redor do mundo levando produtos e pessoas de um lugar a outro.
  • Oferecer uma maneira alternativa de viajar aproveitando o vento e se afastando da nossa dependência de combustíveis fósseis e recursos limitados
  • Contar as historias de nossa viajem juntos, culturas as quais encontramos e viver em uma comunidade itinerante na media cruzada de contar historias sob a plataforma voiiage.org


Nós acabamos de fazer o cruze do pacifico,  celebramos o nosso aniversario de um ano  e estamos continuando nossa viagem ao redor do mundo velejando ao norte de Nova Zelândia em Maio. Nossa primeira parada será no grupo de ilhas em FIJI
Depois de 10000 milhas de viagem, nosso barco Starseeker necessita de alguns reparos e nosso novo barco necessita preparo para deixa-la pronto para viagem em alto-mar;

IUPIII

É isso!! Estamos extremamente contentes de apresentar a vocês LARE. Nossa segunda embarcação comunal é uma escuna tradicional pintada de preto. Sim!!! Acabamos de adquirir uma barco pirata.

Precisamos de você e contamos com você!

Nosso projeto e ...grassroots. nos não temos propagandas e não vendemos espaços comerciais no nosso website ou viagem. Nós queremos que o projeto continue financialmente independente de grandes patrocinadores e companhias e é por isso que nós contamos com o seu suporte!

Nós não podemos fazer isso sem você! Nós precisamos de 5000 dólares para reparar por completo nossos barcos e mantê-los prontos para o mar. Com uma pequena doação de você nós podemos continuar nossa viagem, ajudando a criar a mudança que queremos ver em nosso planeta.

Depois de reformar nossas embarcações, elas serão usadas para ensinar como velejar o máximo de viajantes possível Nós daremos aulas de vela na ilha norte da Nova Zelândia por volta de abril 2015. As aulas serão abertas para quem quer que esteja interessado. 

Até a última moeda do dinheiro arrecadado será usado para comprar partes e completar os reparos das embarcações!


Nós fazemos todo o trabalho nós mesmos para manter os custos o mais baixo possível.

The Perks

Vida em comunidade para nós esta relacionado com compartir e nós queremos retribuir a todas as pessoas que fazem essa jornada possível! Por isso nós passamos infinitas horas para trazer coisas que podemos retribuir com você.

O resultado são diferentes brindes que vice poderá ver e escolher a esquerda

Tripulante/$25

A Cada 25$ nos te enviaremos um link exclusive do nosso documentário LIBERTALIA que conta a historia do principio da nossa comunidade.

É uma serie para web em 7 partes produzida pelo produtor de vídeos Arnault Labaronne. Assista a primeira parte aqui.

Segundo Imediato/50$

Receba um link exclusivo para download de 15 papéis  de parede tiradas pelo nosso fotógrafo Ramin Krause na Nova Zelândia. Elas farão você sorrir cada vez que você olhar para elas! Claro que você pode compartilhar elas com seus amigos e família

Primeiro Imediato/100$

Você esteve olhando para um local vazio na sua parede já há algum tempo? Encha-o com uma foto tirada por Ramin Krause. Escolha um dos papéis de parede ou qualquer outra foto na www.raminkrause.com e nós lhe enviaremos o link para uma de alta resolução arquivo de fotografias com o GPS-Coordena e a história por trás da foto.

ContraMestre/250$

Vamos gritar seu nome  no meio mar, enquanto tomando rum e contando histórias!

Quanto mais fundos arrecadamos mais barcos teremos acesso! Dessa forma, podemos permitir que ainda mais pessoas possam experimentar o mar, viajando em uma comunidade e partilhando a nossa visão de um novo planeta sustentável. E uma vez que eles aprenderam que eles podem sair para compartilhá-lo com ainda mais pessoas. Uma bola de neve de sortes. Yay!

O SONHO

Criar uma rede mundial de embarcações à vela,  aproveitamento o vento para transportar mercadorias e pessoas ao redor do planeta. Para viajar em uma caravana de barcos a vela, combinando viagens marítimas com a vida comunitária. Efetuar mudanças positivas sempre que viajamos. Torne-se uma parte da transição para um planeta sustentável mais consciente. Nós não estamos tentando combater o paradigma existente. Nossa revolução vem através da criação de um novo paradigma que irá processar o obsoleto.

Contando histórias

Em nossas viagens nos deparamos com algumas das culturas mais remotas do planeta nas ilhas do vasto Pacífico. Trazemos espetáculos circenses e risos, tocamos música nas escolas, damos oficinas sobre permacultura e reciclagem. Para compartilhar a mensagem de vida livre e viajar com o vento, vamos postar todas essas histórias sobre o voiiage.org plataforma.

Textos, fotos, vídeos, mapas, estatísticas e pedaços de áudio de música e entrevistas vão se reunir para criar histórias fluentes, de nossa jornada ao longo do mundo no ano de 2015.

Receitas locais, danças, músicas, desenhos, artesanato, contos e rostos que se juntam em um site, aberto a qualquer contador de histórias ao redor do mundo. Para criar uma compreensão cultural e espalhar uma mensagem de como viver de forma sustentável, pacífica e livre, juntos em todo o mundo. Tudo sem fins lucrativos e baseado em feedback.

Nós podemos fazer este sonho se tornar realidade.. Una-se conosco  para ajudar a esta semente crescer, tornando-se parte da nossa comunidade, onde quer que esteja!

Outras maneiras que você pode ajudar

Temos muitos marinheiros capazes, capitães, e mecânicos. Ha muitos mais viajantes que querem aprender, do que espaço nos barcos. Estamos à procura de mais barcos. Nós não queremos novos barcos, estamos à procura de barcos que não estão atualmente em uso que podemos consertar-los e coloca-los de volta ao oceano. Qualquer pessoa que nos ajude a encontrar um barco seja doando um barco ou conectando-nos com alguém que o faria, Terá ajudado tanto a nossa comunidade quanto ao planeta, tomando algo não utilizado e transformando em um pedaço da mudança que queremos ver no mundo. Estas embarcações serão um catalisador para a propagacao da mudança. Elas serão usadas e amados. Uma vez que um barco é comunal, ela não existe mais como propriedade privada, mas como propriedade da comunidade, propriedade de todo mundo sobre ela, capitaneada por um membro da comunidade eleito pelas habilidades e conhecimentos para manter o barco e a tripulação a salvo no mar. Então se você tem um barco que você não está usando ou conhece alguém com um barco, por favor entrar em contato conosco. Somos gratos por quaisquer sugestões e dicas que possa ajudar a crescer nossa frota.

Há muitas outras maneiras de nos ajudar do que apenas dinheiro ou barcos. Valorizamos cada habilidade, por isso, se você gosta do que você leu e gostaria de se envolver, entre em contato conosco.

Atualmente, estamos à procura de voluntários como tradutores, ajudantes, advogados, contadores de histórias e pessoas da mídia social, mas também palhaços, cozinheiros, jardineiros, capitães, músicos, artistas, ou qualquer pessoa com uma grande mensagem para compartilhar com as comunidades ao redor do mundo!

Agora tudo o que podemos fazer é espera, torcer e se preparar para a nossa grande viagem! Obrigado pelo tempo ao ler isso!

_________________________________________________________________________
Oh, and sorry to Caroline Gerdolle for forgetting to credit her name on our web series Libertalia. She also worked on it! Won't happen again, we promise! Love and Light everyone!
story_txt:
SCROLL DOWN FOR PORTUGESE
_____________________________________________________________________________
Landlubbers and Sailors!




After a 10,000 mile journey the Alternative Sailing Community needs your support to repair our two community boats!

###Exclusively watch Libertalia Episode 2, a documentary on the beginnings of our community###






We are a community of eco-conscious travellers sailing around the world. Using  art, music, performance and recycling to sustain our voyage around the earth. Our mission along the way is to:
teach sailing to as many people as possible, including backpackers, travellers, schoolchildren and locals
spread smiles through circus performance and music 
share what we know about sustainable living methods 


learn what we can about the cultures around the world, how they interact with the planet and each other

recycle whenever possible. Boat parts, food, clothing, and anything else we can to move away from a consumerist society
live as a community of travellers, a world family of sailors and sea gypsies
connect alternative land based communities around the world by moving goods and people from place to place
provide an alternative means of travel by harnessing the wind and moving away from our dependance on fossil fuels and limited resources

tell the stories of our journey together, the cultures we encounter, and living in a traveling community on the cross-media storytelling platform voiiage.org 




We have just finished our crossing of the pacific, celebrated our one year anniversary, and are continuing our voyage around the world sailing north from New Zealand in May. Our first stop will be the Fiji island group. After a 10,000 mile journey our first boat Starseeker needs some refitting and our new boat needs gear to get her ready for offshore voyaging. WOO-HOO! 

Thats right! We are super excited to introduce to you LARE. Our community's second vessel, a 45ft gaff rigged schooner. She's a traditional schooner painted black, we got ourselves a pirate ship!
We need you and we count on you!



Our project is grassroots. We don't have any banners and don't sell space for commercials on our website or voiiage.org. We want the project to remain financially independent from big sponsors and companies and that's why we count on your support!We cannot do this without you! We need $5000 to complete the repairs on our boats and keep them seaworthy. With a small donation from you we can continue our voyage, helping to create the change we want to see on our planet!After having refit our vessels they will be used to teach as many travellers as possible how to sail. We will be giving sailing lessons in Northland, New Zealand around April 2015. The lessons will be open to anyone who is interested! 
Every last coin of the money raised will go into buying parts and completing repairs!


We do all the work ourselves to keep the costs as low as possible!

The Perks
Community life for us is about sharing and we want to give back to all the beautiful people around the world that make this journey possible! That is why we spent endless hours to come up with things we can give back to you.The result are different Perks that you can see and choose from on the left. DECKHAND/$25



For 25$ we will send you an exclusive link to our documentary "Libertalia" that tells the story of the very beginning of our community.
It's a seven part web series by the incredible film makers Arnault Labaronne & Caroline Gerdolle. Watch the first Part here:

SECOND MATE/50$

Receive an exclusive download link to 15 wallpapers taken by our own photographer Ramin Krause in New Zealand. May they make you smile every time you look at them! Of course you can share them with your friends and family.




FIRST MATE/100$
Have you been staring at the empty spot at you wall for some time now? Fill it with a printed photo by Ramin Krause. Choose one of the wallpapers or any other photo on www.raminkrause.com and we will send you the link to a High-Resolution Photo file with the GPS-Coordinates and the story behind the photo.
 

BOSWAIN/250$



Let us scream out your name far out on sea, while drinking rum and telling stories!

___________________________________________________________________________The more funds we reach the more boats we can access! That way we can enable even more people to experience the sea, traveling in a community and sharing our vision of a new sustainable planet. And once they have learned it they can go out to share it with even more people. A Snowball of sorts. Yay!


The Dream
To create a world wide network of sailing vessels, harnessing the wind to move goods and people around the planet. To travel in a caravan of sailing boats, combining ocean travel with communal living. Effecting positive change wherever we travel. Become a part of the shift towards a more conscious sustainable planet. We aren't trying to fight the existing paradigm. Our revolution comes through creating a new paradigm that will render the old obsolete. 

The Storytelling
On our travels we encounter some of the most remote cultures on the planet in the islands of the vast Pacific. We bring circus shows and laughter, play music at schools, give workshops on permaculture and recycling. To share the message of free living and traveling by the wind we are going to post all these stories on the platform voiiage.org. Texts, photos, videos, maps, statistics and audio pieces of music and interviews will come together to create fluent stories of our journey and state of the world in the year 2015.
Local recipes, dances, music, drawings, handicrafts, tales and faces coming together on one website, open to any storyteller around the world. To create cultural understanding and to spread the message of how to live in a sustainable, peaceful, and free way together, worldwide. All non-profit and feedback based. We can make this dream come true. Now, today. Support us and join to help this seed grow by becoming part of our community, wherever you are!Other ways you can help
We have many capable sailors, captains, and mechanics. There are many more travelers who want to learn, than space on boats. We are looking for more vessels.  We do not want new boats, we are looking for boats that are currently not in use that we can repair and get back out into the oceans. Anyone who helps us find a boat by donating a boat or connecting us with someone who does can know that they have helped both our community and the planet by taking something unused and turning it into a piece of the change we want to see. These vessels will be a catalyst for teaching and change. They will get used and loved. Once a boat is communal she no longer exists as private property but as community property, owned by everyone sailing on her, captained by an elected community member with the skills and knowledge to keep the boat and crew safe at sea. So if you have a boat you are not using or know someone with a boat please get in touch. We are thankful for any hints and tips that could possibly help us grow our fleet.We are a community and there are so many other possibilities to help us than just money or boats. We value every skill so if you like what you read and would want to get involved, please contact us. Currently we are  looking for volunteer translators, helpers, lawyers, story tellers and social media people but also clowns, cooks, gardeners, captains, musicians, artists, or anyone with a great message to share with communities around the world!

And now all we can do is wait and hope and prepare for our big journey! Thank you for taking time to read this!

story:
Cosa stai finanziando

Sono un fotografo certificato Google, ed offro i miei servizi alle attività commerciali in Italia. Sono un fotografo professionista, ed il mio lavoro è mirato alla migliore presentazione delle attività ed al perfezionamento dei risultati dei motori di ricerca legati a Google: Google Maps, Google+, Google Search.

  • Attraverso Indiegogo e questa campagna di finanziamento voglio sperimentare una via innovativa di vendere il servizio
  • I finanziatori della prima ora potranno usufruire di tariffe vantaggiosissime ed assicurare il virtual tour ed il servizio Google Maps|Business View per la loro attività

Di cosa ho bisogno e cosa otterrai

Per poter garantire la massima qualità dei miei servizi ho necessità di aggiornare costantemente la mia attrezzatura, e servirmi di software di editing specifici.

Attreaverso il tuo aiuto potrò dotarmi del necessario, ed utilizzarlo per la tua attività.

A chi è indirizzata l'offerta

Se hai un ristorante, un albergo, un bed and breakfast, un negozio di abbigliamento, una galleria d'arte, una palestra, un centro di fisioterapia.... una qualsiasi attività aperta al pubblico e che necessità di pubblicità e marketing online, allora dovresti seriamente considerare questa offerta.

Cosa è il servizio Google Maps|Business View

l servizio fotografico Google Maps Business View consiste nella realizzazione di un numero variabile di foto panoramiche a 360°, collegate fra loro da un percorso senza ostacoli, all'interno del vostro locale , e di un numero variabile di foto di POI (Point of Interest) ossia piatti, oggetti, menu, dettagli, arredi e quant'altro.

Le foto dei POI rimarranno di vostra proprietà e potrete utilizzarle per il vostro marketing e per la stampa, essendo realizzate con attrezzatura professionale di alta qualità.

Il servizio può essere offerto ESCLUSIVAMENTE da fotografi certificati Google o da agenzie.

Cliccate qui per vedere l'elenco dei fotografi certificati: http://www.google.com/intl/it/maps/about/partners/businessview/get-started/

Troverete il mio nome ai primi posti su Roma in quanto Top Performer del programma Google.


Una volta ultimato il servizio panoramico procederò con il caricamento e il quality check di Google (che agisce a livello mondiale per garantire una qualità uniforme) e nel tempo di due settimane sarà online nella vostra scheda Google+ (che verrà da me creata nel caso ancora non la possiedate) e che vi garantisce la presenza su Google Maps ed una visualizzazione migliore nei risultati di ricerca di Google, soprattutto nella ricerca da dispositivo mobile.

Per vedere un esempio di una realizzazione da me effettuata potete cercare su Google Maps il locale "Food on the Road": dalla pagina Google+ è possibile visualizzare tutte le foto realizzate e, scegliendo il link "Guarda dentro", entrare nel panorama: https://goo.gl/maps/L2SHQ

Potete provare la stessa esperienza utilizzando il vostro smartphone, cercando lo stesso locale su Google Maps.​

Per avere un altro esempio potete vedere la pagina G+ del locale seacook che, dopo sole due settimane dall'apertura, ha ricevuto, anche grazie al servizio Google Maps|Business View, oltre 7000 visite: https://goo.gl/maps/uu9Qm

Potete vedere nell'immagine qui sotto come la navigazione in un locale dotato di servizio Google Maps|Business View sia nettamente più utile, anche da smartphone:


Partecipando al finanziamento otterrete:

- Creazione, verifica diretta (più veloce della verifica standard di Google),

- Servizio panoramico dedicato Google Maps|Business View

- Moderazione e pubblicazione del tour panoramico sui server di Google
story_txt:
Cosa stai finanziando Sono un fotografo certificato Google, ed offro i miei servizi alle attività commerciali in Italia. Sono un fotografo professionista, ed il mio lavoro è mirato alla migliore presentazione delle attività ed al perfezionamento dei risultati dei motori di ricerca legati a Google: Google Maps, Google+, Google Search.  Attraverso Indiegogo e questa campagna di finanziamento voglio sperimentare una via innovativa di vendere il servizio I finanziatori della prima ora potranno usufruire di tariffe vantaggiosissime ed assicurare il virtual tour ed il servizio Google Maps|Business View per la loro attività
   Di cosa ho bisogno e cosa otterrai Per poter garantire la massima qualità dei miei servizi ho necessità di aggiornare costantemente la mia attrezzatura, e servirmi di software di editing specifici.
Attreaverso il tuo aiuto potrò dotarmi del necessario, ed utilizzarlo per la tua attività.
    A chi è indirizzata l'offerta Se hai un ristorante, un albergo, un bed and breakfast, un negozio di abbigliamento, una galleria d'arte, una palestra, un centro di fisioterapia.... una qualsiasi attività aperta al pubblico e che necessità di pubblicità e marketing online, allora dovresti seriamente considerare questa offerta.

story:
Short Bio
Hello everyone, my name is Evelyn Richardson and I am blessed to be 26 years old.  I was born with Spina Bifida (a neural tube defect where the bones don't form around the spine properly) causing me to walk on Forearm Crutches and have paralysis in my legs from the knees down. Despite my limitations, God gave me favor to receive a  Bachelors of Science Degree in Business Administration at the age of 21. I am a full time mother to my miracle-son Nehemiah. In the beginning stages of being a single mother, Clothing Line "Go Gettah Apparel" was birthed visit www.gogettah.com. Now I would like to take the vision God has  given me from good to great!


 

What is Why Not Me?  Boutique


There are many people in the world that ask themselves, "why can't I have a baby, why can't I love, why can't I be successful, why can't I serve the Lord, why can't I fit in, why can't I stay on the straight and narrow path, why can't I save myself for marriage, why can't I live a holy & godly life, why can't I have a disability,  why can't I be a entrepreneur, why can't I achieve a degree, why can't I persevere through it all." I am here to say, Why Not Me? All these things are common questions for me just as well as others around the world. With your support I am determined to spread the message and show others that despite the common "Why Not Me" questions it is possible!

I am determined to open up my own personal intimate boutique in Downtown Las Vegas, Nevada at Downtown Container Park owned by CEO Tony Hsieh of Zappos. A great eco friendly, live, attractive, positive environment with other entrepreneurs and business owners like myself growing their success. In this boutique you will find unique quality apparel for the following: men t-shirts, women t-shirts, children clothing, inspirational décor, accessories for men & women, active wear such as hats and sunglasses. Catering to each individual &  providing a welcoming place to shop as well as just to come in and be uplifted if your having a not so great day!


What will it take to open up WNM? Boutique and what will donators receive?


  • Six months lease coverage at the Container Park $2,200
  • City & State Business License fees $450.00
  • Marketing Material( i.e internal/external promotions) $354.00
  • Administrative Equipment (i.e cash register, receipt paper, surveillance) $451.00
  • Merchandise Equipment (i.e clothing racks, shopping bags, mannequins) $1059.32


Perks

Please view the right hand column to see what you will receive for donating to this campaign.


The Impact

Why Not Me? Boutique will be evidence it is possible to achieve whatever it is you put your mind to. The impact that this message holds can be the breakthrough that many people have been waiting on. I have had the opportunity to share my message with countless amounts of people on You Tube, in the newspaper-print & online, on Fox 40 News as a Motivational Speaker, at different themed events with up to thousands of people. The impact has left individuals crying saying, "how they were inspired and "how their excuses are invalid." If I am able to inspire more people on a day to day basis I know I am doing my part to be the change I wish to see in this world.


Other Ways You Can Help

I understand that some of you may not be able to contribute money but you can help by...

Pray for us!

Ask yourself-Why Not Me?

Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.

Use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word!

http://igg.me/at/whynotmeboutique

#whynotme

story:
Short Summary

Hi! My name is Rebecca. I am a wife and mother of 3 beautiful children but wear many other hats as a lot of us tend to do. But one very important hat I am happy and very passionate about wearing is my desire to help those in need or just down on their luck. We all at some pointe and time in our lives have needed just a little help to get us over that bump in the road. My husband and I try our best to do as much as humanely possible to do these "random blessings" as I call it but I can only imagine the volume of these blessings that we could continue to do with your contributions! And sometimes it's not a NEED, it's just showing a nice gesture. Ever since my kids have been in school, on those cold 20 degree mornings, I stop and get coffee and give to the teachers who are awaiting outside for the arrival of the kids to make sure they get into school safe. Each morning when I pass the Food Bank, and I see people standing in line on those same cold weather mornings,  my heart breaks and I'm thinking I wished I had a bag full of gift cards to the nearest grocery store to go pass out. Or the woman I overhear in the store telling her daughter how many candles they would need until they could get enough money to get the lights cut back on. In the world we live in today, people need to know someone still cares! And I know there are plenty of people who would like to help but don't know how to or just don't have the time. But if you would take just enough time to contribute... "M712" will do the rest for you!!! And no one can put a dollar value on the impact YOU WILL make! So please, give from your heart and let's start spreading more of these "RANDOM  BLESSINGS!"

What We Need & What You Get

I started out with a goal of $100,000.00 because with this type of program, the possibilities are endless. The more we raise the more lives that can be touched. If this is something that I can continue to do for years to come, I PROMISE you, I will do it even if it's a $1  balance!

Now I believe in giving credit where credit is due. I would like to have a "Contributer of the week" every week so others can see who all is sharing in my passion for this cause and to put a face with the heart who is thinking of others!

Like I stated previously, my husband and I have been doing this for years so there is no doubt in my mind that ANY funds will go un-used!!!

The Impact

Can you imagine the difference or outlook people could have when these random blessings start to happen to them!  You see , the difference in "M712" and local agencies on the corner office is , there's no application to fill out or wait time. No approval needed, no one asking a million questions before giving assistance with a need. These are surprise, random and not requested. We want to pay for the groceries of the person in front of me that had to put items back due to not having enough money, or fill the gas tank up of the man who is counting out pennies to pay for $2.43 worth of gas. And what's so exciting, I never know when an opportunity will arise either as they are random on my end and the receiver! The look on their face is priceless!!!!!

Risks & Challenges

Now with any project there are risks and questions. I'm sure someone reading this May be thinking, "What if that person is really not in need." But if you noticed the name of my campaign, it's called "M712" That's in reference to the scripture Matthew 7:12, which is commonly known as the Golden Rule. To do unto others as you would have them do unto you. And that's how I live my life daily. We can't get caught up on the "What if's" when it's time to help others. We just have to know that OUR actions and contributions are done with good intentions and from our heart. And with that, we will in returned be blessed ourselves. So don't let anyone steal your joy , YOUR blessings or opportunity to make a difference in someone's life.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • If you can not give financially, spread the word and make some noise about this campaign.
  • And don't forget, it takes more than one tool to build a ship! So let's get sailing together!!!

story:
Shiny Creations for Everyone!

3 Seattle friends (aka a couple and a third wheel? Two besties and a dude? Two artists and a scientist?) have stumbled on an opportunity to create a new entity, Shiny Creations Company, that aims to bring high quality gifts from near and afar to the masses. Check out our perks then read on for details!

  • Who is Team Shiny? Angie is an artist, product and graphic designer who has become a focal point between the worlds of high quality imported and Seattle-made arts and crafts with eleven years in the wholesale gift industry doing everything from order entry to trade shows. Stacey is a scientist by day and a creative entrepreneur by night. She has traveled to China with Angie is excited to be the executor of the details. Mark has been saving all his creative energy for the right opportunity and Shiny Creations is it! He also has extensive experience in customer service and shipping management and will be heading up our fulfillment department when he's not creating rad illustrations (see our limited edition T at the $100 level!) 
  • We have oodles of ideas and are eager to implement them but we need some funding to get started and make this experience both for us and our customers as Shiny as possible!
  • Our goal is sell both imported items of our design and handcrafted goods by Seattle area artisans across the US via both wholesale and retail channels. Our website will be helpful in the retail (or, direct to consumer) market but to be successful at wholesale (making our products available to consumers through their local independently owned stores) requires us to participate in key industry trade shows-this is where we need your help!

Send Us Across the Country & Collect Your Rewards

Here's the Skinny on Team Shiny:

  • We have identified 4 key industry trade shows we need to attend between now and November 2015 to make our presence known in the wholesale gift industry: the Museum Store Association Conference, Atlanta Gift Show, NY NOW and the Las Vegas Gift & Souvenir Show. The estimated cost of a booth and travel expenses for two of us to travel and connect with customers averages between $3,000 and $5,000 each for an estimated total of $16,000 for tradeshow costs alone between now and the end of 2015.

  • In addition to booth fees, we need to secure a display setup, transportation for the booth inventory and display and advertising via tradeshow publications, estimating $2,500-$3,000.00
  • We have no shortage of creative people participating in Team Shiny! Check out our perks for opportunities to receive cards printed with our artwork, exclusive campaign t-shirts, and even opportunities to contribute to our future product line! Please note: our selection of items on our website will expand greatly in May so if you don't see a must have item there now don't fret, there will be more items competing to be purchased with your perk discount later!
  • We're all-in for this project so we'll be trying our best to survive with any amount of contributions we receive from the campaign. Our main purposes of campaigning are to raise the funds necessary to get started (as we won't have significant sales income until May) and to invite our friends and family to get as excited about the possibilities in the future of Shiny Creations as we are!

The Impact of Your Contributions

Wondering what exactly we aim to do?

  • We love creating and helping people create what they love. We want to help local creative people expand their collector base across the country while allowing them to spend more time creating and less time trying to sell their items to fund their creativity.
  • Angie has been working with glass workshops in China since 2006 and has found that although she is no longer with her previous employer these workshops are still interested in working with her. She has identified key suppliers that understand her vision for quality and design and will be working on creating custom Shiny designs with them in the future. Additionally, through her work with her own craft company Urban Idealist Art and Design she has made many contacts in the local craft community and believes we can successfully promote these artists nationally as well.
  • Your contributions will not only help us spread the word about Shiny Creations Company but will also bolster our confidence to go forth and be Shiny!

                

Risks & Challenges

We are taking a major leap with this endeavor but we aren't doing it blindly. We have the vision, the courage and drive, if we can secure some funding we're good to go!

  • We have the experience in the industry as well as a foothold in the creative community that will help us achieve success with Shiny Creations Company.
  • What will we do if we don't reach our funding goal? We would cut back our plans for the summer shows and hope we reach enough customers at those we are able to attend. It will hinder the speed of our growth but Shiny Creations will not be denied!

Other Ways You Can Help

Dollars are great but community is, too! If you want to support Team Shiny but are unable to contribute financially please consider the following:

  • We would love for you to take a look at our website and if you see something you love please share it with your community on Pinterest or Facebook!
  • Please connect with us on Pinterest, Facebook, Twitter and Youtube for the latest Shiny news!
  • Check out our card artwork options shown in here to join us in choosing the art that will be printed on our first release of cards.
  • Shine on! Our friends and family are our greatest sources of inspiration!

Thank You for taking the time to learn more about Shiny Creations Company.        We really appreciate your support and we hope you'll have a Shiny day!

It will hinder the speed of our growth but Shiny Creations will not be denied!    Other Ways You Can Help Dollars are great but community is, too! If you want to support Team Shiny but are unable to contribute financially please consider the following:  We would love for you to take a look at our website and if you see something you love please share it with your community on Pinterest or Facebook!
Please connect with us on Pinterest, Facebook, Twitter and Youtube for the latest Shiny news!
Check out our card artwork options shown in here to join us in choosing the art that will be printed on our first release of cards. Shine on! Our friends and family are our greatest sources of inspiration!   Thank You for taking the time to learn more about Shiny Creations Company.        We really appreciate your support and we hope you'll have a Shiny day!

story:
Over View of the Project 

My name is Denise Morris ( Kieran RavenMoon)  I am a first degree witch, and a bonded member of the Coven of the Rowan Star. I have an introverted personality and have often found it difficult to find a space at Seelie Court for quiet reflection during large gatherings.  

While I love the company of my community,  sometimes I have been so deeply affected by ritual that I needed a few moments alone to process the messages and lessons. I know in this I am not alone!! Many of you have expressed similar concerns to me as well. 

 Therefore , as a part of my second degree work,  I have committed to building a water temple on the property at Seelie Court for the purpose of establishing this needed "quiet" space.  The Temple will:

  •   Be a place where seekers can find contemplative space to commune, reflect, and meditate.  
  •  Support the development and beautification of the  manifest property 

What We Need & What You Get

As with any project, you need to know what and where your support is going. 

  • A projected budget of $5000.00 is my goal!!!
  • Pergola and arbors will cost approximately $3000.00
  • Water Feature $500.00
  • Plants and flowers $1500.00.
  • In kind donations of labor, and cheers ---$0.00 :)
  • Your volunteerism for an assigned  task/time on May 9, 2015 
  • Any volunteer to support the construction will get a T-shirt and Free Lunch

The Impact

While the realization of a THE WATER TEMPLE  has the potential to impact so many of us....now and in the future, it will not be possible without the commitment and the support of the community.   Further, this project has the potential to engage us in manifest work for the tradition, and it offers a work day that is fun and supportive of one another.  

In my past experience with projects of this nature, I learned that effective planning and task assignments are essential to realize success.  I promise to  organize the day for effectiveness and fun!!!

Challenges

I know it is hard for all of us to find additional monies in this economic times, therefore I will run this campaign for the full 60 days!  No matter the size of your donation, any and all contributions will be appreciated. 

Other Ways You Can Help 

If you just don't have the money and you still want to help....I would be so grateful for your assistance in construction day on May 10, 2015 at 9AM  at Lumina Grove.  Sign up with me at denisesmorris@gmail.com, come out I have a job for you!!! We need planters, lunch preparers, cheerleaders and the like ...there is something everyone can do.

story:
Who I am

Hi there! My name is Jarrad and I’m trying to help charities all over the world. As an employee at a large non-profit hospital system in Pennsylvania, I hear many stories of people in need and my many coworkers who impact the lives of those with needs. Unfortunately, being in the Information Technology department, I don’t get to impact those lives personally and I wanted to come up with some way to help people. That’s when Can You Give was born. 

What I'm Proposing

Through the simple act of shopping, you can help to make this world a better place. Before you stray away from this campaign, please let me explain how this is possible. Through the use of something called Affiliate Marketing, my plan is to put together a website where you can access retailers all over the world. Clicking on the links on our site will tag your purchases so that the retailer knows that you came from our site. Once you make your purchase, the retailer pays an Affiliate Marketing company and that Affiliate Marketing company pays us. Once they pay us, we pay the charities. My goal is to crowdsource the funds for the startup so that I can pass 100% of the funds from the retail purchases to the charities. 

Why I'm doing this

I am pursuing this because I see wasted potential. Every time you shop online at your favorite retailer, a portion of that could be going to fund medical care to underprivileged children, feed the homeless, or house and provide counsel to abused women. The possibilities are endless and with Can You Give, I hope to have the opportunity to help those in need while making it easier for others to do the same. 

What about overhead?

The current annual overhead is estimated to be very low. The server that the website is housed on has a lifetime subscription, the domain name is paid for by me each year and I plan to donate at least 10 hours per month for upkeep, check writing and pursuing additional retailers. The legal filing fees and registered agent services are the only commitments that I foresee. 

What your contribution will fund

In order to file as a non profit in the state of Pennsylvania, I need reserve the Can You Give name, submit articles of incorporation, select a registered agent and apply for a 501(c)(3) to obtain federal non-profit status. Each of these items has a fee schedule associated with it. Any remaining funds will be used to pay a website designer, preferably one associated with a small business. 

What is in it for you

As a contributor, you will be the first to be notified when the site is up and running. You will receive regular status reports about how much money was raised, which charities were contributed to as well as any new retailers that have been added to the website. 

If you are able to be more financially generous, you are welcome to take advantage of the perks listed to the right. They may not be much, but the impact will be huge.

If you are technologically gifted in the PHP coding language or are exceptionally gifted with web design and would like to donate your services, Id be happy to accept your help and lower the amount of funds that Im requesting.

story:
Welcome to EARTH.

Welcome to Earth. And the future home of the School of Embodied Poetics.

This is the perfect place to sit in your own skin, feel the beauty of your nature, and evolve the courage it takes to become the YOU you have always known you could be.

This is an inspired collaboration…

Acquaintances turned friends, turned sisters, turned collaborators, that’s us, the Shakti team of Shannon Paige and Sara Shirk.

In a process of distinct evolution, continued study and revolutionary execution of a deeply practiced, fully embodied, and transmittable methodology and related bodies of work; Shannon and Sara strive to tune, teach, and transmit the Embody Method. This method moves the students’ mental, emotional and physical awareness from simple stabilizing actions into ever evolving complex forms and sequences to unfold meaning, confident and stable expression, and positive change.

The Embody Method has given way to the School of Embodied Poetics which is the home to several related bodies of work: Anjali Restorative Yoga, Shanti Shakti: Integrative Slow Flow, and Bala Therapeutic Yoga.

In order to give us the ability to reach as many inspired students and practitioners as possible we must give our school a stable and solid home.  That is why we are seeking to set down roots and create EARTH. 

EARTH is not simply a yoga studio, it is a place where every yoga student, practitioner, seeker, and aspiring teacher is invited to explore the melding of science and ancient wisdom traditions with the fullness of embodied poetry. 

Your contributions will go to cover the cost of build-out, construction, and supplies: flooring, paint, lighting, shelving, computer, yoga mats and props.

If you're totally strapped for cash, no worries!  Sharing our mission on your favorite flavor of social media:  Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Google+, Tumblr, Pinterest, Youtube, etc. helps us out as well! 

Any and all support is invaluable for our effort.

Thank you for reading and sharing our story.

We look forward to seeing you at the school you helped build very soon!

story:
Short Summary


  • Hello I am Aasia, owner of The Juice Lab 360, an organic juice and wellness bar. The juice lab 360 is not just another juice bar but a healthy lifestyle cafe that copies the"food as medicine" approach to healing.
  • I discovered the many benefits of juicing after stumbling across website after bi-lateral knee surgery and weight gain.
  • What I experienced were the many benefits from regular, daily juicing. I have always preferred the natural approach to healing and stayed away from pharmaceutical drugs and other cover ups so this was right up my alley. Why not find out the cause of the symptom which usually has something to do with what you put in your body or the environment you are in.
  • We provide quality organic  handcrafted juices, superfood smoothies and delicious snacks and plant based fare while educating the community on the power of juicing and plant based meals.
  • We will offer juicing demonstrations as well as some featured guest speakers on occasion. 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need your help in bringing our vision to you. After spending over $125,000 of personal funding into the business, mostly for the buildout, the additional requirements from the city and the setbacks we will need an additional $75,000 to purchase equipment. Unfortunately we will not be able to purchase our cold pressed machine  for our bottled juices and nut mylks which are unique from other juice bars. We have set ourselves apart from other juice bars with the addition of an education component and our unique nut mylk blends. We want to offer what other juice bars do not. Marketing and completing the  team is what will assist us in opening our doors.
  • We will be offering some awesome perks to help with raising these funds.
  • If we do not reach our goal we will still put the funds toward our equipment and working capital and expanding the menu with delicious healthy food.

The Impact

  • We not only want to bring quality juice and smoothies to the community but to educate the community on the benefits of juicing and eating a largely plant based diet. We are building a team of people, passionate about this industry and we plan on making a major impact on the community.

Risks & Challenges

We faced some challenges after consulting with the wrong people and learned the hard way that not everyone is in this for the right reasons. It is always a challenge in putting the right team together of like minded people. After pouring most of my savings into the buildout we ran in to a few surprises that were not disclosed and caused us to push the opening date back, more than once. The challenge has been in not giving up. A major risk is using personal funds to get to this point. One thing that it gaurantee is that I will keep fighting to make sure this happens and is a successful venture. 

Because my personal funds and collateral are backing this project, and because I really believe in it, we need to open our doors as soon as possible. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Every little bit helps! No amount is too small but if it is not a good time for you to contribute financially, you can help by sharing our vision and spreading the word. Tell everyone you know about our new venture especially those who are passionate about healing naturally. Make some noise!
  • Share our link on your facebook, twitter and your instagram page

Thank you, Thank you, Thank you!

story:
The Time Line:

Summer 2010:

I found myself at Mzoli’s Place - a place like you've never seen before- in Gugulethu just outside Cape Town.  Mzoli's is known for its vibrant parties, diverse patronage and, of course, its signature meats.  The sights, sounds and smells (oh! the smell of that meat!) made for an amazing atmosphere that forever changed me. 

    


Summer 2011:

10,000 miles away from Mzoli's and I couldn't get that experience out of my head - I wanted to share it!  I set off to re-create the same atmosphere by gathering as many friends as I could and roasting a whole pig! I always enjoyed cooking and entertaining, but after that pig roast I was absolutely hooked. 

Summer 2012:


Summer 2013 & 2014: Creating Porklandia

In 2013 I moved to Portland and kept the party going - with a new great name! New friends and new meats made for new incredible experiences! Now I've got 4 roasts under my belt with rounds of recipe tweaking, tasting, and an inappropriate amount of pork and smoke inhaled. 



Summer 2015 and Beyond!

Every year in the fleeting days of summer I feel that buzz around the Porklandia experience!  However, to truly make this the party of the year we need to share it with as many people as possible!  

We can do this!


   


Now ... The Problem:

Up until this year I've paid for everything out of pocket - including renting the spit to roast the pig. Man that gets expensive - but is totally worth it!

This summer I was preparing for another great year of Porklandia pig roast and was especially excited because I had just found the smoker of my dreams! All the catering events could be done and any sized animal would be smoked!!!

Then, two days before July 4th it was stolen. I believe by terrorists - cause who does that two days before the 4th?!?!?! 

So ... I'm looking to buy a new Smoker and take Porklandia to the next level.

To truly make this a community event, I need help growing it.  That's where you come in.  

Want to make Porklandia the "can't miss" event of the summer?
Want to help get Porklandia Catering off the ground?

If you love pork, contribute.

If you love food, contribute .

If you like good people, contribute.

If you love new experiences, contribute.

If you like to dance funny, contribute.

If you want a great summer, contribute.

If you want dreams to come true, contribute.

If you like to contribute, um, contribute. 

If you don’t have money to contribute, share.

If you do have money to contribute, share!


Wanna little sumpin’ sumpin’ in return?

Take a look at your Perks here!

Oh, and in case you’re interested.

Here’s what your hard earned money’s going toward-->(the Smoker of my dreams)

If we raise all of the funds that's what we’ll get … but if we can’t … then we’ll pay for the party and get ready next year!
