story:
Project zenpype
  Zenpype is a small gadget/grinder that transforms any plastic bottle to a water pipe also known as shisa. We wished for a product that would be discreet, easy to carry around and be ready to use at anytime without additional consumabeles, such as rolling papers or filters. Zenpype with integrated grinder is an "all in one" kit, the only one of its kind. Zenpype consists from thre parts. Top part is meant to apply on plastic or PVC bottle, the remaining two parts are grinder.


Use of zenpype is really easy and it is ready in only three steps.
You will need 1 zenpype and plastic bottle.

1) unscrew the zenpype apart,
2) insert the included silicone pipes into the associated holes
3) screw the top part on the neck of the PVC bottle)

Your zenpype is ready to use. The two remaining bottom parts consists a grinder, so grind your favorite melasa or herbs of your own choice, fill the zenpype and enjoy the water pipe or shisha experience.


Our first 3d model of the zenpype, and its components

After almost a year of planning, testing and developement, we have our prototype zenpype ready to be put in production and on the market. If our campagin succeeds and our goals are reached, we will be able to employ two additional skilled workers in an area with high unemployment statistics and we will donate 0,50$  per sold zenpypeto a local organisation that supports  medicinal cannabis research.

 We made a preproduction of few pieces of zenpypes, to iron out colour choices  and optimize the attributes. We made a market research, posted multiple pools, contact various people to check out if our product has a potential to suceed.  We got positive feed back and a lot of people helped us and supported us  to get to this point.


Logo was the next step we made to show we mean business. The zenpype logo made a local designer, the same one as already made our companys logo. We wanted clean and simple design, consistent with existing one to achieve company distinctiveness, but different enough to emphasise the specific feature of zenpype  - grinder. Logo is made from two circles, one is grider, that also reminiscent the tree rings and in the other circle we can see leaf. 

The same designer that made our logo, gave us the idea that zenpype packaging should be made out of wood, which is our main business (Zenles d.o.o., in Slovenian les=wood), so we can put even more of our own knowlege into the product.


Our campagin goals:

  • we raise 40 000 $

and we will be able to hire a CNC company and other subcontractors, to get first batch of zenpypes produced and send to end costumer around the globe, We would finance our stock, proffesional promotional video and other promo materials.

  • we raise 80 000$

we already have our company headquorters and a place to work in, so we would be able to invest in our own production of zenpype water pipes. We will buy a 5 axis CNC machine and start up our own production of zenpypes. We will hire one skilled worker to work on a project. We will be able to control the whole process and provide the highest product quality.

  • we raise 120 000$


We will start up our own production of zenpypes and production of wooden boxes for zenpypes. We will buy a CNC machine that will enable us to start up a production of zenpypes and the woodworking machines such as lathe and a laser engraver for production of wooden boxes that zenpypes will be packed in.  We will hire two skilled workers, one to work on CNC machine and the other one to work on woodworking machines.

Important! 

We know our obligations to sorounding area and problems that it has, so we decided that  we will hire people that are less employable and from regions that have high unemployment statistics. And because we belive in altruism we will donate 0,50$ for every zenpype sold over campaign on indiegogo, to a local organisation that supports  medicinal cannabis research.


Why zenpype water pipe?


Imagine you could take your water pipe everywhere with you, with zenpype you can do exactly that,

  • zenpype is a gadget that transforms any PVC bottle into a water pipe,
  • "all in one kit" with integrated grinder, ready to use at any time anywhere,
  • zenpype is made of aviation grade aluminium and it is highly durable,
  • small and discreet, only cca. 40x70mm,
  • powdercoated for high durability finish,
  • easy to clean


Why preorder on campaign on indiegogo?

We will make a special indiegogo suporter series of zenpypes that will be available only on campaign on Indiegogo

Our end costumer   price will be around 39.99 $, shipping not included (you get a top-notch waterpipe and a top-notch grinder)

buying them separatly will cost you substantionaly more. No other water pipe can be compered with zenpype. It is discreet and easily portable, ready to use at anytime.

Even if you cannot contribute financialy, you can help us get the word out, and share our zenpype project with your friends, who might be interested in a product like that.

First products will be put in production after we sell the first 1000 pieces, but not later than December 15th 2015. We will keep you updated how the project progresses.

How can you become our distributor, wisit our web page zenpype.com


Sincerely

"all in one kit" with integrated grinder, ready to use at any time anywhere,

zenpype is made of aviation grade aluminium and it is highly durable,
small and discreet, only cca. 40x70mm, 

powdercoated for high durability finish,
easy to clean




Why preorder on campaign on indiegogo?
We will make a special indiegogo suporter series of zenpypes that will be available only on campaign on Indiegogo
Our end costumer   price will be around 39.99 $, shipping not included (you get a top-notch waterpipe and a top-notch grinder) 
buying
 them separatly will cost you substantionaly more. No other water pipe can be 
compered with zenpype. It is discreet and easily portable, ready to use at anytime. Even if you cannot contribute financialy, you can help us get the word out, and share our zenpype project with your friends, who might be interested in a product like that.
First products will be put in production after we sell the first 1000 pieces, but not later than December 15th 2015. We will keep you updated how the project progresses.How can you become our distributor, wisit our web page zenpype.com
Sincerely

story:
About "Ritual"

Ritual is currently under construction at 774 Denman Street in Vancouver's vibrant West End. We are BC's first certified living wage restaurant. For more info on our Living Wage policy please visit http://www.livingwageforfamilies.ca

Ritual is also the first restaurant in Vancouver to enforce a no-tipping policy. If customers would like to leave a tip, all proceeds will be directly donated to "A Loving Spoonful." This amazing society provides free nutritious meals to those living with HIV/AIDS. To find more about "A Loving Spoonful" follow this link http://www.alovingspoonful.org

About Chef & Owner, Nevada Cope

Nevada grew up surrounded by farmers, produce, and a food-focused family in Abbotsford, BC. During weekends, she often visited Birchwood Dairies for ice cream  and harvested vegetables and berries from her mom's garden. Back then it wasn't "farm-to-table" it was simply normal practice to eat what was derived from the local land. These early memories evolved into a passion to produce wholesome food from real ingredients. Nevada's favourite things to make are those that take time and love: slow braised smoked meats, artisan breads, and pickled vegetables. 

Nevada's career has spanned ten years in the culinary industry, holding various positions in restaurants, hotels and catering. The past four years she's been Executive Chef at The Italian Cultural Centre (non-profit society) & founded a successful social enterprise called "The Bread Lab".

Nevada's life goal is well on it's way to becoming a reality. The past seven months she's been planning and building Ritual from the ground up. Everything is on the line to make Ritual a success. Nevada is energized, focused, and determined to spread comfort food and good vibes to the Vancouver restaurant scene. 

Our Menu

If you back Ritual's campaign we will send you the finalized menu and updates as we progress with construction. For now, you can get our vibe from these photos of Nevada's food. 

Funding & Your Help

By supporting this project, you are enabling Ritual to successfully finish construction and open it's doors in a better financial position. The first year of any new restaurant is a trying and stressful time. We want to maintain a positive financial position to meet our obligations. Permit delays have taken a toll on the timing of our opening. As the sole owner/operator, Nevada has directly felt the negative financial effects of these set backs.

You can help in other ways too, please share our Facebook page www.facebook.com/ritualvancouver on your social network to spread the word of Ritual's arrival.

story:
Past

My name is Jacqui and I'm the owner of Strawberry Blonde Bakery. After becoming vegan 12 years ago, I was disappointed by the lack of selection of vegan pastries available. Determined to stay vegan, but not give up on treats, I started baking myself. I absolutely loved converting traditional recipes into my own creations (especially the eating part!). I decided I wanted to turn this into a career and open my own vegan bakery to fill the void and share my delicious creations. But opening a business is no small feat and I knew that if I was going to do this, I was going to have to do it right. So I enrolled in George Brown College's Baking & Pastry Arts Management Program. Upon graduation I moved to Ottawa and started doing market stands. It was here that I really listened to all my customers and learned about the growing number of allergies and how often if a person had one allergy, they had multiple allergies. Being vegan for a number of years, I knew what it was like to go somewhere and not have a dessert option at all, or if there was, it was something sad looking or some old piece of fruit. I decided to eliminate gluten and nuts from my baking as well to ensure I could include as many people as possible on this journey of delicious, inclusive treats.

6 years ago I launched Strawberry Blonde Bakery, which was (still is and always will be) 100% vegan, gluten-free, nut & peanut free. The original focus was baking for wholesale clients such as health food stores and cafes. However, there was soon a growing demand from customers who tried our treats but wanted to purchase custom birthday cakes or sugar cookies from us. We decided to find a bigger kitchen where we could bake more, but also have a small space for customers to pick up their custom orders. That's when we found our current space on Grange Ave in the Wellington West neighbourhood of Ottawa. But, whoa! We did not expect how much demand there would be for the retail side of this type of bakery and in store clients soon far surpassed our wholesale clients. Since opening our doors, we've essentially been growing non-stop and have just been trying to play keep-up. We've now outgrown that space and need to expand. We're of course staying in that location - we're established there and love the heck out of that neighbourhood, so we've decided to open a 2nd location in Kanata where we can bake out of a 2nd kitchen, increasing our production levels, as well as have a few seats where people can sit down and enjoy a coffee or tea with their treat.

 

Present

When we set out to find a 2nd location we didn't realize how hard it was going to be to find a good space and how expensive it was going to be! We just barely managed to secure a bank loan to purchase equipment and to fit up the space, but the amount the bank is lending us is not nearly enough. The unit we found is a complete empty shell and needs to be built from nothing. This is an incredibly costly undertaking and we are $60,000 short from what the bank is lending us. We will not back away though! We are determined to build this kitchen to expand our menu, to expand our reach, and to create an even better space where people with alternative diets can enjoy what they're eating while feeling safe knowing that there is zero risk of cross-contamination. We know we can do it, but we need your help.

 

Future - Why back us?

Inclusivity is the name of the game for us. By contributing to our campaign you will be helping create a space where everyone can treat themselves and not feel left out. Regardless of the fact that we're vegan, gluten-free, and nut-free, we won the 2019 Top Choice Award for Best Bakery in Ottawa and the 2018 Ottawa Magazine Award for Best Bakery, and are just as yummy as traditional bakeries (if not more!). We also plan to expand our wholesale to reach more people with a wider variety of product. Customers have been telling us for years how much it would mean to them to be able to get a wider variety of our treats in more areas across Ontario and even Canada. With a bigger kitchen, we can start filling this void, expanding our reach, and helping even more people who wouldn't otherwise be able to enjoy treats like everyone else.

When we started Strawberry Blonde Bakery we had no idea the kind of impact we'd have on our customers and on Ottawa. But we realize now more than ever, how important it is to create inclusive, delicious treats and to grow this business to help even more people.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are currently $60,000 over budget on construction so we're asking everyone we know for help. The more money we can raise, the greater chance we have of success. Your money will go to building the proper vents for ovens, purchasing bakery equipment (believe me when I say it's EXPENSIVE. Specifically buying a large customer freezer to produce more "take & bake" goods, buying bigger more powerful mixers to produce more at a time, 2 DONUT FRYERS TO MAKE MORE DONUTS!), just generally creating a bigger kitchen to produce more treats to help reach more people and expand our line, as well as creating a sit down retail area.

In return for your contribution we have some pretty awesome perks for you! Like everything we do, they are creative and fun!

Believe us when we say that even if we don't reach our entire campaign goal, every penny raised is much needed and will be spent on creating a great space for customers and staff alike.

 

The Impact

The underlying philosophy behind Strawberry Blonde Bakery is to ensure that no person should have to compromise delicious food regardless of dietary choices or allergies. SBB’s products raise the bar for the quality of allergen-free baked goods and sets a new standard for the industry. Too often, those with restrictive or alternative diets feel left out, or end up with food that is subpar at best. By contributing to this campaign, you are helping to ensure that everyone is able to have a treat that looks and tastes as good, or even better, as everyone else’s. You'll be helping to spread love, joy, and just general yumminess to those people (often children!) who wouldn't otherwise have an option. Not to mention you're helping support a small, local business that gives back to the local community whenever possible! Last year alone we donated over $6000 to over 60 local charities such as CHEO, various animal sanctuaries, art festivals, etc. 

Our location in Wellington West has grown more than we ever could imagine. What started out as 2 people has now grown to a team of 25. But our Wellington West location is small. We need to expand to keep up with demand. We are confident that we can continue our success, but like all successes in life, they are never done alone. We're relying on our customers to help.

 

Risks & Challenges

Starting a business is always risky. Opening a 2nd location is even riskier because the cost is much greater. When we started Strawberry Blonde Bakery 6 years go, we did it on a $45,000 loan. We were lucky enough to find a space that had a ventilation hook up for the oven and the rest we built over time, buying another mixer, 2nd oven, more freezers as we needed them. For location #2 we couldn't find a space with the required venting (boy do we realize now how lucky we were the first time around!) and we're having to do everything from the ground up. We know what our production levels will be and now that we're an established brand, customers rightfully have expectations that this 2nd location will offer everything our 1st location does, and more. To do that we need all the equipment from day 1. The cost of fitting up the space and purchasing equipment alone for the 2nd location is $300,000. To take on that risk is enormous, which is why we're asking for help.

So what qualifies us to overcome these hurdles? The difference now this time around is that we have 6 years under our belt. 6 years of learning how to run a business. 6 years of trial and error and coming out successful. We have an incredibly hard working and dedicated staff. But also, we have a loyal customer base with strong community support. You love what we do and for that we are so grateful! We are an established business, with an ever-growing brand recognition and with your help, we can achieve even more! There is no doubt in our minds that once our 2nd location is up and running that we can create more product to help us pay our bills.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help!

  • Help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign. Share on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, wherever!
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Expanding MDT Woodworks


We want to take a moment to address why we are turning to you, our community, to help us expand and grow MDT Woodworks and to explain exactly how your support will be utilized. 

When we first committed to expanding our business in Fairfax and offering even more business opportunities, we planned to go about it the traditional way and apply for a small-business loan from a bank. But as we spoke to family and friends about our vision, their genuine enthusiasm for the project inspired us to start thinking about it differently.   We feel lucky to count amongst our friends hundreds of followers from all over the USA and especially in Northwest Missouri. We are expanding MDT Woodworks in order to continue to grow and strengthen these very relationships, and of course initiate countless more.

Regardless of how many forms we fill out, a bank doesn't know us, doesn't appreciate the connections that were made in our store and online on our social media pages, or really care whether our business thrives or not. But our community does. 

That's why we would rather invite you to invest in something you will utilize and that you believe in. MDT Woodworks will be a place that we will expand together and that will be ours, and we truly believe that it will be extraordinary because of it. 

What your support will be used for: 

To build out our retail area, expand into two additional rooms in our building and give other businesses the opportunity to enter our community.

New Private Event Space and DIY Workshop Area. We know how much you all love our DIY Workshops and holding private events with your family and friends. The new space will be LARGER (double in size) than our current area and we will be able to rent it every day of the week for your private events (bridal and baby showers, team building, birthday and anniversary parties, girls night and more!) In addition, when it is not being used for private events, it will be open during store hours for anyone to come paint and create! If you have ever wished that there was a way for you to gather in a space outside your home that felt comfortable, considered, warm (rather than sterile, corporate or at a bar/restaurant), then this is a project that is worth your time.

Expand our Product Offering/New Collections: We have several collections in development phase and with the funds you provide, we want to move those collections off the drawing board and into production. We also are looking at partnering with a couple of businesses to bring them into our store to offer our community more options to shop. 

Expand our building for additional businesses as well as work on acquiring another building on Main Street. 

So, come along with us. We would love for you to partner with us in our growth. 

 

We are trying to raise $50,000 to spring board a larger home decor line and help us pursue two new opportunities that will directly impact how far our products reach and the number of lives we can touch.

Here is how you can participate:

  1. DONATE any amount by clicking BACK IT. You do not have to purchase a Perk Package to donate. We greatly appreciate ALL amounts!
  2. Pick a MDT Perk Package. Review the 5 PERK PACKAGES and pick one that you would love to have and share. The just hit get this perk button and follow the prompts to complete the transaction.  NOTE: Partner Perk Packages will begin shipping March 31st, 2019.  
  3. Follow us on Facebook and Instagram. We'll share product promotions, stories about MDT and how we are impacting others and you will get to know us at MDT!
  4. Share our campaign on Social Media. 
  5. Pray for us! Pray that God will lead us provide us with a clear path  and that our efforts and products will continue to empower and inspire others, all for His Glory.

story:
The South and Blanc du Bois

Most people who live in the southern states know what a muscadine wine is.  This grape grows wild and thrives in the southern heat.  It makes a very good sweet wine that most southerners have learned to Love and enjoy.  But what about people who like a dry white or dry red wine?  They are not able to find a nice local winery that has what they are looking for.  However, several collages have started to develop these nice hybrid grapes that are able to withstand the southern heat.  The keep up of these grapes is a little bit more expensive than a muscadine grape, but well worth it.  We own a small family winery in West Point, GA and if you visit our winery looking for a muscadine wine you will not find it.  Instead, we make traditional varietal wines and some blended fruit wines.  But the juice we use has to come from California since these grapes will not grow here, with the exception of Blanc du Bois, Blueberries, and Apples.  We have 10 acres of land and our goal is to fill it up with this amazing American Hybrid Blanc du Bois.  We started our fist block in March of 2016 and have not finished it yet.  This particular grape will make anything from a sweet white to a dry white wine and will be our signature wine.   

We Need Your Help

We need just a little help getting finished with our first block of Blanc du Bois vineyard.  We had some help from a friend who is already growing the grapes on his property but for the most part we have tackled everything ourselves.  Once we are able to finish the vineyard we will be that much closer to a full harvest and making this new wine available in the South.  

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that times can be hard so just helping us get the word out about our winery and campaign is just as effective.  We will take all of the help we can get and greatly appreciate all you do.

Most people who live in the southern states know what a muscadine wine is.  This grape grows wild and thrives in the southern heat.  It makes a very good sweet wine that most southerners have learned to Love and enjoy.  But what about people who like a dry white or dry red wine?  They are not able to find a nice local winery that has what they are looking for.  However, several collages have started to develop these nice hybrid grapes that are able to withstand the southern heat.  The keep up of these grapes is a little bit more expensive than a muscadine grape, but well worth it.  We own a small family winery in West Point, GA and if you visit our winery looking for a muscadine wine you will not find it.  Instead, we make traditional varietal wines and some blended fruit wines.  But the juice we use has to come from California since these grapes will not grow here, with the exception of Blanc du Bois, Blueberries, and Apples.  We have 10 acres of land and our goal is to fill it up with this amazing American Hybrid Blanc du Bois.  We started our fist block in March of 2016 and have not finished it yet.  This particular grape will make anything from a sweet white to a dry white wine and will be our signature wine.   

We Need Your Help
We need just a little help getting finished with our first block of Blanc du Bois vineyard.  We had some help from a friend who is already growing the grapes on his property but for the most part we have tackled everything ourselves.  Once we are able to finish the vineyard we will be that much closer to a full harvest and making this new wine available in the South.  

Other Ways You Can Help
We understand that times can be hard so just helping us get the word out about our winery and campaign is just as effective.  We will take all of the help we can get and greatly appreciate all you do.

story:
Introduction:

This campaign is unlike any you have seen before. There are two parts to this campaign.

1)      This campaign is about getting the industrial wheels turning to provide a better wheelchair solution. The i5d wheelchair will improve the lives of millions. The i5d is only possible with the LRM platform technology.

2)      This campaign is also about providing the spark for you to be an entrepreneur. You are invited to start your own business by developing a product based on our patented LRM technology.

Success makes future successes possible. With your help we will make the i5d a success and make it easier for new LRM based products to follow. We look forward to seeing what you can do. We are committed to helping people with the i5d wheelchair and helping you to succeed with your own LRM application.

There is a lot going on here. It is ok to skip to the section that interests you the most. You can use the pictures as your guide

Background:

We all worked for large corporations. We decided we could do more outside of the corporate world, so we started our own design and build engineering company. We are Procubed and we solve problems with innovation and hard work.

                                                 (See: www.procubedllc.com ) Having our own business has been like digging a tunnel to escape from the corporate cube farm. To make our business a success and stay off the cube farm, we had to be a loyal team. We had to learn and improve, and support each other. We got smarter, and had a good time building a business. To make money, we contracted to design and build stuff for other corporations. We met lots of great people and they asked how we got to be more independent, only visiting the cube farm. I would tell people about our in-house project and tell them that when it is a big success we might be able to hire them, and help them escape the cube farm. For almost 10 years, that is the way it was. We would get engineering development jobs, interact with great people and work on our in-house project. Our project is a new kind of transmission with massive application potential. We call our transmission the LRM i.e. the Linear to Rotary Motion mechanism.

The LRM Trainer is fun to play with. The Trainer can power your experiments while you and your team learn how to apply the LRM to a product innovation that enriches lives. Trainers come with supporting documentation describing how the LRM works, including examples of various configurations. Pick an application, or dream up one of your own and develop a product.

We have applied the LRM to make a better manual wheelchair, to create a revolutionary mobility upgrade.

We call the LRM driven wheelchair, the i5d. The meaning behind the name is an extra dimension of mobility for the individual. The i5d wheelchair makes rim drive obsolete because more power gets to the wheels without hurting the rider. The most important feature of the LRM driven i5d wheelchair is the elimination of painful repetitive stress that robs people of healthy mobility. The i5d is an attention getting, first application of the LRM technology platform. We will use that attention to get the world excited about the i5d and the potential of other LRM product applications.

[ Note: Your LRM application can ride the i5d wave to significance.]

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

A) The input levers control everything through the LRMs, summing all motion into rotation in the direction selected. Right and Left sides work independently allowing for zero radius turns. B) The front casters have a shock absorbing suspension, by Frog Legs Inc. C) The drive wheels are smaller than standard because rim drive is not the primary mover. Smaller wheels take up less space, allow for better maneuverability and facilitates surface transfer. The wheels have quick disconnect hubs to aid in transport. D) Anti-Tip wheels have a quick-disconnect feature to aid in transport. E) Folding seat back for additional ease of transport.

We have struggled to find the time and money to develop the LRM and the i5d wheelchair. Along our journey we met and worked with outstanding people and organizations including:

1)Wisys Technology Foundation, 2)The University of Wisconsin System in particular UW-Parkside, 3)Wisconsin’s Business Plan Contest, 4)Biz-Starts Milwaukee, 5)Frog Legs in Iowa gave us evaluation casters and encouragement. 6)We were introduced to the staff of VA Hospitals through the 82nd Airborne Veterans Aide organization. 7)We met great people at the Veterans Administration including the rehabilitation team at Walter Reed. 8)We received reviews and design input from mobility experts like the staff at the Human Engineering and Research Lab in Pittsburgh PA. 9)We had discussions with other experts including the marketing team at Invacare. We learned what it would take to get Invacare or another DME to distribute the i5d wheelchair internationally.

Experts have validated the need for a better manual wheelchair. The experts we value the most are the riders, especially the veterans who volunteered to test our prototypes.

Current Status:

We applied the LRM to a manual wheelchair and achieved more power to the wheels, smaller foot print (closer to the space used by a standing person), improved surface transfers, and eliminated stress injury. With the LRM, we were able to do it all while keeping the weight below 35 pounds. That is great, but how do we get a regulated medical device to the market?

We need help to market the i5d. Our i5d wheelchair can't do any good if we can't market it. The Marketing efforts begin with proving the value of the i5d to a significant number of riders and end with a license agreement with Invacare or another Durable Medical Equipment provider specializing in personal mobility.

Entrepreneurs learn to use what is available to them to survive and ultimately thrive. It’s always a challenging puzzle to define an objective, identify the resources, communicate the mission, and implement a plan. For entrepreneurs, the goal is to generate value and a good experience for everyone involved.

i5d Marketing Logistics:

  • Wheelchairs including the i5d are regulated medical products. Selling a new medical device requires working with the Food and Drug Administration. Significant supporting data is required to sell a new product.
  • Veterans have demonstrated a need for a better wheelchair and a desire to help evaluate the i5d wheelchair.
  • The international wheelchair market is dominated by these DMEs (Durable Medical Equipment providers) Invacare and Sun-Rise Medical. The fastest way to help the most people is to get one of the big DMEs to distribute the i5d. A DME corporation will not risk market share on an unproven new wheelchair.
  • We can obtain the user data needed to convince the DMEs and the FDA, if we give i5ds away. A large number of i5d wheelchairs will provide the data and references needed to be convincing.
  • Can we find a way to use the LRM to generate the cash needed to build i5d wheelchairs, and get the wheelchairs to user volunteers to verify performance?

The LRM Drives the i5d Forward with Your Help

The best thing we have to sell to generate cash and drive the i5d introduction effort is access to the LRM technology. The proven and patented technology can be applied to many devices. The Trainer and supporting documentation makes understanding the LRM easy. We would love to see your product campaign here in a few months.

We all know about apps for your phone and all that software based stuff that has made so many people wealthy. Well, this is about mechanics and builders making apps. Programing skills are not required. The ability to build something will serve you better for this task.

We are inviting you to crank up your inner entrepreneur and use the patented LRM technology to create your own product. The LRM is very versatile and can be used to make all kinds of things perform better. We are inviting you to be an inventor, an entrepreneur and create your own business.

Before you market your product you will have to contact Wisys to secure a patent license. Contact: licensing@wisys.org to work out the contract. The good people at Wisys will make it work for you.

The LRM training program includes documentation, personal support and i5d progress updates.

Location Notes:

  • The Trainer is made in the same shop with the same tools that machine the parts for the i5d.
  • Our shop is about two stone throws from what was the AMC/Rambler/Nash auto factory.
  • We hope to help change what has become rusty and crusty into something green and clean.

How LRM Team Collaborations Work:

  • You build a team that has a desire to accomplish great things.
  • Your team buys a training program.
  • We help you learn about the LRM.
  • We use some of the proceeds from your LRM purchase to provide free i5d wheelchairs to disabled veterans and interested individuals.
  • We get people around the world talking about the i5d and the value of the LRM product applications.
  • You develop your own LRM application and patent license agreement with Wisys; licensing@wisys.org.
  • We support your efforts to market your LRM based product application.
  • Together we build an international business.
  • You will end up in a position to do more great things.

 

An animated view of the LRM Application Opportunity:

In the video you will see a flower that represents the international team of LRM Application Developers. Each petal on the flower represents an application group. Together we can achieve some beautiful results.

Questions and Answers:

Q) Why is Procubed making the LRM platform available for development?

A) Great question. There are a few reasons why we want other people involved. 1) We believe that great things are possible when talented people work together. 2) We want you to get a significant value for your support. 3) Our focus is the i5d wheelchair, we do not have time to work on all possible LRM applications. 4) We know that you can do more, you just need a way to get started. 5) We need help to deliver a better wheelchair to 200 million people.

Q) Do I own the LRM application that I develop?

A) Yes, you own what you develop. All LRM application developers will need to inform Wisys of the intent to market an LRM product. See: www.wisys.org App Developers and Wisys will negotiate a license agreement that provides Intellectual Property rights for each Developer. Our experience is that your fees will be less than 10% of your sales.

Q) Why do I have to pay a patent royalty on my sales?

A) Wisys took a risk and paid for the LRM patent. Royalty payments make it possible for Wisys to help others. The advantage to you is patent protection while eliminating the risk of paying without receiving. A patent can cost more than $100,000 and a return on that investment is not guaranteed.

Q) Will the i5d wheelchair be offered as a perk?

A) The i5d could be added as a stretch goal. Production and delivery would have to follow the units built for the market study. Procubed will cut the price of an i5d wheelchair to anyone who bought an LRM Trainer. The discount will be equal to the cost of the Trainer purchased. In addition, we will be adding an application section to our website for anyone wanting to get on the list for an evaluation i5d wheelchair.

Q) What does an i5d wheelchair cost?

A) The cost depends on how many are built. We can make them for less in larger quantities. The first two Gen-4 prototypes cost a crazy big number. Moving forward; 1 to 10 would be about $8000 each, 10 to 20 around $6000 each and in production the cost should be around $3500. We will make and donate as many i5d wheelchairs as possible depending on the economics of scale.

Q) Why does Procubed want to license the i5d wheelchair to a DME, instead of selling it directly?

A) The short answer is; speed and significance. A license agreement uses the big DMEs infrastructure to help more people, faster.

Q) Where can my LRM application team find help to complete a product?

A) Resources include the team network channeled through Procubed's website. In addition, in the USA there are Small Business Development offices connected to universities. See: www.sba.gov . Contact one of these offices and partner with faculty and students. Many universities have machine shops, including 3D printers. You will have fun and meet great people, if you give it a try.

 

Perks:

The LRM Trainers are available with or without a 12 Volt DC, 40 Watt Generator.

         

The LRM Training Kits are designed to be fun, useful and educational. They are designed to be taken apart and put back together. Hands on experience can be the best educational tool. The LRM can be built from whatever materials are available locally. Metal and plastic are not required. A creative team could work with bamboo and twine. You will be connected to Procubed and the international team of developers. Documentation will be sent to you by email, and a paper copy is shipped with each LRM Trainer. Your group will be added to the list of international developers. Developers benefits include; i5d project updates, networking and a discount on a future i5d purchase. If the i5d is added as a stretch Perk, application team members will get a price cut equal to the price they paid for a trainer.

Some of the LRM application categories are:

  • Personal Mobility
  • Battery Charging
  • Power from waves or tides
  • Wind Power
  • Sports
  • Down Riggers and Fishing Tackle
  • Human Powered cars and airplanes
  • Engines (See www.procubedllc.com for a growing list of applications.)

We made the training kits available in discounted groups to be donated to schools, veterans groups and clubs to help encourage a new generation of makers and maybe get them started in business.

Charging Notes:

  • The LRM driven generator will charge a 12 volt battery directly. A diode is shown being used in the video above. The diode is there to keep the electrons flowing to the battery not away from the battery.
  • Phone charging can be done through a DC to DC adapter connected to a battery charged by the LRM or connected directly to the LRM.

A converter for 12 Volt DC to 5 Volt DC, output through a usb connection.

[A blog will be added to the Procubed website for sharing how to tips.]

Logo Branded Perk Items

We think the Logos look good on products and apparel. We are machine designers but we had some fun trying to be artistic with the logos. Art and machine design have some similar characteristics. Simple but imaginative seems to be the common requirement of good design and art.

If you would like to support the i5d pain free wheelchair project without taking on an application project please consider buying one of the branded items we are offering. They are available with any of the logos that represent the i5d, powered by the LRM and developed by Procubed.

In appreciation of the service our veterans have given us we asked the Oscar Mike Foundation to make a special Tee Shirt with the Oscar Mike logo on the sleeve and the i5d logo on the front.

See: www.oscarmike.org/foundation/   Oscar Mike means "On the Move" and that is what the Oscar Mike Foundation does for Veterans. That is consistent with the mission of the i5d wheelchair.

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Southern Wisconsin Chapter of the of the 82nd Airborne works hard to help veterans, Check out their website: www.82ndswaac.com

If you buy one of these "military" shirts the Southern Wisconsin 82nd will get $5. All the shirts are available in sizes small to XXL.

Everybody can use more canvas totes. These tots are 13 1/2 X 15 inches tall.

 

Show your support with style and comfort with one of these first edition caps.

 

For those days when you have to dress better than a Tee-Shirt we offer the following.

These Sport Shirts would be great for your application development team.

 

Store one of these embroidered logo windbreakers in your car for those days when the weather catches you by surprise:

Stay warm and dry while you look good in one of these special jackets.

 

LRM Team and i5d Schedule

 

Closing Statement

Our biggest obstacle to overcome is having the time to focus on introducing the world to the i5d pain free wheelchair. Your support will help us focus on providing a product and a concept that matters. We know the world needs a better wheelchair that keeps people healthy and mobile. We know that many of you can be entrepreneurs with a little help. We think the LRM can be the platform to launch your new career as an entrepreneur. We’ll do our part and prove the value of the LRM technology with the i5d.

THANK YOU for joining us on this incredible journey! We look forward to telling you about the people we are helping with the i5d. We will be eager to read and share the stories of international LRM application teams, like yours.

Warmest regards,

Jim, Teresa, Chris, Anna and Kat

Everybody can use more canvas totes. These tots are 13 1/2 X 15 inches tall.

 
Show your support with style and comfort with one of these first edition caps.

 
For those days when you have to dress better than a Tee-Shirt we offer the following.

These Sport Shirts would be great for your application development team.
 
Store one of these embroidered logo windbreakers in your car for those days when the weather catches you by surprise:

Stay warm and dry while you look good in one of these special jackets.
 
LRM Team and i5d Schedule

 
Closing Statement
Our biggest obstacle to overcome is having the time to focus on introducing the world to the i5d pain free wheelchair. Your support will help us focus on providing a product and a concept that matters. We know the world needs a better wheelchair that keeps people healthy and mobile. We know that many of you can be entrepreneurs with a little help. We think the LRM can be the platform to launch your new career as an entrepreneur. We’ll do our part and prove the value of the LRM technology with the i5d.
THANK YOU for joining us on this incredible journey! We look forward to telling you about the people we are helping with the i5d. We will be eager to read and share the stories of international LRM application teams, like yours.
Warmest regards,
Jim, Teresa, Chris, Anna and Kat

story:
I'm Ryan Haerer, and Sun Fish Farm is my passion.

You may not know it, but the world needs 50 percent more food to feed the world, but have little land left on which to do it. 2017 may see the worst famine in human history - some projections suggest up to 20 million people may starve to death.

In the oceans, commercial overfishing and environmental damage are wreaking havoc and 90 percent of ocean fisheries are on the verge of collapse. They will not be able to produce fish at this rate for very much longer.

At home, many people can't afford the benefits of eating a diverse diet of delicious vegetables, because our food system focuses on large scale monocultures and crop specialization that limits choice, availability, and can hurt the environment in several ways.

I've designed a new greenhouse based system that uses the power of water to address all of these issues simultaneously. Once we build, Sun Fish Farm will build and share our design to make more land available for environmentally friendly year-round greenhouse farming of both food and fish. The system is fully sustainable; supports local farming, AND benefits the environment.

Background

The story begins 11 years ago in Baghdad, Iraq. In 2006, I was an enlisted combat medic and planning on becoming an officer in the Army.  My military career was short that year when I was injured when our humvee was blown apart by a roadside bomb. 

Losing one of the men under my responsibility was way more damaging than the physical injuries.  After some dark times, I vowed to find a way to help people in the US and abroad avoid pain and conflict. I returned home to go to college at Ohio State, studied international development, and learned about the interconnections between energy, food, water, and environmental security issues around the world while studying at Johns Hopkins. 

I'm asking for your support to launch Sun Fish Farm because we need to address all of the  health, environment, and security risks associated with growing enough food, replacing what we've already destroyed in the oceans, and protecting and rebuilding our ecosystems for our grandkids.  I believe we can grow an abundance of sustainable food, promote economic growth for farmers, and enhance environmental protection - at the same time.

Fish farms exist, but some come with environmental drawbacks. With your help, we can demonstrate how we can use clean energy to grow truly sustainable fish, even in places with limited water, with a process that simultaneously fights environmental damage for the long run and repairs the natural environment around us now.  We can also grow vegetables more productively, year round, by using the moderating warming and cooling effects of the fishwater in the greenhouses to maintain growing temperatures for farms - no matter the weather outsider - ice, heat wave, hail, or drought.  More healthy fish, more healthy food, safe from the weather, and beneficial for the environment.  

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need a minimum $18,000 in capital to install our initial geothermal energy system, photovoltaic panels, energy-efficient solar greenhouses, and renewable aquaculture waterways on our land near Shenandoah National Park.  We hope to raise way more, because we can put more greenhouses and more fish, vegetables and plants.  But more importantly, we can multiply our impact by testing several  modified prototypes of the renewable fishery system.  With additional funding, we can maximize the speed of perfecting the system.  The quicker we build, learn, and test, the quicker we can share the results with others.
  • Our perks are specifically designed to raise a lot of funding - the vegetables and fish are essentially pre-sales, at half price, and unbeatable values.  Everything else is great too.  We believe so much in funding this, and believe it will happen. But we also want to make sure people get rewarded, enjoy the product, and tell their friends.  We anticipate we will build relationships and future customers while we are at it!  Building demand for environmentally food will help us and other farmers bring more of it to so many communities where it doesn't exist yet.

Risks & Challenges

We know that building any new prototype takes some iterations. Its never perfect the first time.  But the good thing is that we know that everything we're using - the renewable energy, the aquaponic technology, the techniques for growing fish - have been proven for years by themselves.  We've just invented a way to combine them that we don't believe has been done before. That knowledge comes because I've been doing and learning how to successfully raise fish since I built my first aquaculture system 5 years ago.  It grew fish healthy fish, but over the years we saw how it could have been so much better on energy use! In my day job, I've continued to learn energy, water, and environmental technology while working in my professional career in environmental safety.  All this experience makes us firmly believe we have the knowledge, supporting team, and the Army mindset - never quit - that will guarantee we make this happen. When we encounter hurdles - we'll treat them as opportunities to improve the system.  The needs for climate change fighting, environmentally beneficial aquaculture and farming are too great not to make this work.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone can contribute financially, although every dollar really counts. If you feel more comfortable supporting another way, please do so.  Sharing with friends is critical for us!

  • Please email our campaign link to your friends and family, share it on Facebook, and let everyone know you support us. Any way you can get the word out and make some noise about Sun Fish Farm helps us reach our goal.  Lots of $10-20 donations go a very long way together.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools! The site makes it very easy to do!

Thank you very much for listening to our story and supporting Sun Fish Farm.

Respectfully,

Ryan Haerer

We understand that not everyone can contribute financially, although every dollar really counts. If you feel more comfortable supporting another way, please do so.  Sharing with friends is critical for us!

Please email our campaign link to your friends and family, share it on Facebook, and let everyone know you support us. Any way you can get the word out and make some noise about Sun Fish Farm helps us reach our goal.  Lots of $10-20 donations go a very long way together.
Use the Indiegogo share tools! The site makes it very easy to do!

Thank you very much for listening to our story and supporting Sun Fish Farm.Respectfully,Ryan Haerer

story:
I have travelled extensively and found that the most unique experiences have created the best memories.

Shorty's originated when I was 4 years old during a rather snowy December, where I was asked which treat I would like from the shop during a special day out. Of course, I asked for an ice-cream. As you can imagine, this was met with a 'WHAT....it's far too cold for ice cream!' to which I softly replied 'well, why do they sell it then?' My mother has retold this story on many occasions. The delight I feel from supplying ice cream to young members of my family during snowy wintery days always reminds me of the adventure I had. I would love to impart memories to others to create a story for another mum to tell.

As my funding options are limited I wanted to try alternative methods. Every penny of funding raised here will be going towards the equipment needed to create the products I will sell, even if I don't reach my entire goal.

The majority of aspects within Shorty's will be unique! From the ice cream flavours, other frozen products all the way to hot desserts and fresh juices. Not only offering tasty treats, also offering healthy options and gluten free products. With the foresight of Vegan friendly and Diabetic safe ice cream.

There will be something for everyone!

I am focused on supporting the local village in any way I can, especially through Shorty's. All items will be sourced from local suppliers, where able. I also wish to create a unique presence within the village to attract additional trade and not 'borrow' from my fellow businesses.

Any contribution made to Shorty's will be so appreciated and will massively help to fund a local start-up business dedicated to supporting the village and other local enterprises.

Shorty's so far has been funded solely by me, I am 'all in' with every penny I have. The challenge I am now facing is creating a unique experience and providing the best possible quality product with the equipment I hope to use.

If you are unable to contribute I would still like to say thank you, thank you for reading this and all of the support so far.

If you have a Facebook page or Instagram account, if you wouldn't mind giving Shorty's a like or a follow and maybe even a share or a #tag.

There are also 'share tools' that can be used through Indiegogo.

Thank you!

story:
We are Karani Leadership

Karani Leadership was born on February 1st, 2013 in Johannesburg, South Africa. Founded by  our Chief Mastermind, Nizenande Machi. Her passion for people development brought about the idea to build a sustainable business solution aimed at capacitating entrepreneurs and business professionals struggling to achieve their next. This is because they face poor levels of emotional health, high financial losses before long term gains, a lack of professional knowledge and skills to make it into the next level of management, a survivalist lived reality and a need for growth/customer acquisition. These struggles formed the foundation of Karani’s business model and directly integrated social impact into Karani Leadership’s mission and value proposition. 

Karani's purpose is to equip all African professionals with the knowledge required to lead transformatively, live freely and earn sustainable livelihoods. We’ve made it our mission to be Africa’s leading leadership development consultancy. Simultaneously, we envision a world where Africans recognize their agency and learning capacity; where Africans can productively apply their talents to transform their spheres of influence. This is a world with Relevant, Authentic, Reliable and Ethical (R.A.R.E.) leaders who build wealth systems that contribute to African economic freedom. 

Our crowdfunding campaign has been created for two primary reasons; both of which are centered around the previously mentioned mission and vision. First and foremost, Karani would like to put the finishing touches on its SDG Fellowship Program. This SDG Fellowship Program acts as a small business accelerator and will support a cohort of female, African entrepreneurs. The Fellowship seeks to hold the hands of these rising entrepreneurs through financial, psychosocial and academic support. This support will enable our entrepreneurs to turn their growing entrepreneurial endeavours into socially oriented, sustainable and profitable enterprises. 

Secondly, Karani has a too big, too small dilemma. We are receiving more demand for our services, yet our current infrastructure is largely underdeveloped to support this demand. Contributions toward the Enable Karani: Empower Social Enterprise crowdfunding campaign will enable Karani to scale and meet their level of demand as well as empower a cohort of female entrepreneurs. 

 

Why Karani?

Let's face it. Crowdfunding on IndieGoGo can be unpredictable and, ultimately, it's a leap of faith to contribute to any campaign. With that being said, here's what makes us so different. 

First and foremost, Karani is in the business of investing in people. We support African developing professionals and entrepreneurs to achieve their own financial and creative freedom. By helping our clients integrate their lived experiences into sustainable business models, we are shaping the next generation of leaders.

Karani’s success is dependent on the level of positive impact we create for developing, African business professionals and entrepreneurs. In short, when we succeed, our clients succeed and when our clients succeed, it means we’ve made a difference. No, we aren't selling the latest smart phone, developing a new pair of headphones or defining the next fashion trend like so many other IndieGoGo campaigns. However, we are offering something much more powerful. Karani is selling the empowerment of African entrepreneurs and business professionals to earn sustainable livelihoods.

What else makes us different? Karani is female founded, owned and operated. It has more than six years of experience under its belt, and Karani has a level 1 ranking on the South African Governments Broad-Based Black Economic Empowerment (BBBEE) scale. 

Finally, Karani is in the business of investing in people. This means that your contribution to our campaign is a contribution to support young people. While we hope to earn a fair compensation through our sustainable business model, we are really asking you to help us enable the next generation of African and female business leaders with the skills to succeed. After all, we are Karani Leadership, and we are in the business of Enabling Leaders. 

 

How You're Helping Us

We hope to reach 75 000 USD through your generous contributions, and here is the breakdown of how we intend to invest the crowdfunding contributions. 

Tech Enablement and IT Infrastructure

Karani is investing 45% of campaign funds towards Tech Enablement & IT Infrastructure. This includes upgrading Karani's website and mobile platforms to enable e-learning and portal access for members and alumni. Karani is also looking to develop mobile application programs that allow for greater, on-the-go access to educational material and support. Additionally, the improvement of technology helps to lay a strong foundation in which the SDG Fellowship Program will benefit from. Our cohort of female, African entrepreneurs will be well-equipped with contemporary business technology. 

SDG Fellowship Program

Karani is investing 30% of campaign funds directly towards the SDG Fellowship Program.  These funds will directly contribute to finalizing the well-rounded curriculum, establishing application criteria, creating partnerships for the Fellowship and directly investing in the cohort of female entrepreneurs. 

Institutional Strengthening 

Karani will invest the remaining 25% of campaign funds toward Institutional Strengthening. Institutional Strengthening consists of Karani's Human Capital resources and business process reengineering. This will simultaneously enable a more efficient operation through a more stable structural and resource capacity. 

 

How We're Helping You

In return for your contribution, we have several rewards and "thank you's". These rewards all include a virtual high five and social media shoutouts as well as various opportunities to earn naming rights, hang out with members of the Karani team and even get your very own Karani Notebook and Pen. Check out our perks over on the right hand side to see everything that Karani has to offer. 

 

Our Obstacles

Karani is facing a "too big, too small" dilemma. We are facing increasing demand for our services (which is great!), however, it’s becoming overwhelming for our limited infrastructure and institutional capacity. 

Another obstacle is Karani’s final campaign goal. We are in need of more than our $75,000 goal. Karani is seeking closer to ~$350,000 to fully fund and invest in our three primary categories (listed above). With that being said, our Enable Karani: Empower Social Enterprise campaign represents the perfect stepping stone to kick-start progress toward our long-term goals. 

Another obstacle to overcome is our geographic location. While many IndieGoGo crowdfunding campaigns have succeeded all across the world, most South African campaigns that are not solely philanthropic are overlooked. Karani Leadership, however, has a sustainable and proven business model while simultaneously generating positive social impact. Karani should be anything but overlooked!

Finally, you may be tempted to scroll as a contributor because of our socially oriented business plan. While financial feasibility alongside social impact can be difficult, Karani has derived the perfect formula that balances business sustainability and financial returns. Karani is modeling the business citizen we believe all companies should be; one that returns a profit to investors and makes the world a better place at the same time. 

 

Can't Contribute Money? Help Contribute Awareness!

We understand that tons of people will find Karani Leadership and be in love with the mission and purpose of the Enable Karani: Empower Social Enterprise crowdfunding campaign. Unfortunately, not all of our supporters will be able to contribute and that’s ok. If you can't contribute to our crowdfunding campaign you can still help Karani by telling your friends, posting about us on social media and simply spreading news about Karani to anyone who might be interested. With your support, there is nothing stopping us from reaching our goal.

story:
Good day,

My name is John Tan and I'm from Singapore, I am a freelance web designer for more than 5 years and had helped people to create many websites either for their personal or business use.

During my freelancer years, I've encountered many people who wish to have a website of their own but just feel that it is too expensive to ask a profession web development to do it, or it is too technical for them to do it themselves.

In fact, I had help a few to do it for free or for a nominal free after listening to their story.

For personal website: I've got to hear a few people who actually have interesting stories to share with the world, but later give up because they could not get a proper website or others may just share it using social media. But deep down there, I knew they wanted to have a website of their own.

For small business: There were a few students I've met who wanted to start a business of their own but could not afford the price tag for a professional web developer to do up their website. And many of them had dropped off their opportunity due to this reason. I had since helped a few student to create a website so for them to pursue their dreams.

I wish to introduce my free website platform to more people around the world and hereby wish to be funded on this project.

This funding will help me to:

  • continue to increase my marketing capability as I had used up most of my own pocket money in doing this.
  • purchase new website templates in the open market as also to support others web designers across the world.
  • upgrade to dedicated servers as my current shared server is hitting max and have noticed it being slowing down for my current users.

I wish to have a funding of $5000 USD in order for me to continue to run this project for the next 5 years.

This funds will be used mainly on marketing, buying of new templates and maintaining of servers.

I strongly believe that with this funding, I will have the ability let more people to know about this project so they will be able to have their own website for free.

My current running website is at www.blogfirsttalklater.com

In fact, I had help a few to do it for free or for a nominal free after listening to their story.
For personal website: I've got to hear a few people who actually have interesting stories to share with the world, but later give up because they could not get a proper website or others may just share it using social media. But deep down there, I knew they wanted to have a website of their own.
For small business: There were a few students I've met who wanted to start a business of their own but could not afford the price tag for a professional web developer to do up their website. And many of them had dropped off their opportunity due to this reason. I had since helped a few student to create a website so for them to pursue their dreams.
I wish to introduce my free website platform to more people around the world and hereby wish to be funded on this project.
This funding will help me to:

continue to increase my marketing capability as I had used up most of my own pocket money in doing this.
purchase new website templates in the open market as also to support others web designers across the world.
upgrade to dedicated servers as my current shared server is hitting max and have noticed it being slowing down for my current users.

I wish to have a funding of $5000 USD in order for me to continue to run this project for the next 5 years.
This funds will be used mainly on marketing, buying of new templates and maintaining of servers.
I strongly believe that with this funding, I will have the ability let more people to know about this project so they will be able to have their own website for free.
My current running website is at www.blogfirsttalklater.com

story:
AS FEATURED IN:

HUV is a new product we have been developing to create the future of how we display our most prized possessions.

HUV is the sneaker heads’ / women shoe collector’s most affordable, futuristic and coolest way to showcase your beautiful items and products. By using newly researched MAG LEV technology, we have been able to create a product that will spawn the next generation of shoe and product displays.

Why was HUV created?

At first, we were looking for a more interesting way to showcase a sneaker enthusiast’s exclusives in the comfort of his home. What we ended up with was an affordable product that can display numerous different items, providing 360-degree views of things people want to showcase. But we need your help; in order to help introduce this product to market we will need to hit minimums with our manufacturing and product development teams. We are looking for the public to help us determine whether this product is as promising as we believe it to be.

  • Levitation up to 12-15mm for the Standard Model
  • Levitation up to 20 mm for the HUV XL Model
  • Does not take up a lot of space and electricity
  • Usage Lifespan of 3-5 Years

  • Disclaimer – Please note, because HUV uses electronic magnets to produce levitation, we do not advise to place any metals or electronics on the magnetic platform. This can cause the magnet or the item to get hot and break the product. 

    Also people with pacemakers need to stay at least 10 feet away from the product

The HUV team is just two regular guys trying to change the world for a better place, visually, artistically, and aesthetically. Making your life more interesting one day at a time, one small improvement after another. We are a design and creative team based in NYC and California and we would love for the opportunity to bring many different new and interesting products to our community.

Where are We? What’s left?

  • Final prototypes are completed and tests have been finished and we are ready for mass production.
  • Everything works and fits right together. See the prototype photos below! We are so excited to bring our community the most advanced piece of mag lev technology available!

Why are we Crowdfunding?

We are a small company that is looking for support from the online community to have them decide whether this is a product that we should produce. We strongly believe that by crowdfunding, we will be able to reduce retailers and advertising costs so we can manufacture and ship this product directly to the people who really want it!

We believe that there is a large group of us on the web that are tired of seeing irrelevant ads and wants to directly reach out to our market specific product, shoe enthusiasts specifically. Crowdfunding helps use directly reach out to the people who would really find use in this product!

How do we compare to the Competition?

We are using the most up to date mag lev technology, whereas our competitors products are older quality and dated. We ensure our product reaches our quality control requirements before we allow for production and shipping to take place.

Other manufacturers do not have the right patent technology to sell and it may be dangerous to purchase.

Detailed Feature Information & Unit Dimensions

HUV Standard Base

  • Size: 171*171*17mm
  • Magnet size: 60x10mm
  • Max weight: 0-400g
HUV XL Base
  • Size: 280*280*40mm
  • Magnet size:80x13mm
  • Max weight: 0-500g
  • Please refer to spec sheet for Standard and XL models.

  • Disclaimer – Please note, because HUV uses electronic magnets to produce levitation, we do not advise to place any metals or electronics on the magnetic platform. This can cause the magnet or the item to get hot and break the product. 

    Also people with pacemakers need to stay at least 10 feet away from the product

Frequently Asked Questions:

Q: Where can HUV be shipped?
A: Worldwide! Please note that international buyers would need their own electrical adapter.
Q: How many HUV Units can you deliver?
A: As many as your heart and wallet desires ☺
Q: Why be an Early Adopter?
A: You will be the absolute FIRST to receive the HUV product
You will be a part of an awesome HUV community where we will be sharing and re-posting photos and videos of the awesome products you will be “HUV-ing!”
You will receive a significant price discount as an early adopter.

story:
WHO WE ARE

We are Woman’s Shelter, an autonomous, nonprofit Support Center for Abused Women founded in 2011  by a group of volunteers with vision and humanistic interest for stopping violence against women. We have our headquarters in Thessaloniki, the second largest city in Greece. Our organization is certified by the Ministry of Work, Social Insurance and Welfare of Greece for providing social care services. Our aim is to deal with the phenomenon of violence against women and to promote equality between men and women.

 

HOW DOES KATAFYGIO GYNAIKAS-WOMAN’S SHELTER HELP

We provide a complete support context to women who deal with abuse or have been victims of abuse in the past. We address to women above the age of 18 years old, without any discrimination, offering services of social and psychological support as well as legal counseling. Furthermore, we contribute to the provision of information  and public awareness regarding domestic violence and abuse against women in general.

 

WHAT DO WE WANT TO DO

We want to create a  Hotline for Abused Women in the framework of expanding the range of services which Woman’s Shelter offers and of increasing the number of people who benefit from these services. The members of the scientific team, which is constituted of social workers, psychologists and lawyers, will provide through the Hotline for Abused Women various kinds of services such as information and education for the matter of women’s abuse to anyone who is interested, crisis’ intervention and handling on a practical and a psychosocial level, reference to other mental health organizations whenever this is necessary and psychological counseling through telephone.

 

WHY IS THIS HOTLINE FOR ABUSED WOMEN SO IMPORTANT

Recent research findings, as well as our own empirical and statistical data, indicate an alarming number of Greek women who suffer from violence and abuse and an outbreak of the phenomenon of violence against women during the period of socioeconomic crisis in Greece. These findings combined with the lack of organizations which deal with the phenomenon of women’s abuse in many areas of Greece made us realize that the creation of a Hotline for Abused Women is a necessity.

 

WE NEED YOUR HELP TO MAKE THIS A SUCCESSFUL CAMPAIGN

LAST YEAR 568 women were able to receive our help!

THIS YEAR we expect to provide services to more than 1700 women WITH YOUR HELP!

story:
Omul Viitorului ( Man Of The Future ) Foundation, a non-profit organisation located in Romania, is deeply committed to develop an eco-village beyond imagination. Stay tuned for Anastasia Eco-Village !

            How can we assist this global rise in consciousness and shift to a more peaceful and harmonious way of life?
            Easy, we can start by being us...

  • Be the best you that you possibly can be !
  • Set an example !
  • Blaze a trail !
  • Do something no one else has done before !
  • Don't be afraid to be different !
  • This is what life is all about !

         ... and that is what we are doing !

              The Foundation represent the people that are aware that the direction the world seems to head for is not the one that they wish for.           

              We believe that the society’s change should start at the base. The base of a society is the family core and if this is healthy it will lead to a healthy society.

              We are therefore looking for a sustainable lifestyle, self-sufficient, healthy and in harmony with nature, together with other families who share the same values, way of life and want to offer their children a safe, clean and healthy environment. 

             There are probably as many concepts of ecovillages as there are people interested in this. We are sharing here our vision for an eco-village composed of family homesteads, because we truly believe they are a solution that can heal ourselves and our planet.

             Imagine building a community to provide affordable housing, an affordable way of living - a way to get out of the "Rat Race" and into a less stressful environment, a community whose activities contribute to Earth's resources instead of draining them.

           Anastasia Eco-village combine deep ecology with traditional, even conservative family values.  It nurture harmonious relationships with nature based on sustainable settlements consisting of individual family-owned homesteads.

                                                             Each domain settler (either a family or an individual ) in the village will become the steward of 1 hectare (2.5 acres) of land to nurture and beautify with reforestation, ponds, paths, flowers, gardens, and a home.  This land will be their domain, they sign the "Agreement" in exchange for an ongoing relationship (into perpetuity) with the land and the right to pass it on to their heirs.

             Why one hectare? Because this is a sufficient minimum amount of land sizeable enough to sustain the basic life-long and multi-generational needs of each family or domain settler.
             This is an amount of land that can be stewarded sustainably by the efforts of an individual or family, without becoming too difficult to manage and that can be managed without the need for heavy industrial agricultural machinery or harmful chemicals and fertilizers or pesticides and without the need for reliance on declining fossils fuels.

             Each plot is created with the specific goal of being a self sufficient area that can support all the basic human needs of the owner including life-long food production, shelter and water supply.

      


            Settlers will express themselves in the design of their homes. Each person can design their own home and off grid infrastructure system within one planet sustainable parameters. (cob, straw bale, adobe, wood, berm, earth bags, stone, passive solar, etc.).
            Each domain will have a living fence around its perimeter. This should be edible trees or shrubs.
            Homesteads are designed with the specific intent of surrounding the home by a supportive natural eco-system that will additionally support the domain owner by providing the cleaner air created by oxygen producing plant life, creation of forest land for the optional use of timber for seasonal home heating needs etc and a wide variety of other plant life with a focus on edible perennials as well as plants that can be grown for medicinal purposes.

            Plantings will encourage useful indigenous plants and open-pollinated (non-hybrid) vegetables, herbs, fruit trees, vines, etc. Genetically modified plants will not be allowed since their safety is questionable at best and they generally are not sustainable.

            Please donate in whatever way you preffer!                                                              You can choose from our amazing and unique perks or just make a donation of your choice !

            Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help.  You are one of them? Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign!

                            

 

“Perpetuum mobile” - handmade gadget controlled by IOS / Android smartphone. Incredible visual effects! A kinetic product made of wood, a mix bettween traditional handycraft and technology... two rotating-counters with 3 different speeds, slow, medium and fast. Motion modes are controlled by a software installed on  IOS / Android smartphone.

           
Woven summer boots - SUMMER PINK - 65% Cotton. 100 % handmade street boots, flexible rubber sole made in Italy.
Woven summer shoe - MINI SUMMER COLOUR - 65% Cotton,  100 % handmade street shoe, flexible rubber sole made in Italy.
For being precise, before you order, please measure your foot according to the picture!

Write something nice for a special person (or for yourself, because you are also special, remember?)! Beechwood  necklace with a nice cord, covered with natural varnish for protection. Custom modifications can be made on writing according to your desire. Chain length can be customized. See the picture above!

" CRISIS GLASS "  & " LOVERS CUP "   No more searching for the perfect gift for your loved ones and friends. Here is the ideal gift. Manufactured from high temperature resistance glass, hot liquids can be consumed such as tea, coffee, wine, juice, beer, cocktails.
This is a special gift that cannot be found in stores, a unique piece, manufactured by craftsmen glassmakers. The glass tube is made of glass on flame, temperature of 1600 degrees Celsius.

Harley Davidson truck      Harley Davidson bike       BMW car
All this pieces of art are made from old clock parts and metal components, are unique models imitating the pattern already well known!

Dark silver, cherry or gold metallic frame, size 29 cm × 21 cm.            An exclusivist gift!

Out of imagination? Clone yourself or someone else into a Handmade doll.  How offen have you been in a situation where you want to make a special gift to a person who has everything? Now you have something that will blow anyone mind! We need only the picture you want to be cloned.

Canvas Oil Painting - Wedding & Family portrets
Want to make an unforgettable surprise to your spouse? Or maybe you want to offer an unique gift for a couple celebrating their wedding day? Or a special memory to your family? However, just claim the perk and send us the picture you want to be painted.
We will do the canvas oil painting.
Size for Wedding portret - 70/150 cm
Size for Family portret - 50/70 cm

  • Buying a big land plot, minimum 50 hectares, near a village, in a clean area
  • Land cleaning and soil preparation for seeding trees
  • Preparing the drawings and design for the family homestead settlement
  • Taxes and fees
  • Building the roads
  • Dividing and distributing 1 hectare of land for each family
  • Planting for each property a living fence made from trees and bushes
  • Purchasing a huge variety of fruit trees ( minimum 300 trees for each family to plant themself)
  • Digging small lakes on the homesteads
  • Building a small wooden house on each property, on which families will be involved
  • Building a treatment center based on traditional methods for healing and rejuveration
  • Constructing about 10 small wooden houses for visitors accommodation 
  • Contingencies costs that will appear.
