story:
1. Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Hi, I'm Jen...

I'm a mum,grandma,live in a suburb of Manchester, work

every day fixing Oracle report problems..

and on 4th Nov I head out to Mumbai to do something completely unrelated to any of those things...


 


 


 

I'm going out to India to do some interesting work with , an old friend,a businessman. Vaseem Kader,Formerly a Bradford Business badshah, now based in Mumbai with his wife Kavita, where together they run A Nail Lunge, a Nail Academy and a string of franchises across India.

We met a few years back on another project and for a while I worked on the social media side for his then company, 1SW.
 

this is vaseem.... 

Former manager of the UK's largest department store, Bombay Stores,owner of 1SW Events wedding theme (Amir Khans wedding, Coronation Street Dev's wedding etc).and member of the Kader family who between them own several market leading Asian businesses, (and supply John  Lewis with fabric! ) Its safe to say that Mr Kader  is an experienced businessman.

Together we are going to do some 'Disruptive Business' (break the rules), using Agile business methodology, LEAN..some female empowerment and some recycling, as much as possible, using damaged garments, old stock, ends of rolls etc.

Before I forget, neither of us is taking any payment,expenses or profit form this project, not now or in the future. Vaseem has enough, I am on annual leave. If project grows, admin side to be funded by sponsors... like Charity Water..

I am going for three weeks,

First week - We are going to beg, steal and borrow equipment, fabric, haberdashery, scissors and pins..

Second week..we are going to run a one week workshop for a group of women, from the slums, women who really need some work. . and together we are going to make stuff...and talk about what those women want from their working life, their perfect 'business'. 

ALSO .. we will be showing the women how to 'dropship', that is purchase, pack and export . A VERY important aspect of this project is that the women must be able to learn business skills.If you really want to empower women you don;t just give them a job, you make them employable anywhere..in time there is a whole host of business education I would like to add., but for now, export basics so that within time the women can operate independently.

At the end of that week we are going to 'launch' online,posting pictures of our 'stuff'  across the Interwebs ..( Instagram /Twitter /Facebook /Pinterest./website...everywhere :) @desisisters

Third Week -SCRUM  we do what is called in Agile terminology , a 'scrum'. We get together and we go over the workshop, sales, what the women want, review skills set and personalities, talk about what works for everyone, and get a clearer idea of what we need going forward. 

What doesn't sell will come back with me..in fact I'm hoping i have stock to bring back with me... arranged couple of Christmas market stalls ..and a couple of 'home launch' parties..

Profit Share

A % of profit will go back to the women who took part in the workshop, as soon as possible after the sale, a % commission will be paid to anyone who sells, either directly or online. So that a whole chain of women benefit along the way.

The admin side will be funded by income from DesiSisters website..affiliates/sponsors.

Mumbai Slum ... home to soem of the women on our workshop/setting up business with us

Sounds Good ?...

If you're interested in supporting us, we're not looking for great sums of money. We have sorted the venue, equipment,and are 'shopping' for materials in that first week. We have £100 in the pot for wages and again, first week there, will see how much more we can raise.,

I just thought I'd ask online first... a seamstress starting off in Mumbai earns around £5.00 GBP,, $10.00 USD  A DAY ... so I have pretty much got it covered for 4 women but would like more.a lot more...maybe treble that...and we need some money for materials too.

I'd like to treat them to nice food whilst they are there,... and Vaseem has suggested that they could help out the models in the Training School by having their nails done if they wish.(free obv)

I want this to be an amazing experience for them...the women in the workshop

Workshop Itinerary

Day One - Intro, demo some of the product ideas, create some sort of skills register

Day Two - groups of women try out each idea..choose their product

Day Three/Four - we make stuff

Day Five - we tidy off, we take lots and lots of photos, we post online,  and have a nice little finish party.

Its going to be amazing....

The 'Stuff'

There's an endless list of things we could make, but leading at the moment are :

Dolls.. Abandoned Barbies restored to their former glory , and equipped with a new 'Desi' wardrobe

Khaani Bear and friends.. Soft Toys in Saris..and some..

Bollywood In A Box - collection of items,jewellery plus some, designed to boost the senses..glitter,sparkle..and poss incense

THE FUNKY CUSHION - the worlds first 'inspirational ' cushion .. designed to lift your spirits with its quirkiness every time you see it - FIRST PROTOTYPE BELOW..( made here in UK... )

Salwar/Pajama  Leisurewear ... of the unbelievably gorgeous variety..

There may also be covered notebooks, sari earrings and so on, it all depends on what we can get hold of, and we can easily make

Risks And Challenges

Its hot, its very different, I might curl up into a ball.. I;m British, its 90f , I might flake......unlikely but I might

I might get a tummy thing...it happens

Skills level ..we have no idea what skills the women already have, 

Language we have covered.

 

Where are the women coming from ?

Last couple of years Vaseem has run a 'charity drive' at Ramadan, collecting money from friends and business acquaintances , going down to the slums and delivering presents and gifts at Eid. That's where this idea started, when I messaged him on Facebook , August last year, and suggested that we start something like 'Punjammies'.We've been emailing back and forth since... this is the first chance I've had to get out there and give it a shot

The Impact

Even if we fail, if the project flounders, we've given other people ideas, we've challenged the status quo.....

HOWEVER ... If we succeed, and establish a social enterprise that grows the women, builds on their creativity, their intelligence, then, we raise the bar.. and we challenge the sweatshops...

and we could just , at least a little bit, genuinely support and empower, economically and personally, every woman involved in the organisation , both in India and here in UK.

If we allow the women to tell us what they want from work, working conditions, hours, childcare, emergency fund, we build a business around what women need … we 'facilitate' their success, 

It all sounds rather grand, a bit over the top, BUT  with Vaseem on board to fill in the business knowledge needed, the contacts, and support..PLUS  the stuff I've learnt from business (Agile Business Methods), Disruptive Business, the social media stuff I know..and Desisisters 'network' I think we just might be able to do it....

so about those wages.. any chance you could help ?

Buy me a few hours wages and I'll love you forever...buy a postcard and I'll love you just as much.. quite looking forward to spending an hour or two each day writing postcards home...

Perks...

You can just donate if you want to.... but... we are also offering little treats 

Postcard from Mumbai - £5 ..

I've limited this to 100 overall, 50 on this one because I don't want it to be meaningless. I reckon I can write 5 a day and mean it/enjoy it..whilst sat at a chai stall or in Costa or in my room late at night...looking over Mumbai :) (btw = one days wage)

A Little Thing From the Workshop and a Postcard £10 

£10 will get one woman two days on the workshop, just ./. I'll top up the difference (will pay slightly more than £2 a day, and free food, and Indiegogo charge us a fee, but still close enough) AND we will send you one of the items that we make that week, probably a little cushion, or some bangles or Bindis . Dolls and Bears probably count as 'bigger'. We will even let you choose, so long as you look really quickly when photos are released :) 

25 of these ....

£25 - A Bigger thing and a postcard 

As above but a bigger thing.. a bigger cushion, 

£25 will get one woman a week on the workshop easily,AND we will send you one of the items that we make that week, probably a bigger cushion, a posher cushion or a Dolls or a bear or a box  We will even let you choose, so long as you look really quickly when photos are released :) 

oh..and undying love and eternal gratitude

25 of these ....

£50 - A Bigger thing and a postcard 

As above but a bigger thing.. a bigger cushion, 

£50 will get FOUR woman a week on the workshop easily,AND we will send you one of the items that we make that week, probably a bigger cushion, a posher cushion or a Dolls or a bear or a box  We will even let you choose, so long as you look really quickly when photos are released :) 

oh..and undying love and eternal gratitude

25 of these ....

More than One thing, and a postcard ? £100

If, for some reason you wanted to support us this much, which would be amazing, you can have a small thing, more than one big thing, all our love forever..and I could probably manage another postcard :)

By the way, this would put four women onto the workshop .. for a week, or buy enough fabric for 300 cushions...

Other Ways You Can Help 

Sharing this bid will really help us get the word out, if you want to help but can't afford a perk that's fine, we've all been there...but you can really help by sharing

feel free to send yourself dizzy sharing... 

follow us anywhere online and get ready to back us up when we put our stuff online.. our women in Mumbai, help them get sold

Make sure people know what these women are doing and help them get all the support they need

THANK YOU .....  SHUKRIYA :)))

story:
Chi siamo
Riuscire ad arredare Casa P&G 2 e offrirla in locazione breve per nuovi ospiti sarebbe per noi un importante obiettivo anche per  far conoscere ancora di più Niscemi e il suo territorio. Siamo 3 giovani siciliani, Pietro, Giulia e ancora Pietro, cugini sparsi per il mondo ma che hanno sempre nel cuore le proprie radici: Casa P&G già esistente e Casa P&G 2 si trovano infatti in palazzo Gagliani, un palazzetto storico di fine '800 da sempre appartenuto alla famiglia di nostra nonna, Giulia. Niscemi per noi rappresenta le nostre origini e ci ricorda tante giornate d'infanzia passate insieme. Vogliamo offrire anche a voi ospiti la possibilità di vivere in questa atmosfera familiare e carica di ricordi!
Niscemi inoltre è in una posizione strategica per visitare la Sicilia Sud-Orientale, a pochi Km da Caltagirone, Piazza Armerina, Catania e le coste del ragusano. Immaginate quanti luoghi si riescono a visitare semplicemente soggiornando a Niscemi!

Cosa sono Casa P&G e Casa P&G 2
Abbiamo già messo a vostra disposizione da meno di un anno Casa P&G, un appartamento arredato e corredato destinato ad affitti brevi, e abbiamo visto che il soggiorno a Niscemi è stato molto gradito, per cui ci piacerebbe molto arredare anche Casa P&G 2 per offrire un'alternativa in più! Non ci fermiamo mai e stiamo già lavorando per voi.....Pietro infatti è all'opera in prima persona per ritinteggiare l'appartamento e fare piccole manutenzioni! Ma adesso tocca a voi! Potete partecipare al nostro sogno che è anche il vostro! I Niscemesi nel mondo sono tanti e sono anche generosi, lo abbiamo sperimentato in quest'anno passato insieme!
Tutto ciò che raccoglieremo, anche se non si raggiungerà la cifra totale necessaria, lo useremo per arredare e corredare a poco a poco Casa P&G 2, quindi sarete in ogni caso i protagonisti insieme a noi di questa nuova avventura! Se riusciremo a raggiungere la cifra obiettivo potremo acquistare l'arredo necessario per due camere da letto, la cucina e il soggiorno, gli elettrodomestici e magari anche qualche cosa in più!

Casa P&G e Casa P&G 2 fanno bene a Niscemi e alla Sicilia!
Siamo contenti che abbiate apprezzato la realizzazione di Casa P&G lo scorso anno: essa ha fatto sì che il nostro paese venisse conosciuto anche fuori, non solo tra noi siciliani! E credo che espandere questa conoscenza a nuovi ospiti sia un bene, non solo per noi, ma per tutto il paese e i suoi abitanti. Niscemi sta rinascendo! e lo fa anche attraverso queste iniziative. Abbiamo raggiunto degli obiettivi insieme tramite Casa P&G, possiamo farlo ancora!!

Solo vantaggi e nessun rischio!
Cosa si rischia? Nulla!!! prima o poi realizzeremo comunque Casa P&G 2 ma con il vostro aiuto possiamo farlo prima e più in fretta e magari passare insieme la prossima estate 2016 a Niscemi!! Vi sono solo vantaggi in questa iniziativa, siete in tanti e un piccolo contributo ciascuno può rendere possibile questo sogno! Non occorre molto e i più generosi saranno ricompensati!

Come aiutarci
Una piccola donazione l'uno non fa male a nessuno!!! Ma se proprio non potete offrirci un aiuto economico, potete comunque aiutarci presentandoci e diffondendo questa campagna di raccolta fondi tra i vostri amici!

Grazie amici perchè sappiamo che ci aiuterete a realizzare questo piccolo sogno!
Pietro&Giulia

story:
Help Browser the Lion Inspire Young Readers @ MPL!

The Library's mascot, Browser is in a serious need of a new look! Meeting Browser is a main attraction for kids and families at the library, and helps introduce them to a love of reading.

What we need & and what we'll give you!

The new costume for Browser will include a new fluffy mane and suit! We want to get Browser ready to reveal his new suit at his Birthday Party, and all donors will be invited to celebrate.

By donating to Browser's Makeover you can receive perks that can be selected on the right. These perks include:

  1. Milwaukee Public Library "Read" Poster by Schomer Lichtner
  2. Milwaukee Public Library Eco-Friendly Tote Bag
  3. A Bookworm Membership
  4. A Personalized Book Plate
  5. A Behind the Scenes Tour of Central Library

Milwaukee Public Library Eco-Friendly Totes

                                                          

Milwaukee Public Library Read Poster by Schomer Litchtner

                                  

The Impact

Only 5 out of 32 nine-year-olds in Milwaukee are reading at the appropriate 3rd grade reading level. You can help change this!

The Milwaukee Public Library is a leader in early literacy with programs such as "Ready to Read" and "The Super Reader Summer Reading Program," which helps more than 25,000 children avoid summer learning loss. Browser helps to emphasize a child's connection between reading and having fun at an early age to develop the skills needed to read.

Donating to Browser's makeover is for you if you like.....

  • helping your community
  • cultivating a love of reading in young readers
  • eliminating illiteracy in Milwaukee
  • creating new ways to attract young people to the library
  • making the library an even more fun and interactive experience 
.... Then the answer is yes!

Other Ways You can Help

Even if you can't donate, you can help us spread the word!

  • Share your favorite experiences with Browser and MPL on social media followed by the link to this page and #MPLbrowser.

You can help change this!

The Milwaukee Public Library is a leader in early literacy with programs such as "Ready to Read" and "The Super Reader Summer Reading Program," which helps more than 25,000 children avoid summer learning loss. Browser helps to emphasize a child's connection between reading and having fun at an early age to develop the skills needed to read.Donating to Browser's makeover is for you if you like.....
helping your community
cultivating a love of reading in young readers
eliminating illiteracy in Milwaukee
creating new ways to attract young people to the library
making the library an even more fun and interactive experience 
.... Then the answer is yes!Other Ways You can HelpEven if you can't donate, you can help us spread the word!Share your favorite experiences with Browser and MPL on social media followed by the link to this page and #MPLbrowser.

story:
Honey season is almost here, and beekeepers need something better...



...something better than fruit boxes and coolers and totes.  Honey is a precious commodity that requires heavy investments of time and money. Doesn't it deserve a protective mode of transport and storage?  Of course it does! 


oops....pardon me...excuse me...ouch...


How do you bring in your honey frames? How do you hold them until extraction? Heavy, dirty, bottomless supers? Grimy coolers? Tote boxes that let them stick together or fall over?  ...Really??  

Ick. A mess, and a loss of honey and sales...


We decided there had to be a better way.

If this is your first look at the Hive Butler, please take a few minutes to review our original campaign here.

Our original campaign on Indiegogo was launched in 2015 to fund the development of the die needed to manufacture the Hive Butler. We didn't get the total amount of money required to get our die produced, but we did get a lot of hits, interest, and positive feedback. The HIve Butler design was initially motivated by a desire for a clean, safe storage box for honey frames during harvest and extraction time.  But the Hive Butler doesn't stop there: it works for beekeepers EVERY season, not just during honey harvest. 

Wax frames are quite possibly the most valuable tool in beekeeping, as they serve as the foundation of the hive. However, its delicate structure and components are often damaged during transportation and storage, resulting in loss of materials, product, and profit. Because the Hive Butler holds frames upright and secure, your wax foundation, and drawn-out comb is safe and sound as your frames are moved, stacked, and stored.  Even safe from wax moths!


Watch that wax start to sag, any minute now...



And then there are those random moments when you have bees and queen cells, or even Queens themselves, that need moved from one bee yard to another...Quick! Get the bottom board, empty box, another cover and some ratchet straps!  (Who has all that sitting around ready to go??)  The Hive Butler (with a screen-top lid!) would be amazing for quick, short-term bees-on-the-frame transport. 
Have you ever stood on a very tall ladder, maybe even in the back of a truck, with a heavy box in one hand, a pole pruner in the other, trying to knock down a swarm? We have and we would've loved to have one lightweight box, with a snap-on screen top.  Slap on the lid and it is secure for transport, no ratchet strap required! The Hive Butler will be doing that work for you too!  

The Hive Butler will be working for you, even when you're not...ALL YEAR LONG.

But just what is it going to look like?  We have pursued multiple avenues for a full-sized prototype for the Hive Butler.  Customers want to see the product they are investing in.  All estimates for one full-size Hive Butler prototype were over $8000!  That amount of money would pay for the down payment of our die.  So we went to a friend who is an engineering student at Purdue University, and he got their 3D printing lab to produce the Hive Butler in 1/4 scale size, which you can see below!   


Don't panic!  This bright green color is simply our choice of 3D printer filament.  The actual Hive Butler will be clear, food-grade polypropolene or HDPE. This will allow you to see through the boxes, and know which size and how many frames are inside.  We want to be able to look out in the storage area and know which Hive Butlers have deeps, which are empty, etc.




We made the carrying edge extra-deep in consideration of men's hands in leather gloves to make them easy to carry. There will also be 1.5" clearance below the bottom of a deep frame to the bottom of the box.  So if you need to move frames with swarm cells that you are trying to preserve, you can do that. 




So what do the beekeepers think about the Hive Butler??

We first brought the Hive Butler to beekeepers in person, at the Indiana Bee School in February 2016 as vendors. Even though we only had drawings of our design and no prototype, we had very positive responses among the attendees, and received multiple requests for wholesale pricing, distributorship plans, and quite a few pre-production orders. Ron Bastin of Bastin Honey Bee Farm in Knightstown, Indiana, ordered 10, and he can't wait to sell the Hive Butler at his bee supply store!


Talking with beekeepers at this event made us realize that a physical prototype would be essential to the marketing and success of the Hive Butler. This led to the development of the 1/4 scale box shown above.  Despite its small size, we knew it would be beneficial to have something in-hand to show our prospective customers. So, we picked up our little "berry baskets" on the way to the Michigan State Beekeeper School. 

The more we handled them, the more we were impressed with the detail showing how they are designed not just to hold 10 frames, but to carry up to 100 lbs. of honey. T hose who visited our booth were not only impressed with the design, but were interested in buying the Hive Butler to bring in and store their own honey. Most of our customers pre-ordered multiple boxes at the event, some ordering up to ten!

This is Don Lamm from Michigan State Beekeepers Association.  Don gave us some terrific compliments at the end of their 2-day show. We were delighted with the responses we got there. And beekeepers were excited to see a solution to several problems that have plagued all of us for years!


Beekeepers new, and experienced, were very interested in the Hive Butler.  We sold about three times the amount in Michigan than we did at Indiana.  As a thank you to all those buyers, we promised to deliver their Hive Butlers this summer when they are ready!  We appreciate folks giving us their trust.


We were very excited to see beekeepers--young and old, new and veteran--"get" our product.  The comments of "This is what I have been looking for!" and "We've needed this for a long time!" were almost constant.


Our road of promoting the Hive Butler didn't end in Michigan.  Next up are events hosted by the Will County Beekeepers in Joliet, Illinois, and the West Virginia State Beekeepers.  We will also be going to some local clubs here in Indiana after that, including the Bedford Bee Intensive on April 22, 2016.

In the mean time, we still need the deposit money to produce our die ($11,000) by the end of April.  It will take about 8 weeks to build the tools (one for box, one for lid) and fine tune them. Once the machinery is calibrated and ready, production of the Hive Butler can begin! The sooner we can get that deposit in, the sooner we can deliver Hive Butlers to you!  We are HOPING to have them ready for delivery in July!

As beekeepers, we appreciate that our work is never done and that there is always a better way to do things. That's why we are continuing to develop the Hive Butler to make it a versatile and TRULY USEFUL tool for hardworking beekeepers everywhere. Our new lid design allows beekeepers to choose between having a screen-top lid or a solid lid, allowing you flexibility in how you use the Hive Butler. We also have plans in the works for future variations of our box, including one that is darker and opaque for use in swarm collection.  

The Hive Butler is going to help you, and us, with honey harvest, swarm collection, bee transport, frame storage, and apiary work.  We have designed it to work for you throughout all the seasons of the beekeeping year.  PLEASE help us get it to market more quickly, by showing your support, with even a small contribution to the cause.


We had over 3,000 views on our first campaign last December.  If each of those hits had given us $5,  our Hive Butler would be in production right now!  A $5 contribution is about the price of a Starbucks, but it is an important contribution to us!  Please support your fellow beekeepers!

We had a significant amount of interest from outside the United States last time. Please know, we are determined to get this product across the pond(s), in all directions.  At this time, we are not able to offer shipping outside the U.S., but are hoping to do so by the end of Summer 2016.  Please support the campaign and help us get to you sooner!

If you cannot send a contribution, we ask that you please forward our campaign on your social media platforms.  We are on Facebook ("The Hive Butler"), Twitter (@thehivebutler), and Instagram (@thehivebutler).  We are following a lot of wonderful beekeepers all around the globe and are excited to travel to many of those places once we have a finished product to bring along with us!

story:
We are Murmuration, Sydney’s first disability led, professional integrated performance company. Our goal is to provide inclusive opportunities for people with and without disability in the performing arts, and we need your help to achieve this. 

With creativity and diversity at the heart of our practice, our ‘Making’ stream supports professional arts practice, providing paid work for established and emerging artists with and without disability. Our ‘Learning’ stream, led by our professional artists, is open to everyone to participate in the performing arts through workshops, outreach and events.

Our learning program aims to give everyone, from babies to seniors, no matter what their ability, background or perspectives, access to quality experiences in the performing arts. Our learning program advocates inclusion, welcomes diversity, promotes integration, and creates connections.

We need to raise $30,000 to continue to run our learning program. So far the company’s establishment has been supported by local Council, State and Federal Government grants and some private donations, but with last year's budget cuts, we missed out on much needed funds to run this year's program.

20% of the Australian population identify with having a disability. That’s the combined population of Western Australia, South Australia, Tasmania & the Australian Capitol Territory. Despite this huge number, people with a disability are still excluded from a lot of mainstream opportunities. 

We believe it’s so important to start challenging and changing perceptions from birth, so that one day, inclusion won’t be anything extraordinary or exceptional, it will be the new “normal”. We know that inclusion is a bigger issue than just us and our local community, but we have to start somewhere. Our learning program is one step towards building a better future, and this is what our campaign is raising funds for.

Our aim is to:

·  Provide opportunities for more people to be included in the arts.

·  Set an example, and make inclusion the expectation, not something exceptional.

·  Give people with a disability more role models who identify with disability, setting an example of what is possible.

Your donations will pay for:

·  Staff to develop the programs – Planning and developing a range of programs to include a diverse range of peoples needs takes time and resources.

·  Teachers to teach the workshops - All our Teaching Artists are experienced and qualified to deliver high quality dance and theatre workshops, for a variety of ages and for people with and without disability. They aren’t easy to find, and they each bring a unique set of skills and talents to the mix.

·  Accessible venues – Addison Road Community Centre has very kindly given us access to Gumbramorra Hall, where all our workshops will be run, at a reduced rate for the year. However it still costs money we don't currently have.  Also, it’s accessibility needs to be upgraded, so if we were to raise funds above and beyond our goal, we would love to be able to contribute to this.

·  Access costs – Access unfortunately isn’t cheap, and doesn’t just mean having a wheelchair ramp. Access costs can also include engaging Auslan Interpreters for Deaf people, or extra teaching staff to support people with specific learning needs or high support needs.

·  Equipment – working with a diverse range of needs requires using different equipment to best engage peoples different senses and abilities.

·  Sponsoring participants in our workshops - Sponsoring participants not only provides the opportunity for people that may not be able to afford to participate in the workshops to attend, but also feeds back into the company, ensuring its continual growth and development.

Remember, every little bit counts. If we don’t raise all of the funds we need, we will still be able to use the funds we do raise to help cover the costs of running the workshops.

If we reach our campaign goal, Indiegogo will receive 5% of the money and another 1.5% will go towards bank transaction fees. This is why we are aiming higher with our campaign goal.  The more support we receive, the closer we can get to achieving our vision of inclusion being the new normal.  If we raise funds over and above our crowd-funding goal then we will continue to invest these donations into developing and expanding our learning program.


The research is clear. Engaging people in the arts significantly enriches lives and positively impacts on the lives of those living within diverse or marginalised communities. A disability-led integrated company increases community awareness and provides a way to break down social and cultural barriers for both our disabled artists and community participants alike.

By contributing to this campaign and helping us spread awareness about the importance of inclusion, you will not only have positively impacted the lives of our participants, but also help to pave the way for a more inclusive society. What is also unique about our Learning stream is that through our workshops we are able to identify promising artists and directly support their pathways to professional opportunities in the arts. So your support can make an impact long into the future.

Murmuration works closely with a collective of Australian and International artists with and without disability. The company has an outstanding track record in the development of the professionalisation of the arts and disability sector at state, national and international levels. If we were to list all the achievements and experience of our artists and staff, we’d be here for days, so if you’re interested in getting to know us all better, check out the Creative Team page on our website by clicking here.

Donations to Murmuration are received by their auspicing body, Australian Council for Dance, Ausdance NSW. Any donations during Murmuration’s ‘It's Possible’ campaign, ($10 minimum) are tax deductible. Donors must contribute unconditionally to Australian Council for Dance, Ausdance NSW to claim a tax deduction. All funds received through the ‘It's Possible’ campaign will be directly administered to Murmuration. You do not need to have a PayPal account to contribute to this campaign, you can contribute on a guest account.


Of course we would love you to donate, but we understand not everyone can afford to. If you have resources or skills you would like to contribute to Murmuration, please get in touch with us. And last, but definitely not least, you can help us achieve our goal, and spread the message #itspossible by sharing this campaign far and wide. Use Indiegogo's share tools and tell your friends about it!


"What you allow, is what will continue" - Unknown.

Inclusion is the new norm. It's possible.

story:
We are a craft distillery located in downtown Opelika, Alabama.  We made the 1st whiskey to be legally distilled in Alabama in 100 years. Along with our Single Malt Whiskey we make Gin, 3 kinds of Rum, Vodka and a Muscadine Brandy.

 

 

Our campaign will literally let us open our distillery to the community.  The area adjoining our building, called the Rail Yard, is an old cotton company loading dock. A local entrepreneur  is in the process of transforming the rail yard into a beautiful space to be enjoyed by the entire community.  As our distillery adjoins the rail yard we want to build a door to relaxing afternoons, music concerts and community gatherings.  A door that our customers and the community can utilize.

 

Approaching the door. 

 

 

A plan view of the Railyard.

Certainly the door will benefit our distillery, but it will also give the Rail Yard and the community that uses it another element of interest, providing just one other reason to come and enjoy the space.
 

What We Need & What You Get

Currently we need $16,000 to build the passage.

  • $5,000 for the commercial door.
  • $8,000 to cut and demo the door space in our old cotton warehouse wall.
  • $3,000 to install the door and build a landing into the rail yard.

  We have the following unique perks.

  • Become a distiller.  Come distill with us for a day.
  • Special distillery swag.
  • Become a Whiskey taster.
  • A party for your friends.

The Impact

Your kind contribution will allow us to open the distillery to the community and the world.  We have visitors from all over the country and other countries as well. Your generous contribution will allow us to provide an extra dose of good ole Southern hospitality sending them off with a smile and happy thoughts.

Risks & Challenges

Opening up the wall in a structure is a pretty simple procedure.  Opening up a wall in a 80 year old ex-cotton warehouse can be challenging.  With that is mind we have procured the help of a contractor that has lots of experience dealing with the ins and outs of working with historic structures.  

Other Ways You Can Help

We realize that some of you folks would like to help, but just don't have the ability at this moment.  So we would ask for your support and help us get the word out by sharing our campaign you all your friends both face to face and electronically.  In addition if you are so inclined use the Indiegogo share tools!
story_txt:
We are a craft distillery located in downtown Opelika, Alabama.  We made the 1st whiskey to be legally distilled in Alabama in 100 years. Along with our Single Malt Whiskey we make Gin, 3 kinds of Rum, Vodka and a Muscadine Brandy. 

 
Our campaign will literally let us open our distillery to the community.  The area adjoining our building, called the Rail Yard, is an old cotton company loading dock. A local entrepreneur  is in the process of transforming the rail yard into a beautiful space to be enjoyed by the entire community.  As our distillery adjoins the rail yard we want to build a door to relaxing afternoons, music concerts and community gatherings.  A door that our customers and the community can utilize. 
Approaching the door. 
 
 
A plan view of the Railyard.Certainly the door will benefit our distillery, but it will also give the Rail Yard and the community that uses it another element of interest, providing just one other reason to come and enjoy the space. What We Need & What You Get

Currently we need $16,000 to build the passage.

$5,000 for the commercial door.
$8,000 to cut and demo the door space in our old cotton warehouse wall.
$3,000 to install the door and build a landing into the rail yard.

  We have the following unique perks.

Become a distiller.  Come distill with us for a day.
Special distillery swag.
Become a Whiskey taster.
A party for your friends.

The Impact
Your kind contribution will allow us to open the distillery to the community and the world.  We have visitors from all over the country and other countries as well. Your generous contribution will allow us to provide an extra dose of good ole Southern hospitality sending them off with a smile and happy thoughts.
Risks & Challenges
Opening up the wall in a structure is a pretty simple procedure.  Opening up a wall in a 80 year old ex-cotton warehouse can be challenging.  With that is mind we have procured the help of a contractor that has lots of experience dealing with the ins and outs of working with historic structures.  

Other Ways You Can Help
We realize that some of you folks would like to help, but just don't have the ability at this moment.  So we would ask for your support and help us get the word out by sharing our campaign you all your friends both face to face and electronically.  In addition if you are so inclined use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Hello,

I am Hannah Briggs, a stay at home mother of two lovely children and a passionate cook and I am here to ask for your help to raise fund to start a small eatery business.  I am thrilled to go into this business because it offers unique challenges  which are financially rewarding  with plenty of room for growth.

I have a bachelors degree in Hospitality and Tourism management and a diploma in Catering and Hotel management.

I had worked for a few years in the industry before I decided to pause on my career and focus on raising a family.  I am a strong believer of using one's skills, Knowledge and passion to earn a living and if given the oportunity to start a business of my own, I can creat a job for myself and over a short period of time a few other people. 

It would be a small, almost fast food like business where wholesome flavourful meals are offered by working hand in hand with local farmers. This in turn will make our meals very affordable.

The eatery would  offer healthy  meals, soups and beverages. A calm, relaxed atmosphere where dinners can get tasty meals at affordable prices.

For the business to take off, I would need your support to raise $5000 which pay for shop rent, equipments, 2 months salary for a shop assistant, and other running expenses in the initial start up stage.

The eatery will operate a zero waste policy which means, at the end of the day's activities, any left over would be given to those in need in my community. That way, your contributions would not only support me but also provide warm meals for those around me who are in need.

Spread the word and support my campaign to enable me reach my goal. 


Yours faithfully,

Hannah Briggs

story:
Evercool Mobile Misting System 

         with Simplx's Patent Pending Technology

Evercool Mobile Misting System is Mobile (take it anywhere outside, hands free to carry), Self-Contained (doesn’t need an electrical outlet or water faucet and hose to operate) and is Rechargeable (simply plug in the Simplx charger and recharge it).  Our website is www.simplxllc.com



EVERCOOL FEATURES!

We have two versions of Evercool, a Canopy/Tent Version and an Umbrella Version. Our Canopy/Tent Version fits 10 x 10 and 12 x 12 canopies/tents and our Umbrella Version fits most size umbrellas. Both versions include the Evercool System, Anti-Mold Evercool Tubing and Misters (canopy version eight misters, umbrella version two misters), Attachments, Simplx Charger, and Evercool Carry Back Pack.



HOW EVERCOOL SYSTEM WORKS: SIMPLE, EASY AND COOL! 

1. Attach Evercool anti-mold tubing and misters, starting at the apex, to the inner skeleton, with the recloseable clips anti mold zip ties.  The take each tubing arm and connect it to the skeleton arms.

2.  Fill up a five gallon bucket of water (attaching a lid with a spout on it) or use the melted ice in your cooler as your water source.

3. Place the buck or cooler near the leg where the longer tubing needs to be wrapped around the leg, and place Evercool System on lid.

4.Insert water source tubing, in the spout of your lid or cooler, push the button, and experience the refreshing coolness!

5.  A full charge of Evercool used intermittently lasts about two to five hours.  You can plug in the Simplx Charger and run Evercool for six to eight hours. If you run Evercool continually, the charge lasts 45 minutes to an hour.

6.After you finish using Evercool, charge, and leave the Evercool tubing and misters on the skeleton when you take down the canopy, tent or umbrella.

7.  Use the Evercool Carry Backpack to carry your Evercool System, so you are hands free


EVERCOOL'S BENEFIT and POSITIVE IMPACT  

Evercool Mobile Misting System provides the cool relief you need when you are outside, in the heat, anytime and anywhere;  Evercool helps prevent overheating!

With continuous reports and eye witnesses of players overheating on football, baseball, lacrosse, soccer or any outdoor field, no matter the age, Evercool can be right on the field and assist in helping these players reduce their body temperature immediately and help prevent overheating.  As players overheat, so do parents, loved ones, and friends when watching their player or being just outside; Evercool is mobile/portable so you can carry it anywhere outside to help prevent overheating.


                        

WHO USES EVERCOOL?

Teams, families who watch their kids play outdoor sports, people who work outdoors for their profession, neighborhood block outdoor parties, outdoor birthday parties or play dates,  beach and lake goers, family reunions,  boaters, fisherman and hunters, tailgaters, and anyone who hosts, attends, and/or participates in outdoor activities or events!I   Evercool is your  own personal misting system!





EVERCOOL IS RECOMMENDED BY MANY; HERE ARE A FEW! 

Heat is tough in Florida, but when we installed Evercool and turned it on, what a relief!  Even our players loved it!  Highly Recommend!-----Todd

My son loved the Evercool I bought for him to use at my granddaughter's soccer games.  My granddaughter and her teammates couldn't wait to use it after their game.  My son and his wife take it everywhere, and they are recommending to their friends.-----Elaine

The Evercool worked perfectly when working with my horses----Tina.


What We Need and How Your Donations Will Help!

We need your help to grow our business and raise capital. We have outlined below how your donations will help us    There are Simplx Perks on the right side when you give!   We thank you for any donation you can give!

Inventory:  Our  demand is very high for Evercool with P.O.'s coming in, and ,in order for us to continue to  fulfill current and future orders, we need parts and materials.

Manufacturing:  We need to find a US manufacturer who will team with us to mass produce Evercool, Simplx Charger and the other accessories with our quality standards.

IP:  As we continue to produce and refine Evercool, our intellectual properties needs will continue with more patents,

Employment:  We need to hire more spectacular people.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't monetarily contribute, no problem; there are other ways you can help us.

  • Please share our Indiegogo Campaign on your social media
  • Please share our social media pages
  • Please give us reviews on our social media pages
  • Please tell people about Evercool and Simplx
  • Anyway you can spread the word, we greatly appreciate it!

story:
Για Ελληνικά, παρακαλούμε συνεχίστε την ανάγνωση μετά το τέλος του ξενόγλωσσου κειμένου



Let’s disclose the pretty secrets of Greece, and let us be the reason for more people to get a job!

Join us and let’s make together a "peaceful revolution" for the sake of Greece!!!

We want to make our country known internationally for the right reason this time, not for financial crisis...

1 euro is enough to help us!!



A jewel below the Acropolis (Athens)

Greek Soil's Choices Company's first store in Athens is under construction. Located in a magnificent building in Acropolis area, in which our customers will be able to explore the largest range of Quality Traditional Greek Products, all in the same place.

Help us to complete the construction of our store and employ some unemployed Greeks.



Why is this project Unique? 

The store itself is located into a historical building, built around 1935, and our plans are to transform it into a "time machine" which travels the visitor to another era. Every visit becomes a personal experience.

All the goods that we'll offer to our customers produced by small traditional businesses that have a story to tell. Also recommend that our store will be decorated in  such a manner that looks like as a small museum of Art and Culture.



Let's open this door together!!! Participate and make it happen!!


Tradition and Customs

We realized, the powerful glue that kept us together as people and as a nation all these years, and connects us with our ancestors, is just a word called "Tradition".

Our Tradition is directly linked to the tastes of each area. It includes special recipes, by products made with so much enthusiasm, as Grandma's spanakopita. Products with a unique story, which is important for us to share with you. 

Our goal is to luxuriate you in our Tradition, starting from the food, which is a basic need for everyone. However, by organizing feasts and other folklore events we'll bring all of us closer and then you will be able to experience what makes us different, what makes us Greeks.

Our wish is, all of you who have experienced our Traditions, to recall them from your memory and live them with us again. This will be the reason for you to have once more on your table something with the taste and quality of ' those old times'.




For the rest of you who were not lucky enough to get to know them, you're asked to delve into them; to become mystics.

We wish earnestly to bring to you, all these forgotten flavors, into an environment that is both intimate and unique, that you won't want to live without.

Your help is important, because our effort aims to broaden the narrow Greek borders and become the meeting point of all, where Hellenism exists.


Some words about our video's music

The song 'Misirlou' although considered Turkish, is song that started from Greece as rebetiko and became a worldwide success, mainly through  Quantin Tarantino's film PULP FICTION.  Knowing remixes on different musical styles (jazz, klezmer, Oriental, surf-rock, garage-rock, etc.). Misirlou means woman from Misiri (= Egypt Arabic Misr) and refers to Muslim Egypt, because the Christian of the area are called Aigyptiotissa. Is about the love among Christian with Muslims that was taboo at the time. First heard in Athens around 1927 by Michalis Patras Kompania, a Smyrnian musician, who came to the capital with the wave of refugees from the Asia minor catastrophe. Because of the subject, denied circa around 1930.

Here is performed by the excellent Venicio Capossela


What We Need & What You Get

Humanity, Culture, Civilization, Progress are the values for each person on Earth.

We need your participation and your faith, because small and big miracles happen all over the world when humanity is in solidarity.

So come on, make it happen!!! Any amount can make the difference!!

We need help from all of you to light a small flame in the very heart of Europe: Greece!!


Pledge €10 and get a postcard sent from Greece. Infrequent themes from Greek Culture Folklore

Pledge €20 and get a bottle of Extra Virgin Olive Oil from Ikaria Island Aegean Sea

Pledge €50 and get a gift box with Greek Herbs

Pledge €160 and get a basket with Greek Traditional Foods

We promise that all products will be 100% Greek. 



FAQs and Press/Media

Since this has became known and gone very well so far, I've been asked a lot of questions. I've tried to answer some more below:

Who are you?

I'm 48 years old and live in Athens, Greece. I worked as a consultant to small businesses. Also, I’ve been involved into the promotion and exports of Greek products.

Today me and my team, highly qualified partners, run out our creativity in order to  complete our project and show everywhere that Greece is not only the country of the crisis.

What will happen to the money?

We promise that all donations will be spent for the construction of our first store and to create jobs for the Greeks unemployed.

Do you think that you can reach the target?

We hope very much that the campaign will reach the target. We think it will be a victory for people power.  We truly believe it can be effective; remember it's a small amount per person we're looking for.  

What happens if you don’t reach the target?

This is a flexible funding. Your funds are not refunded if we don’t reach our goal, but you can earn your perk.   

Hopefully we’ll make it through! If we don't, we'll spend every single euro for charities.

Are the products real or symbolic?

It’s not symbolic - all products would be sourced from Greece, made in Greece and sent from Greece.


Alternative ways to help

We address everyone, wherever you are in the world with the certainty that you will respond in whatever amount you can.

Even if you cannot help us financially, don't mind! There are many other ways to support us. For example:

  • Share our campaign on social networks, by pressing the relevant buttons you find on this page. Send the link of this page to your friends and acquaintances, co-workers and even dare to talk to whoever you want, about us!
  •  Help us share our dream!
  • Be sure to reach those you believe that can help us!
  • Send e-mail to your friends, and your own people, with a link to our page
  • Press ' LIKE '  in our Facebook page, and write something related to our campaign. 
  • Discuss our idea! The best help is to spread live in your surroundings our effort!
  • Visit us!  Come to our page, and browse what we have prepared for you. 



Ας αποκαλύψουμε τις ομορφιές της Ελλάδας και ας γίνουμε ο λόγος για να βρει περισσότερος κόσμος δουλειά!!


Ελάτε να κάνουμε μαζί μια «ειρηνική επανάσταση» για το καλό της Ελλάδας!!!

Να την κάνουμε γνωστή διεθνώς, για το σωστό λόγο αυτή τη φορά, και όχι για την οικονομική κρίση…

Με 1€ μπορείς κι εσύ να βοηθήσεις!!


Ένα κόσμημα κάτω από την Ακρόπολη

Το πρώτο κατάστημα της Greek Soil's Choices στην Αθήνα είναι υπό κατασκευή. Βρίσκεται σε ένα υπέροχο κτίριο στην περιοχή της Ακρόπολης, στο οποίο οι πελάτες μας θα έχουν τη δυνατότητα να εξερευνήσουν, να γευτούν και να ψωνίσουν, κάνοντας τις επιλογές τους μέσα από τη μεγαλύτερη γκάμα Ελληνικών Παραδοσιακών Προϊόντων, όλα στο ίδια σημείο.

Βοηθήστε μας να ολοκληρώσουμε τις εργασίες και να δώσουμε δουλειά σε πολλές οικογένειες.



Γιατί αυτό το project είναι μοναδικό;

Το κατάστημα στεγάζεται σ' ένα ιστορικό κτίριο του 1935, το οποίο μετατρέπεται σε "χρονοκάψουλα" που ταξιδεύει τον επισκέπτη - πελάτη σε άλλη εποχή. Η επίσκεψή του σ' αυτό γίνεται βιωματική εμπειρία.

Όλα τα προϊόντα μας παράγονται από μικρές επιχειρήσεις κι έχουν να εξιστορήσουν το δικό τους μύθο. Επίσης, η διακόσμηση του καταστήματος θυμίζει ένα μικρό μουσείο Τέχνης και Πολιτισμού.


Ελληνική Παράδοση και Έθιμα

Συνειδητοποιήσαμε πως αυτό που μας κράτησε σαν λαό και σαν έθνος όλα αυτά τα χρόνια και μας συνδέει με τους προγόνους μας,  είναι μια λέξη "Παράδοση".

Η παράδοση συνδέεται άμεσα με τις γεύσεις του κάθε τόπου, με ιδιαίτερες συνταγές, με προϊόντα φτιαγμένα με τόσο μεράκι, όσο η σπανακόπιτα της γιαγιάς. Προϊόντα που το κάθε ένα του κρύβει μια ξεχωριστή ιστορία, που για εμάς είναι σημαντικό να τη μοιραστούμε μαζί σας.

Στόχος μας είναι αρχίζοντας από το φαγητό, που είναι βασική ανάγκη για τον καθένα μας, να γνωρίσουμε σε βάθος την Ελληνική παράδοση, να κάνουμε εκδηλώσεις που θα μας φέρουν πιο κοντά σε αυτό που μας κάνει διαφορετικούς, σε αυτό που μας κάνει Έλληνες.

Θέλουμε όσοι γνώρισαν τις παραδόσεις μας, να τις ανακαλέσουν από την μνήμη τους και να τις ζήσουν ξανά μαζί μας. Να βάλουν στο τραπέζι τους κάτι με τη γεύση και την ποιότητα 'από τα παλιά'.

Και όσοι δεν ήταν αρκετά τυχεροί να τις γνωρίσουν, να έρθουν και να μυηθούν σ' αυτές.

Προσπαθούμε να φέρουμε κοντά σας όλες αυτές τις ξεχασμένες από πολλούς γεύσεις, μέσα από ένα περιβάλλον που θα είναι τόσο οικείο και μοναδικό, που δεν θα θέλετε να το αποχωριστείτε.

Η βοήθειά σας είναι σημαντική, γιατί η προσπάθειά μας έχει ως στόχο να διευρύνει τα στενά σύνορα της Ελλάδας και να γίνει το σημείο συνάντησης όλων, όπου υπάρχει Ελληνισμός.



Λίγα λόγια για τη μουσική του βίντεο

Η Μισιρλού αν και θεωρείται τούρκικο, είναι τραγούδι που ξεκίνησε από την Ελλάδα ως ρεμπέτικο κι έγινε παγκόσμια επιτυχία, κυρίως μέσω της ταινίας PULP FICTION του Quantin Tarantino, γνωρίζοντας διασκευές σε διαφορετικά μουσικά στυλ (τζαζ, οριεντάλ, κλέζμερ, σερφ-ροκ, γκαράζ-ροκ κ.ά.). Μισιρλού σημαίνει γυναίκα από το Μισίρι (Μισρ=Αίγυπτος στα αραβικά) και αναφέρεται σε μουσουλμάνα της Αιγύπτου, καθότι τη χριστιανή της περιοχής την ονομάζουμε Αιγυπτιώτισσα. Ο έρωτας Χριστιανού με Μουσουλμάνα ήταν από τα ταμπού της εποχής. Πρώτο ακούστηκε στην Αθήνα γύρω στο 1927 από την κομπανία του Μιχάλη Πατρινού, ενός Σμυρνιού μουσικού, που ήρθε στην πρωτεύουσα με το κύμα των προσφύγων της Μικρασιατικής Καταστροφής. Λόγω του θέματός του, απαγορεύτηκε γύρω στο 1930.

Εδώ ακούγεται σε μια εκτέλεση από τον εξαιρετικό Venicio Capossela.



Ανταμοιβές

Ανθρωπιά, Παράδοση, Πολιτισμός, Πρόοδος είναι οι αξίες για κάθε άνθρωπο πάνω στη Γη.
Χρειαζόμαστε τη συμμετοχή και την πίστη όλων, επειδή μικρά και μεγάλα θαύματα συμβαίνουν καθημερινά στον κόσμο με την ανθρωπιά και την αλληλεγγύη.
Ελάτε!! Κάν' τε το να συμβεί!! Οποιοδήποτε ποσό μπορεί να κάνει τη διαφορά!!

Η βοήθεια όλων θα ανάψει μια μικρή φλόγα στην καρδιά της Ευρώπης: την Ελλάδα!!


Με εισφορά 10€ θα λάβετε μέσω ταχυδρομείου μία ευχαριστήρια κάρτα με απεικόνιση σπάνιων φωτογραφιών από την Ελληνική Παράδοση
Με εισφορά 20€ θα λάβετε ένα επώνυμο μπουκάλι Ελαιόλαδο, το οποίο παράγεται στην Ικαρία (Αιγαίο)
Με εισφορά 50€ θα λάβετε μία συσκευασία δώρου με αυθεντικά Ελληνικά βότανα
Με εισφορά 160€ θα λάβετε ένα καλάθι γεμάτο Ελληνικά Παραδοσιακά Προϊόντα

Σας υποσχόμαστε ότι όλα τα προϊόντα είναι 100% Ελληνικά



Συχνές Ερωτήσεις

Από τη στιγμή που αυτή η προσπάθεια έγινε γνωστή και πάει πολύ καλά μέχρι τώρα, έχω δεχθεί πολλές ερωτήσεις. Απαντώ σε κάποιες από αυτές παρακάτω:

Ποια είσαι?

Είμαι 48 ετών και ζω στην Αθήνα. Η εργασιακή μου εμπειρία είναι η υποστήριξη και συμβουλευτική μικρών επιχειρήσεων. Επίσης, έχω ασχοληθεί με την προβολή, προώθηση και τις εξαγωγές Ελληνικών προϊόντων.

Σήμερα, με μια ομάδα σπουδαίων συνεργατών, θέλουμε να ολοκληρώσουμε το επιχειρηματικό μας σχέδιο και να δείξουμε παντού ότι η Ελλάδα δεν είναι μόνο η χώρα της κρίσης.


Τι θα κάνετε τα χρήματα?

Όλες οι Δωρεές θα χρησιμοποιηθούν για την ολοκλήρωση της κατασκευής του πρώτου μας καταστήματος και για να δημιουργηθούν νέες θέσεις εργασίας για ανέργους στην Ελλάδα.


Νομίζετε ότι μπορείτε να πετύχετε το στόχο? 

Έχουμε την πεποίθηση ότι η καμπάνια θα επιτύχει το στόχο της. Θα είναι μια νίκη της ανθρώπινης δύναμης και αλληλεγγύης. Πιστεύουμε ειλικρινά ότι μπορεί να είναι αποτελεσματική, επειδή αυτό που ζητάμε είναι ένα πολύ μικρό ποσό από τον καθένα.


Τι θα συμβεί αν δεν πετύχετε το στόχο?  

Αυτό το πρόγραμμα είναι το flexible. Αυτό σημαίνει ότι τα χρήματα δεν θα επιστραφούν σε σας εάν δεν πετύχουμε το στόχο μας, αλλά θα έχετε κερδίσει την ανταμοιβή του δώρου σας.

Ελπίζουμε ότι θα τα καταφέρουμε! Εάν όχι, θα προσφέρουμε και το τελευταίο ευρώ σε φιλανθρωπικούς σκοπούς.


Τα προϊόντα είναι κανονικές συσκευασίες ή συμβολικά (δείγματα)?

Όλα τα προϊόντα είναι κανονικές συσκευασίες, προέρχονται από την Ελλάδα, φτιάχνονται στην Ελλάδα και στέλνονται σε σας από την Ελλάδα.



Άλλοι τρόποι για να βοηθήσετε

Απευθυνόμαστε σε όλους, όπου και εάν βρίσκεστε στον κόσμο, με την βεβαιότητα πως θα ανταποκριθείτε με όποιο ποσό μπορείτε.

Εάν πάλι, δεν μπορείτε να μας βοηθήσετε οικονομικά, μην στεναχωριέστε! Υπάρχουν πολλοί άλλοι τρόποι να μας ενισχύσετε. Για παράδειγμα:

• Κοινοποιείστε την καμπάνια μας στα κοινωνικά δίκτυα, πατώντας τα σχετικά κουμπάκια που βρίσκετε σε αυτή τη σελίδα. Στείλτε το link της σελίδας μας στους φίλους και στους γνωστούς σας, τους συναδέλφους σας και ακόμα τολμήστε να μιλήσετε σε όποιον θέλετε, σχετικά με εμάς!

• Φροντίστε ώστε να μας προσέξουν όσοι πιστεύετε πως μπορούν να μας βοηθήσουν!

• Στείλτε Ε-mail στους φίλους σας, και στους δικούς σας ανθρώπους, με link στην σελίδα μας στο indiegogo

• 'Πατήστε LIKE' στην σελίδα μας στο Facebook , και γράψτε κάτι σχετικό με την καμπάνια μας. 

• Συζητείστε την ιδέα μας!  Η καλύτερη βοήθεια είναι να διαδώσετε ζωντανά στον περίγυρό σας την προσπάθειά μας!

• Επισκεφθείτε μας!  Επισκεφθείτε τη σελίδα μας, και περιηγηθείτε στα όσα έχουμε ετοιμάσει για εσάς.
story_txt:
Για Ελληνικά, παρακαλούμε συνεχίστε την ανάγνωση μετά το τέλος του ξενόγλωσσου κειμένουLet’s disclose the pretty
secrets of Greece, and let us be the reason for more people to get a job!Join us and let’s make together a "peaceful revolution"
for the sake of Greece!!!
We want to make our country known internationally for
the right reason this time, not for financial crisis...
1 euro is enough to help us!!A jewel below the Acropolis (Athens)
Greek Soil's Choices Company's first store
in Athens is under construction. Located in a magnificent building in Acropolis
area, in which our customers will be able to explore the largest range of Quality Traditional Greek Products, all in the same place.Help us to complete the
construction of our store and employ some unemployed Greeks.
Why is this project Unique? The store itself is located
into a historical building, built around 1935, and our plans are to transform it into a "time
machine" which travels the visitor to another era. Every visit becomes a
personal experience.
All the goods that we'll offer to our customers produced by small traditional businesses that have a story to tell. Also recommend that our store will be decorated in  such a manner that looks like as a small museum of Art and Culture.
Let's open this door together!!! Participate and make it happen!!Tradition and CustomsWe realized, the powerful glue that kept us
together as people and as a nation all these years, and connects us with our ancestors, is just a
word called "Tradition".
Our Tradition is directly linked to the tastes of each
area. It includes special recipes, by products made with so much enthusiasm,
as Grandma's spanakopita. Products with a unique story, which is
important for us to share with you. Our goal is to luxuriate you in our Tradition, starting from the food, which is a basic need for everyone. However, by organizing feasts and other folklore events we'll bring all of us closer and then you will be able to experience what makes us different, what makes us
Greeks.
Our wish is, all of you who have experienced our Traditions, to
recall them from your memory and live them with us again. This will be the reason for you to have once more on your table
something with the taste and quality of ' those old times'.
For the rest of you who were not lucky enough to get
to know them, you're asked to delve into them; to become mystics.
We wish earnestly to bring to you, all these forgotten flavors,
into an environment that is both intimate and unique, that you won't want to live
without.
Your help is important, because our effort aims to
broaden the narrow Greek borders and become the meeting point of all, where
Hellenism exists.

Some words about our video's
music
The song 'Misirlou' although considered Turkish, is
song that started from Greece as rebetiko and became a worldwide success,
mainly through  Quantin Tarantino's film PULP FICTION.  Knowing
remixes on different musical styles (jazz, klezmer, Oriental, surf-rock,
garage-rock, etc.). Misirlou means woman from Misiri (= Egypt Arabic Misr) and
refers to Muslim Egypt, because the Christian of the area are called
Aigyptiotissa. Is about the love among Christian with Muslims that was taboo at
the time. First heard in Athens around 1927 by Michalis Patras Kompania, a
Smyrnian musician, who came to the capital with the wave of refugees from the
Asia minor catastrophe. Because of the subject, denied circa around 1930.
Here is performed by the excellent Venicio
Capossela

What We Need &
What You Get
Humanity, Culture, Civilization, Progress are the values for each person on Earth.We need your participation and your faith, because small and big miracles happen all over the world when humanity is in solidarity.So come on, make it happen!!! Any amount can make the difference!!
We need help from all of you to light a small flame in
the very heart of Europe: Greece!!
Pledge €10 and get a postcard sent from Greece. Infrequent themes from Greek Culture Folklore
Pledge €20 and get a bottle of Extra Virgin Olive Oil from Ikaria Island Aegean Sea 

Pledge €50 and get a gift box with Greek Herbs
Pledge €160 and get a basket with Greek
Traditional Foods
We promise that all products will be 100% Greek. 
FAQs and
Press/Media
Since this has became known and gone very
well so far, I've been asked a lot of questions. I've tried to answer some more
below:
Who are you?
I'm 48 years old and live in Athens, Greece. I worked
as a consultant to small businesses. Also, I’ve been
involved into the promotion and exports of Greek products.
Today me and my team, highly qualified partners, run out our creativity in order to  complete our project and show everywhere that Greece is not only
the country of the crisis.

What will happen to the money?
We promise that all donations will be spent for the construction of our first
store and to create jobs for the Greeks unemployed.
Do you think that you can
reach the target?
We hope very much that the campaign will reach the
target. We think it will be a victory for people power.  We truly believe it
can be effective; remember it's a small amount per person we're looking for.
 
What happens if you don’t reach the target?
This is a flexible funding. Your funds are not refunded if we don’t reach our goal, but you can earn your perk.   Hopefully we’ll make it through!
If we don't, we'll spend every single euro for charities.
Are the products real or
symbolic?
It’s not
symbolic - all products would be sourced from Greece, made in Greece and sent
from Greece.
Alternative ways to helpWe address everyone, wherever you are in the world with the certainty that you will respond in whatever amount you can.
Even if you cannot help us financially, don't mind!
There are many other ways to support us. For example:


Share our
     campaign on social networks, by pressing the relevant buttons you find on
     this page. Send the link of this page to your friends and acquaintances,
     co-workers and even dare to talk to whoever you want, about us!
 Help us share our dream!
Be sure to reach those you believe that can help
     us!

Send e-mail to your
     friends, and your own people, with a link to our page

Press ' LIKE '  in our
     Facebook page, and write something related to our campaign. 

Discuss our idea! The
     best help is to spread live in your surroundings our effort!

Visit us! 
     Come to our page, and browse what we have prepared for you. 


Ας αποκαλύψουμε τις ομορφιές της Ελλάδας και ας γίνουμε ο λόγος για να βρει
περισσότερος κόσμος δουλειά!!


Ελάτε να κάνουμε μαζί μια «ειρηνική επανάσταση» για το καλό της Ελλάδας!!!
Να
την κάνουμε γνωστή διεθνώς, για το σωστό λόγο αυτή τη φορά, και όχι για την
οικονομική κρίση…
Με
1€ μπορείς κι εσύ να βοηθήσεις!!

Ένα κόσμημα κάτω από την ΑκρόποληΤο πρώτο κατάστημα της Greek Soil's Choices στην Αθήνα είναι υπό κατασκευή. Βρίσκεται σε ένα υπέροχο κτίριο στην περιοχή της Ακρόπολης, στο οποίο οι πελάτες μας θα έχουν τη δυνατότητα να εξερευνήσουν, να γευτούν και να ψωνίσουν, κάνοντας τις επιλογές τους μέσα από τη μεγαλύτερη γκάμα Ελληνικών Παραδοσιακών Προϊόντων, όλα στο ίδια σημείο.
Βοηθήστε μας να ολοκληρώσουμε τις εργασίες και να δώσουμε δουλειά σε πολλές οικογένειες.

Γιατί αυτό το project είναι μοναδικό;Το κατάστημα στεγάζεται σ' ένα ιστορικό κτίριο του 1935, το οποίο μετατρέπεται σε
"χρονοκάψουλα" που ταξιδεύει τον επισκέπτη - πελάτη σε άλλη εποχή. Η επίσκεψή του σ' αυτό γίνεται βιωματική εμπειρία.
Όλα τα προϊόντα μας παράγονται από μικρές επιχειρήσεις κι έχουν να εξιστορήσουν το δικό τους μύθο. Επίσης, η διακόσμηση του καταστήματος θυμίζει ένα μικρό μουσείο Τέχνης και Πολιτισμού.

Ελληνική Παράδοση και ΈθιμαΣυνειδητοποιήσαμε πως αυτό που μας κράτησε σαν λαό και σαν έθνος όλα αυτά τα χρόνια και μας συνδέει με τους προγόνους μας,  είναι μια λέξη "Παράδοση".

Η παράδοση συνδέεται άμεσα με τις γεύσεις του κάθε τόπου, με ιδιαίτερες συνταγές, με προϊόντα φτιαγμένα με τόσο μεράκι, όσο η σπανακόπιτα της γιαγιάς. Προϊόντα που το κάθε ένα του κρύβει μια ξεχωριστή ιστορία, που για εμάς είναι σημαντικό να τη μοιραστούμε μαζί σας.
Στόχος μας είναι αρχίζοντας από το φαγητό, που είναι βασική ανάγκη για τον καθένα μας, να γνωρίσουμε σε βάθος την Ελληνική παράδοση, να κάνουμε εκδηλώσεις που θα μας φέρουν πιο κοντά σε αυτό που μας κάνει διαφορετικούς, σε αυτό που μας κάνει Έλληνες.
Θέλουμε όσοι γνώρισαν τις παραδόσεις μας, να τις ανακαλέσουν από την μνήμη τους και να τις ζήσουν ξανά μαζί μας. Να βάλουν στο τραπέζι τους κάτι με τη γεύση και την ποιότητα 'από τα παλιά'.
Και όσοι δεν ήταν αρκετά τυχεροί να τις γνωρίσουν, να έρθουν και να μυηθούν σ' αυτές.
Προσπαθούμε να φέρουμε κοντά σας όλες αυτές τις ξεχασμένες από πολλούς γεύσεις, μέσα από ένα περιβάλλον που θα είναι τόσο οικείο και μοναδικό, που δεν θα θέλετε να το αποχωριστείτε.
Η βοήθειά σας είναι σημαντική, γιατί η προσπάθειά μας έχει ως στόχο να διευρύνει τα στενά σύνορα της Ελλάδας και να γίνει το σημείο συνάντησης όλων, όπου υπάρχει Ελληνισμός.


Λίγα λόγια για τη μουσική του βίντεο
Η Μισιρλού αν και θεωρείται τούρκικο, είναι τραγούδι που ξεκίνησε από την Ελλάδα ως ρεμπέτικο κι έγινε παγκόσμια επιτυχία, κυρίως μέσω της ταινίας PULP FICTION του Quantin Tarantino, γνωρίζοντας διασκευές σε διαφορετικά μουσικά στυλ (τζαζ, οριεντάλ, κλέζμερ, σερφ-ροκ, γκαράζ-ροκ κ.ά.). Μισιρλού σημαίνει γυναίκα από το Μισίρι (Μισρ=Αίγυπτος στα αραβικά) και αναφέρεται σε μουσουλμάνα της Αιγύπτου, καθότι τη χριστιανή της περιοχής την ονομάζουμε Αιγυπτιώτισσα. Ο έρωτας Χριστιανού με Μουσουλμάνα ήταν από τα ταμπού της εποχής. Πρώτο ακούστηκε στην Αθήνα γύρω στο 1927 από την κομπανία του Μιχάλη Πατρινού, ενός Σμυρνιού μουσικού, που ήρθε στην πρωτεύουσα με το κύμα των προσφύγων της Μικρασιατικής Καταστροφής. Λόγω του θέματός του, απαγορεύτηκε γύρω στο 1930.
Εδώ ακούγεται σε μια εκτέλεση από τον εξαιρετικό Venicio Capossela.

ΑνταμοιβέςΑνθρωπιά, Παράδοση, Πολιτισμός, Πρόοδος είναι οι αξίες για κάθε άνθρωπο πάνω στη Γη.Χρειαζόμαστε τη συμμετοχή και την πίστη όλων, επειδή μικρά και μεγάλα θαύματα συμβαίνουν καθημερινά στον κόσμο με την ανθρωπιά και την αλληλεγγύη.Ελάτε!! Κάν' τε το να συμβεί!! Οποιοδήποτε ποσό μπορεί να κάνει τη διαφορά!!
Η βοήθεια όλων θα ανάψει μια μικρή φλόγα στην καρδιά της Ευρώπης: την
Ελλάδα!!

Με εισφορά 10€ θα λάβετε μέσω ταχυδρομείου μία ευχαριστήρια κάρτα με απεικόνιση σπάνιων φωτογραφιών από την Ελληνική Παράδοση
Με εισφορά 20€ θα λάβετε ένα επώνυμο μπουκάλι Ελαιόλαδο, το οποίο παράγεται στην Ικαρία (Αιγαίο)Με εισφορά 50€ θα λάβετε μία συσκευασία δώρου με αυθεντικά Ελληνικά βόταναΜε εισφορά 160€ θα λάβετε ένα καλάθι γεμάτο Ελληνικά Παραδοσιακά Προϊόντα
Σας υποσχόμαστε ότι όλα τα προϊόντα είναι 100% Ελληνικά

story:
My Story

Hello, my name is Mark Gallant. I own The Dogfather food trucks in Worcester, MA. I've been in business since January 2010. From my humble beginnings with one truck, I have grown to three trucks and a new division called Dogfather Vending, LLC. A few years ago, Worcester legislated food trucks almost out of business. Now that there is a strong possibility that the regulations will be changed/relaxed, it's time that food trucks had a base of operations. I'm building a food commissary in my hometown of Worcester. This will be a place where local food trucks, both existing and new, can come to prep and store food, clean and sanitize their trucks and group together for buying power. My main goal is to help aspiring food trucks to navigate the permit process and get started on their dream.

My Dreams

As you can see, I've already started the project. I need additional funds for walls and ceilings, permits, electrical, drains and shelving. My goal is to reach $12,500.00 so that I can make this a state of the art facility. Once completed, this will be the only one of it's kind in Central MA.  I already have a small group of local food trucks who have joined me, and have successfully launched a food truck event on the Worcester Common that draws crowds even in the winter. 

What Happens Now

Trucks will be able to drive in one door of the 2500 square foot facility, empty waste tanks, do dishes, prep food, restock, and drive right out a second door. I envision group Servsafe training, pooling our buying power, teaming up with local farms, and helping aspiring food truckers get going, thereby enhancing the food truck scene for Worcester.

The warehouse is in the canal district of Worcester, and I'm proud to be a part of the revitalization of this historic district for the past two years. Now it's time to take the next step.

Please join me in making this dream a reality.

Risks & Challenges

There are many permits and inspections that go along with a project like this. It's never been done in Worcester before that I know of. That's ok though...who opens a food truck in January in New England? Who starts a weekly food truck event in January in New England? I do. Over the years, I've become well versed with the permit process and the hurdles associated with starting something new. I've got a great crew of dedicated employees and volunteers who will be helping get this new venture going.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, please help us by spreading the word and sharing our goal. With your support, we will make this dream a reality...not just for us but for other food trucks in and around Worcester.

    What Happens Now Trucks will be able to drive in one door of the 2500 square foot facility, empty waste tanks, do dishes, prep food, restock, and drive right out a second door. I envision group Servsafe training, pooling our buying power, teaming up with local farms, and helping aspiring food truckers get going, thereby enhancing the food truck scene for Worcester.
The warehouse is in the canal district of Worcester, and I'm proud to be a part of the revitalization of this historic district for the past two years. Now it's time to take the next step.
Please join me in making this dream a reality.
    Risks & Challenges There are many permits and inspections that go along with a project like this. It's never been done in Worcester before that I know of. That's ok though...who opens a food truck in January in New England? Who starts a weekly food truck event in January in New England? I do. Over the years, I've become well versed with the permit process and the hurdles associated with starting something new. I've got a great crew of dedicated employees and volunteers who will be helping get this new venture going.
    Other Ways You Can Help If you can't contribute, please help us by spreading the word and sharing our goal. With your support, we will make this dream a reality...not just for us but for other food trucks in and around Worcester.

story:
KPOPJJANG is a brand new K-POP themed mini convention held in Virginia Beach, Virginia.

Our event is run by fans for fans! We promote K-POP/Hallyu and Korean culture through a variety of programming consisting of:

♥ Panels featuring fans or special guests on different topics

♥ K-cafe to try different korean dishes

♥ IDOLjjang to showcase vocal/dance talent

♥ Screening theatre for featured korean movies

♥ Vendors offering K-POP merchandise and fanart for sale

♥ Special performances

What are the donations for?

All funding donated to KPOPJJANG will be used to help run our event and allow us to continue making improvements on our venue, programming, and guests.

Donations will go towards:

  • Supplies needed for KPOPJJANG such as guides, badges, banners, etc.

  • Better and bigger prizes for our contests

  • More Special guests 

  • A BIGGER venue!

**Don't forget to select a perk to get your rewards!!**

We sincerely appreciate your support for KPOPJJANG. We strive to improve and make it our goal for an enjoyable event and to bring K-POP fans together.

Thank you so much.

- KPOPJJANG Staff

화이팅♥ 


faq:

When do we receive the kpopjjang t-shirt, poster, etc?

- Every perk will be received at the event.

What if you do not reach the goal?

- We will do our best to debut the event with the funds received.
