story:
Ethicjobs, BetterJobs, BetterLives.

 

[english translation below]

È con orgoglio che vi presentiamo Ethicjobs, la start up che vuole cambiare il mondo del lavoro partendo dal consumatore.

Passiamo a lavorare 14.600 giorni, 109.800 ore, per un totale del 15% della vita.

Ethicjobs ha deciso di creare una piattaforma che darà visibilità e certificherà le aziende che offriranno i migliori standard di qualità lavorativa. Il tutto con un processo bottom-up, nel quale saranno gli stessi dipendenti in forza all’azienda a certificare le proprie condizioni lavorative. Attraverso le valutazioni anonime e controllate dei dipendenti stessi, si delineerà un quadro delle migliori imprese.

Ethicjobs vuole sensibilizzare ed indirizzare l’utente finale verso un circuito di acquisti più etici e consapevoli, rendendolo consapevole di chi e cosa sta finanziando, aumentando di conseguenza i flussi per le realtà che riusciranno a dimostrare ed ottenere i maggiori standard di qualità del lavoro dipendente.

 

La storia

La nostra storia è semplice. Arriviamo da più parti d'Italia, ci incontriamo tutti a Rimini dove ci laureiamo e diventiamo grandi amici. Una volta laureati, invece di portare avanti sogni e ambizioni altrui offrendoci come dipendenti, decidiamo di provare a seguire una strada comune e realizzare un nostro sogno insieme.

Proviamo con qualche idea, ma falliamo. Ci riproviamo, ma di nuovo non va.

Un pochino iniziamo a cedere, chi trovi lavoro per mantenersi, chi non molla ma rallenta. Finché un giorno, ad un corso per start up, una grande donna dice:

 

“Ragazzi, seguite i vostri scopi nobili. Mettete in piedi qualcosa che segua i vostri ideali, perché sarà allora che avrete lo stimolo e la voglia di alzarvi la mattina, lavorare 18h e continuare fiduciosi, anche davanti alle difficoltà.”

 

Illuminati ci chiediamo come poter dar sfogo alla nostra voglia di cambiamento, ma nel frattempo continuiamo a lavorare per altri, per scopi esterni a noi.

In tutto questo continuiamo a vedere i nostri colleghi più o meno grandi di noi, ma meno fortunati o meno pronti a lottare, con i loro sogni ormai in un cassetto dimenticato, vivere male il posto di lavoro, e così anche la vita.

8-9-10h al giorno, poco tempo libero, poca scelta, poche soddisfazioni...

Iniziamo così a capire che il lavoro è un impegno importante, riempie gran parte della nostra giornata e da lui non si fugge, capiamo che solo vivendolo bene, solo se l'ambiente che si crea all'interno è sereno, le energie e il benessere non se ne vanno, e così quelle poche ore che ci restano al di fuori possono essere altrettanto serene e belle.

 

Scusate, ma allora perché non creare solo ambienti lavorativi sereni??

E' questo che iniziamo a chiederci una sera chiacchierando davanti a una birra.

 

(…..brainstorming

brainstorming

brainstorming

brainstorming.....

ETHICJOBS!

Un lampo nel cielo, Ethicjobs ci illumina come una cometa, come le parole della grande donna mesi e mesi indietro.

...ancora un po' di brainstorming...)

 

Ed ecco: Ethicjobs punta i riflettori su quelle aziende che danno valore al capitale umano, che mettono al centro la persona, offrendo un ambiente lavorativo qualitativamente alto, sano, sereno ed etico. Ethicjobs premierà queste aziende e rilascerà un certificato, e aiuterà invece le quelle che non hanno ancora raggiunto questi standard a migliorarsi.

Grazie al certificato d'eccellenza rilasciato da Ethicjobs e attraverso la piattaforma web, i consumatori sapranno quali aziende fanno vivere bene i propri dipendenti, quindi sapranno quali aziende scegliere. Saranno proprio i dipendenti ad attestare questo benessere.

 

Perché crediamo in Ethicjobs e perché pensiamo che dovreste farlo anche voi

Crediamo profondamente nella nostra idea perché pensiamo che l'atto di finanziare, quindi acquistare, che in economia si chiama voto con il portafoglio, sia davvero un voto, una scelta da fare in maniera consapevole.

É prendendoci cura gli uni degli altri, finanziando la felicità, che si cambiano le cose.

Noi vorremmo questo, ma è solo con il vostro aiuto che riusciremo a raggiungerlo.

 

THE IMPACT

Come abbiamo detto, gli standard della qualità del lavoro dipendente oggi sono bassi. Per nostra naturale predisposizione tendiamo ad adattarci, ma non sempre stringere i denti e sacrificare passioni, talenti, affetti, è la cosa giusta da fare.

Ethicjobs alzerà gli standard e renderà trasparente ai consumatori un passaggio della filiera storica del prodotto/servizio oggi poco in vista ma di estremo valore, quello della risorsa umana. Premierà con un certificato le aziende meritevoli, e guiderà nel percorso di crescita quelle non ancora al top.

 

PERCHE'DOVRESTE AIUTARCI?

Perché crediamo che voi abbiate il potere di finanziare la felicità, la trasparenza, il benessere, e che questo sia il modo per iniziare a farlo.

Non aiuterete solo noi e il nostro progetto, ma qualcosa di più grande, ci aiuterete a far partire il cambiamento.

 

COME VERRANNO UTILIZZATI I FINANZIAMENTI?

I finanziamenti saranno utilizzati per la creazione  della piattaforma web e per parte della campagna di sensibilizzazione e comunicazione che vogliamo mettere in atto.

Queste due cose saranno quelle più importanti perché creeranno l'impatto sui consumatori, rendendoli sensibili e consapevoli, educandoli. Oltre a questo, il vostro contributo aiuterà anche altre giovani start up (dai un'occhiata ai premi).

 

IL NOSTRO OBIETTIVO BASTERÁ?

No.

Per la campagna di sensibilizzazione/comunicazione che vogliamo fare e per quello che la piattaforma web diventerà dopo il primo anno, l'obiettivo che ci siamo posti è davvero basso e non copre i costi, ma è quello che ci sentiamo di chiedere a voi che vorremmo foste parte del progetto. Il resto lo mettiamo noi perché crediamo ciecamente nell'idea (e perché altrimenti quei lavoretti di cui parlavamo all'inizio a cosa son serviti?).

 

CI SONO RICOMPENSE PER CHI FINANZIA?

Certamente! Le ricompense per voi che ci aiuterete ci saranno, anche se sappiamo tutti che la vera ricompensa è quella di essere parte di qualcosa che conta.

YOU SCRATCH OUR BACK AND WE'LL SCARTCH YOURS.

Eccole:

  • € 10,00:
    • Un grazie di cuore a chi come noi, crede in un possibile cambiamento. Il nome del finanziatore comparirà nel sito tra le persone che hanno contribuito alla realizzazione di Ethicjobs.
  • € 20,00
    • Portachiavi antistress del team di Ethicjobs. Perché il lavoro sia meno stressante.
  • € 50,00: 
    • Penna USB con materiale inedito e originale di Ethicjobs.
    • Un pomeriggio con noi. Conosci il team di Ethicjobs e scopri la città che ospita la start-up.
  • € 100,00: 
    • Riceverete un libro che per il team di Ethicjobs è stato fonte di riflessione, cambiamento e speranza. Il libro sarà acquistato presso una piccola e magica libreria radicata nel cuore di Rimini, oltre che in quello dei cittadini: Libreria riminese. Nata nel 1931, non ha niente a che vedere con le grandi catene. Diventa magica grazie al luogo che la ospita, la vecchia pescheria, e grazie alle persone che la popolano.
    • Foodbox con ingredienti all'italiana: La foodbox comprende gli ingredienti per creare un'ottima pasta all'italiana: sugo della signora Lucia, anziana signora che vive in un minuscolo paesino del Molise e che mette amore in tutte le cose che fa, aglio, spaghetti.
    • Gadget firmati Ethicjobs: i gadget comprendono: borsa in cotone naturale, block notes e penna. Portachiavi antistress e penna USB con materiale inedito e originale della  tart-up.
  • € 250,00: 
    • Avrete un invito da noi di Ethicjobs per una cena per due persone, per conoscere chi ci ha aiutato e per chiacchierare solo di cose belle.
    • Abiti a Milano e sei stanco di mangiare in ufficio? Tre pranzi con SO-LUNCH, start-up milanese che offre al posto del solito panino in ufficio, un pranzo fatto con mani e cuore di persone che mettono a disposizione la loro casa e il loro tempo.
    • Abbonamento annuale online al magazine Vita.it
  • € 500,00: 
    • Sushi, pizza o piadina a casa? Riceverete un buono della cifra di 50€ da utilizzare sul sito di prenotazione e spedizione Bacchette&forchette.
    • Abbonamento annuale cartaceo al Magazine Vita
    • Foodbox Deluxe, affidati ai nostri palati e a quelli delle nostre nonne e scopri i sapori di casa nostra 
  • € 1.000,00: Percorso di valutazione Ethicjobs per piccole aziende.
  • € 2.000,00 Percorso di valutazione Ethicjobs per medie aziende.
  • € 5.000,00 Percorso di valutazione Ethicjobs per grandi aziende.

 

RISCHI E SFIDE

“Se non si rischiasse mai nella vita, Michelangelo avrebbe dipinto il pavimento della Cappella Sistina, e non la volta.”

I rischi ci sono, vogliamo essere sinceri.

Ci potrebbe essere il rischio di non riuscire a far capire ai consumatori che sono loro a fare la differenza con i loro acquisti e quindi con le loro scelte. Un altro rischio potrebbe riguardare le aziende perché, pur entrando in punta di piedi, quello che si crea tra dipendenti e titolari è sempre qualcosa di molto delicato e complesso, metterci le mani è chiaramente rischioso.

Non avendo paura però i rischi si trasformano in sfide: sensibilizzare i consumatori affinché diventino consumAttori e affinché scelgano che ambienti finanziare, facendo sì che nel momento della scelta il benessere e la felicità altrui abbiano un peso, questa sarà la sfida. Coinvolgere le aziende, senza la paura di essere giudicate, facendo capire che essere etici significa essere lungimiranti, anche questa sarà una sfida.

Cambiare davvero qualcosa nella vita dei dipendenti, questa sarà quella più grande.

Se riusciremo a superare queste sfide faremo un grande passo in avanti, e voi lo farete con noi.

 

COME AIUTARCI?

Sappiamo che alcune persone, pur volendo, semplicemente non possono aiutarci economicamente. Questo non è un problema, ci potete aiutare in altri modi:

 

  • Parlate di noi: parlate del nostro progetto con i vostri amici davanti a una birra, parlatene ai colleghi al lavoro, parlatene al vostro partner a casa. Diffondete l'idea e iniziate a pensarci. Pensate se siete felici al lavoro, o se rendete felice chi lavora per voi.
  • Spendete bene i vostri soldi:  Iniziate a chiedervi che ambienti state finanziando con i vostri acquisti, fate caso agli stati d'animo dei dipendenti che incontrate nel vostro ristorante preferito, al cinema, nei posti che scegliete. Partte dal vostro piccolo, come stiamo facendo noi. Siamo responsabili anche degli altri.
  • Seguiteci: Ovvio!
    • Seguite la nostra pagina facebook https://www.facebook.com/ethicjobs/
    • La nostra landing page attuale http://www.ethicjobs.com/
    • Condividete sui social la nostra campagna di Indiegogo.

 

Grazie a voi anche altre persone potrebbero scoprire Ethicjobs e aiutarci.

 

 

[english version]

Ethicjobs, BetterJobs, BetterLives.

 

It is our honor to present to you Ethicjobs, the start-up that aims to change the job market starting from the consumers.

Let’s start with an assumption: every human being on average is going to work about 14.600 days, 109.800 hours, about 15% of the time he/she has to live on this planet.

Ethicjobs will create an online platform to spotlight companies which offer the highest standards in terms of job quality. All starting from a bottom-up process in which the main actors will be directly the employees which will evaluate and certificate their working conditions. Thanks to controlled anonymous evaluations we will then be able to define a reliable framework of the best companies on the market. On the other hand, Ethicjobs aims to lead consumers towards ethical and aware purchases, to become  Prosumers (or Pro-Consumers), in order to reward top class companies with all the support they deserve both in terms of higher revenues and better branding.

 

History

Our story is simple. Coming from different places in Italy, our team members moved to Rimini (on the Adriatic coast) with one shared goal: to graduate. During college years our bonds got stronger as we shared much more than our study path, to the point to consider ourselves literally family. Once achieved our desired degree, instead of rushing straight to the job market to help others fulfill their dreams, we decided to make an attempt to create our own future, to make this world a better place to live, together.

We tried once, twice, but failed. We tried again, but still with no results. Surrender was just around the corner, someone started looking elsewhere, others started taking minor jobs. Until one day, at a start-up training lecture a great woman told us:

“Guys, follow your most noble dreams. Start something that follows your deepest beliefs, because only then you’ll get up every morning, work even eighteen hours and strive in front of any obstacle.”

Inspired by these words, we found ourselves asking each other again: “how could we unleash our desire to make this world a better place?”

Moreover we continued to see our friends and our colleagues, perhaps because they were less lucky or perhaps because they were less willing to fight, abandon their aspirations and dreams and accept their nine-to-five jobs; eight, nine or even ten hours a day, almost no free-time, few options, slim satisfaction.

We realized that our jobs are a crucial commitment, occupying most of our days constantly. We realized that only if we live our jobs positively we can keep the fire burning, only if our job places are serene and sheltered we can be the best version of ourselves every day.

So one night, as we were sipping a beer at a pub, the crucial problem appeared right in front of our eyes: Why can’t we create only positive and serene workplaces? Why can’t everyone wake up in the morning happy about the work day ahead of him/her?

 

(…..brainstorming

brainstorming

brainstorming

brainstorming…..

ETHICJOBS!

… still a little brainstorming…)

 

And finally: Ethicjobs is a spotlight for companies which seriously acknowledge the value of human capital, which put people first and consistently provide a healthy and ethical workplace. Ethicjobs will reward such companies with a certificate and will lend a (professional) hand to those companies which haven’t proved the same.

Thanks to Ethicjobs’ “Certificate of Excellence” consumers now can easily find out which companies treat their employees best, moreover which companies should be financed with his/her purchases.

 

Why we believe in Ethicjobs and why we think you should too.

We deeply believe in our idea since we reckon that all of us, as consumers, have one of the most powerful weapons which are our purchases. Every time we buy a good or service we are financing an employer, we are fueling his actions and behaviors, we are literally “voting” with our wallet.

It’s only by taking care of each other, by funding happiness that things can really change.

This is our will, and it can become reality with the support of all of you.

 

THE IMPACT

As already mentioned, working standards worldwide (and especially in Italy) are low. As humans we might even have a natural tendency to adapt, but is it really worth sacrificing passions, talents or even time with your loved ones?

Ethicjobs will raise the bar by providing higher levels of transparency about one underrated ring of the supply chain: human resources. Worthy companies will be rewarded and sponsored by us as a trustful and reliable employer for its workers, meanwhile companies with lower standards will have a chance to be followed by our experts to elevate their workplace to a better place to be.

 

WHY SHOULD YOU BACK US?

Because we believe that each and every one of you has the power to fund happiness, to provide transparency, to increase wealth; starting now.

By backing us you will give the spark to our engine, you will enable us to start working tomorrow for a shared goal.

 

HOW WILL YOU INVEST THE FUNDINGS FROM THIS CAMPAIGN?

All the money raised will be invested in our web portal and in sensible communication towards consumers. Both investments are strategically crucial in order to ensure that the most possible people get to know us and eventually support our project. Moreover, backing us will indirectly show support for other young start-up companies; check our perk list to know more.

 

IS YOUR GOAL SUFFICIENT?

No.

If we consider the whole investment for implementation and development of our online portal and communication plan for the first year the present goal is relatively low, but more than enough for us to consider all of you part of the project. We really believe in the potential of Ethicjobs, and we will be investing our own savings as well into this idea.

 

ARE THERE ANY PERKS?

Of course! There are perks of any shape and size, even though everyone knows that the true reward is to be part of something important you care about.

YOU SCRATCH OUR BACKS AND WE'LL SCRATCH YOURS.

Take a look on your right and find the perk that suits you best!

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

“If no one ever took risks, Michelangelo would have painted the Sistine floor.”               

We’ll be honest. The risk is real.

We might fail to make consumers understand that it is only them that can make the difference with their purchases and their choices or else we might fail in tackling the issues between employers and employees. But risks turn into challenges when you have the right instruments to deal with them. Consumers must realize that all of them can become Prosumers if only they are aware of the power that lays in their wallets. Companies must not fear to be judged, but should leverage on the positive impact that a better workplace would provide to its employees. In fact, without any doubt our biggest challenge is to really change something for all of them.

If we acknowledge these challenges, and work every day towards a shared goal, we can really make a change.

 

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

We understand that not everyone has the possibility to show their support financially. It isn’t a problem at all; there are many ways which you can give us a huge hand:

  • Spread the word: talk about us to your friends, family, colleagues and even your bosses. We must be united to make an impact.
  • Spend consciously: every time you open your wallet ask yourself really who you are financing, if it is the bar where you spend your free time, stores, agencies, anything!
  • Follow us: obviously!
    • Facebook Page: @Ethicjobs – www.facebook.com/ethicjobs/
    • Beta website: www.ethicjobs.com
    • Indiegogo campaign

 

Thank You.

Saranno proprio i dipendenti ad attestare questo benessere. Perché crediamo in Ethicjobs e perché pensiamo che dovreste farlo anche voiCrediamo profondamente nella nostra idea perché pensiamo che l'atto di finanziare, quindi acquistare, che in economia si chiama voto con il portafoglio, sia davvero un voto, una scelta da fare in maniera consapevole.É prendendoci cura gli uni degli altri, finanziando la felicità, che si cambiano le cose.Noi vorremmo questo, ma è solo con il vostro aiuto che riusciremo a raggiungerlo. THE IMPACTCome abbiamo detto, gli standard della qualità del lavoro dipendente oggi sono bassi. Per nostra naturale predisposizione tendiamo ad adattarci, ma non sempre stringere i denti e sacrificare passioni, talenti, affetti, è la cosa giusta da fare.Ethicjobs alzerà gli standard e renderà trasparente ai consumatori un passaggio della filiera storica del prodotto/servizio oggi poco in vista ma di estremo valore, quello della risorsa umana. Premierà con un certificato le aziende meritevoli, e guiderà nel percorso di crescita quelle non ancora al top. PERCHE'DOVRESTE AIUTARCI?Perché crediamo che voi abbiate il potere di finanziare la felicità, la trasparenza, il benessere, e che questo sia il modo per iniziare a farlo.Non aiuterete solo noi e il nostro progetto, ma qualcosa di più grande, ci aiuterete a far partire il cambiamento. COME VERRANNO UTILIZZATI I FINANZIAMENTI?I finanziamenti saranno utilizzati per la creazione  della piattaforma web e per parte della campagna di sensibilizzazione e comunicazione che vogliamo mettere in atto.Queste due cose saranno quelle più importanti perché creeranno l'impatto sui consumatori, rendendoli sensibili e consapevoli, educandoli. Oltre a questo, il vostro contributo aiuterà anche altre giovani start up (dai un'occhiata ai premi). IL NOSTRO OBIETTIVO BASTERÁ?No.Per la campagna di sensibilizzazione/comunicazione che vogliamo fare e per quello che la piattaforma web diventerà dopo il primo anno, l'obiettivo che ci siamo posti è davvero basso e non copre i costi, ma è quello che ci sentiamo di chiedere a voi che vorremmo foste parte del progetto. Il resto lo mettiamo noi perché crediamo ciecamente nell'idea (e perché altrimenti quei lavoretti di cui parlavamo all'inizio a cosa son serviti?). CI SONO RICOMPENSE PER CHI FINANZIA?Certamente! Le ricompense per voi che ci aiuterete ci saranno, anche se sappiamo tutti che la vera ricompensa è quella di essere parte di qualcosa che conta.YOU SCRATCH OUR BACK AND WE'LL SCARTCH YOURS.Eccole:
€ 10,00:Un grazie di cuore a chi come noi, crede in un possibile cambiamento. Il nome del finanziatore comparirà nel sito tra le persone che hanno contribuito alla realizzazione di Ethicjobs.

€ 20,00Portachiavi antistress del team di Ethicjobs. Perché il lavoro sia meno stressante.

€ 50,00: 
Penna USB con materiale inedito e originale di Ethicjobs.
Un pomeriggio con noi. Conosci il team di Ethicjobs e scopri la città che ospita la start-up.


€ 100,00: 
Riceverete un libro che per il team di Ethicjobs è stato fonte di riflessione, cambiamento e speranza. Il libro sarà acquistato presso una piccola e magica libreria radicata nel cuore di Rimini, oltre che in quello dei cittadini: Libreria riminese. Nata nel 1931, non ha niente a che vedere con le grandi catene. Diventa magica grazie al luogo che la ospita, la vecchia pescheria, e grazie alle persone che la popolano.
Foodbox con ingredienti all'italiana: La foodbox comprende gli ingredienti per creare un'ottima pasta all'italiana: sugo della signora Lucia, anziana signora che vive in un minuscolo paesino del Molise e che mette amore in tutte le cose che fa, aglio, spaghetti.
Gadget firmati Ethicjobs: i gadget comprendono: borsa in cotone naturale, block notes e penna. Portachiavi antistress e penna USB con materiale inedito e originale della  tart-up.


€ 250,00: 
Avrete un invito da noi di Ethicjobs per una cena per due persone, per conoscere chi ci ha aiutato e per chiacchierare solo di cose belle.
Abiti a Milano e sei stanco di mangiare in ufficio? Tre pranzi con SO-LUNCH, start-up milanese che offre al posto del solito panino in ufficio, un pranzo fatto con mani e cuore di persone che mettono a disposizione la loro casa e il loro tempo.
Abbonamento annuale online al magazine Vita.it


€ 500,00: 
Sushi, pizza o piadina a casa? Riceverete un buono della cifra di 50€ da utilizzare sul sito di prenotazione e spedizione Bacchette&forchette.
Abbonamento annuale cartaceo al Magazine Vita
Foodbox Deluxe, affidati ai nostri palati e a quelli delle nostre nonne e scopri i sapori di casa nostra 


€ 1.000,00: Percorso di valutazione Ethicjobs per piccole aziende.
€ 2.000,00 Percorso di valutazione Ethicjobs per medie aziende.
€ 5.000,00 Percorso di valutazione Ethicjobs per grandi aziende.
 RISCHI E SFIDE“Se non si rischiasse mai nella vita, Michelangelo avrebbe dipinto il pavimento della Cappella Sistina, e non la volta.”I rischi ci sono, vogliamo essere sinceri.Ci potrebbe essere il rischio di non riuscire a far capire ai consumatori che sono loro a fare la differenza con i loro acquisti e quindi con le loro scelte. Un altro rischio potrebbe riguardare le aziende perché, pur entrando in punta di piedi, quello che si crea tra dipendenti e titolari è sempre qualcosa di molto delicato e complesso, metterci le mani è chiaramente rischioso.Non avendo paura però i rischi si trasformano in sfide: sensibilizzare i consumatori affinché diventino consumAttori e affinché scelgano che ambienti finanziare, facendo sì che nel momento della scelta il benessere e la felicità altrui abbiano un peso, questa sarà la sfida. Coinvolgere le aziende, senza la paura di essere giudicate, facendo capire che essere etici significa essere lungimiranti, anche questa sarà una sfida.Cambiare davvero qualcosa nella vita dei dipendenti, questa sarà quella più grande.Se riusciremo a superare queste sfide faremo un grande passo in avanti, e voi lo farete con noi. COME AIUTARCI?Sappiamo che alcune persone, pur volendo, semplicemente non possono aiutarci economicamente. Questo non è un problema, ci potete aiutare in altri modi: 
Parlate di noi: parlate del nostro progetto con i vostri amici davanti a una birra, parlatene ai colleghi al lavoro, parlatene al vostro partner a casa. Diffondete l'idea e iniziate a pensarci. Pensate se siete felici al lavoro, o se rendete felice chi lavora per voi.
Spendete bene i vostri soldi:  Iniziate a chiedervi che ambienti state finanziando con i vostri acquisti, fate caso agli stati d'animo dei dipendenti che incontrate nel vostro ristorante preferito, al cinema, nei posti che scegliete. Partte dal vostro piccolo, come stiamo facendo noi. Siamo responsabili anche degli altri.
Seguiteci: Ovvio!
Seguite la nostra pagina facebook https://www.facebook.com/ethicjobs/

La nostra landing page attuale http://www.ethicjobs.com/

Condividete sui social la nostra campagna di Indiegogo.


 Grazie a voi anche altre persone potrebbero scoprire Ethicjobs e aiutarci.  [english version]Ethicjobs, BetterJobs, BetterLives. It is our honor to present to you Ethicjobs, the start-up that aims to change the job market starting from the consumers.Let’s start with an assumption: every human being on average is going to work about 14.600 days, 109.800 hours, about 15% of the time he/she has to live on this planet.Ethicjobs will create an online platform to spotlight companies which offer the highest standards in terms of job quality. All starting from a bottom-up process in which the main actors will be directly the employees which will evaluate and certificate their working conditions. Thanks to controlled anonymous evaluations we will then be able to define a reliable framework of the best companies on the market. On the other hand, Ethicjobs aims to lead consumers towards ethical and aware purchases, to become  Prosumers (or Pro-Consumers), in order to reward top class companies with all the support they deserve both in terms of higher revenues and better branding. HistoryOur story is simple. Coming from different places in Italy, our team members moved to Rimini (on the Adriatic coast) with one shared goal: to graduate. During college years our bonds got stronger as we shared much more than our study path, to the point to consider ourselves literally family. Once achieved our desired degree, instead of rushing straight to the job market to help others fulfill their dreams, we decided to make an attempt to create our own future, to make this world a better place to live, together.We tried once, twice, but failed. We tried again, but still with no results. Surrender was just around the corner, someone started looking elsewhere, others started taking minor jobs. Until one day, at a start-up training lecture a great woman told us:“Guys, follow your most noble dreams. Start something that follows your deepest beliefs, because only then you’ll get up every morning, work even eighteen hours and strive in front of any obstacle.”Inspired by these words, we found ourselves asking each other again: “how could we unleash our desire to make this world a better place?”Moreover we continued to see our friends and our colleagues, perhaps because they were less lucky or perhaps because they were less willing to fight, abandon their aspirations and dreams and accept their nine-to-five jobs; eight, nine or even ten hours a day, almost no free-time, few options, slim satisfaction.We realized that our jobs are a crucial commitment, occupying most of our days constantly. We realized that only if we live our jobs positively we can keep the fire burning, only if our job places are serene and sheltered we can be the best version of ourselves every day.So one night, as we were sipping a beer at a pub, the crucial problem appeared right in front of our eyes: Why can’t we create only positive and serene workplaces? Why can’t everyone wake up in the morning happy about the work day ahead of him/her? (…..brainstormingbrainstormingbrainstormingbrainstorming…..ETHICJOBS!… still a little brainstorming…) And finally: Ethicjobs is a spotlight for companies which seriously acknowledge the value of human capital, which put people first and consistently provide a healthy and ethical workplace. Ethicjobs will reward such companies with a certificate and will lend a (professional) hand to those companies which haven’t proved the same.Thanks to Ethicjobs’ “Certificate of Excellence” consumers now can easily find out which companies treat their employees best, moreover which companies should be financed with his/her purchases. Why we believe in Ethicjobs and why we think you should too.We deeply believe in our idea since we reckon that all of us, as consumers, have one of the most powerful weapons which are our purchases. Every time we buy a good or service we are financing an employer, we are fueling his actions and behaviors, we are literally “voting” with our wallet.It’s only by taking care of each other, by funding happiness that things can really change.This is our will, and it can become reality with the support of all of you. THE IMPACTAs already mentioned, working standards worldwide (and especially in Italy) are low. As humans we might even have a natural tendency to adapt, but is it really worth sacrificing passions, talents or even time with your loved ones?Ethicjobs will raise the bar by providing higher levels of transparency about one underrated ring of the supply chain: human resources. Worthy companies will be rewarded and sponsored by us as a trustful and reliable employer for its workers, meanwhile companies with lower standards will have a chance to be followed by our experts to elevate their workplace to a better place to be. WHY SHOULD YOU BACK US?Because we believe that each and every one of you has the power to fund happiness, to provide transparency, to increase wealth; starting now.By backing us you will give the spark to our engine, you will enable us to start working tomorrow for a shared goal. HOW WILL YOU INVEST THE FUNDINGS FROM THIS CAMPAIGN?All the money raised will be invested in our web portal and in sensible communication towards consumers. Both investments are strategically crucial in order to ensure that the most possible people get to know us and eventually support our project. Moreover, backing us will indirectly show support for other young start-up companies; check our perk list to know more. IS YOUR GOAL SUFFICIENT?No.If we consider the whole investment for implementation and development of our online portal and communication plan for the first year the present goal is relatively low, but more than enough for us to consider all of you part of the project. We really believe in the potential of Ethicjobs, and we will be investing our own savings as well into this idea. ARE THERE ANY PERKS?Of course! There are perks of any shape and size, even though everyone knows that the true reward is to be part of something important you care about.YOU SCRATCH OUR BACKS AND WE'LL SCRATCH YOURS.Take a look on your right and find the perk that suits you best! RISKS AND CHALLENGES“If no one ever took risks, Michelangelo would have painted the Sistine floor.”               We’ll be honest. The risk is real.We might fail to make consumers understand that it is only them that can make the difference with their purchases and their choices or else we might fail in tackling the issues between employers and employees. But risks turn into challenges when you have the right instruments to deal with them. Consumers must realize that all of them can become Prosumers if only they are aware of the power that lays in their wallets. Companies must not fear to be judged, but should leverage on the positive impact that a better workplace would provide to its employees. In fact, without any doubt our biggest challenge is to really change something for all of them.If we acknowledge these challenges, and work every day towards a shared goal, we can really make a change. OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELPWe understand that not everyone has the possibility to show their support financially. It isn’t a problem at all; there are many ways which you can give us a huge hand:
Spread the word: talk about us to your friends, family, colleagues and even your bosses. We must be united to make an impact.
Spend consciously: every time you open your wallet ask yourself really who you are financing, if it is the bar where you spend your free time, stores, agencies, anything!
Follow us: obviously!
Facebook Page: @Ethicjobs – www.facebook.com/ethicjobs/

Beta website: www.ethicjobs.com

Indiegogo campaign


 Thank You.

story:
The alcohol recovery industry has, in the past, been completely focused on the alcoholic with the family receiving little to no recovery options except for very short programs and the suggestion of Al-Anon. Linda’s Place will be unique to the industry since its only focus is on the family and friends of the alcoholic. Programs will be directly related to helping the family to take back their lives while providing counseling, resources and education.

As the wife of an end-stage alcoholic for more than 40 years, I provide the benefit of my experience in dealing with situations created by the alcoholic, raising healthy kids in the midst of alcoholism, and the alcoholic himself.

I write The Immortal Alcoholic blog and have discovered that there are many people out there who have walked or are walking my path. Because the response was so heavy, I started three on-line support groups. I've written a workbook for caretakers and The Immortal Alcoholic's Wife which is my journey through alcoholic chaos. I have collaborated with HBO for a documentary (Risky Drinking) to be aired in Jan. 2017.    

This campaign is important to me because I believe the family and friends are the forgotten collateral damage. Alcohol rehab centers have family programs as a means to help the alcoholics achieve and maintain sobriety. They don't consider that the family has their own particular set of needs that they aren't addressing. 

What is Linda's Place?

I envision Linda's Place to be a recovery center that will be the first in what will eventually be a chain of centers across the United States. The center will have an open-door, drop-in policy. This will be a place to go to escape the insanity and regain some peace. Education through workshops and seminars, unconventional programs such as culinary arts, creative writing, career counseling, and social events will also be offered. Professional counselors will be available for one-on-one as well as group counseling. Peer groups with a drop-in, drop-out theme will be on-going throughout the day so that clients can come into the group at a time convenient to them. On-site child care will allow the clients to attend without worrying about what to do with the kids.

In the future Linda’s Place will expand to include loved ones of those who are drug addicted. Some programs will be drug specific rather than alcohol specific while clients may attend any of the workshops and seminars.

A residential program is planned for our future development. We will offer a 3, 4 or 5 day in-house program. There will be no locked-down units. However, for the safety of our clients no one under the influence of alcohol or drugs will be allowed on the property. This program will be in effect when we have secured funding to purchase appropriate facilities.

How will my contribution be used?

This campaign is the first step in making Linda's Place a reality.  The funds generated here will cover attorney fees; cost of possibly becoming a non-profit; marketing and publicity; fundraising events; securing office/meeting space; furniture, equipment and supplies; and, general set-up expenses.

Frightening statistics

With statistics like the ones below, it is clear the time for a recovery center for families is NOW.

1)  A 2008 Center for Disease Control's study shows that excessive drinking costs taxpayers 223.5 BILLION dollars. I’m sure that eight years later the cost to taxpayers has increased substantially.  Although the center will not be designed to stop alcoholics from drinking, it will aide in lowering the cost by providing assistance to families so that they can live a more productive life without assistance from the government.

2)  There are thousands of treatment centers in the United States, but I could find no statistics on how many offer an extensive family program. I also could not find any treatment centers that are exclusive to the families of addicted persons. Recovery is focused on the abuser and not the silent, invisible persons caught in their choas.

3)  It is sad to know that according to a 2012 survey, 10% of all US children live with an alcoholic. Addiction, drug or alcohol, is a disease that can run in families. If we can save even one child from perpetuating the addiction, the center will have proven its value. Linda's Place can provide the parent with tools on how to survive the devastating affects of alcoholism and drug addiction. The need is overwhelming and urgent.

Of course there are risks. I’m sure all the established rehab centers in the area will consider themselves as competition for Linda’s Place. But with proper outreach to those centers, we can find it advantageous to work together rather than at odds.
Money is only one of the things that we desperately need to get Linda’s Place open. Spreading the word and sharing this contribution opportunity with your contacts will go a long way in making this campaign a success. Volunteered services for legal, financial, and public relations advice are very valuable. Materials and supplies, books and videos, are all welcomed and appreciated. Positive comments and suggestions will help keep the momentum and excitement at a high note.

story:
What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Raising $100,000. for set up and start up of AA1 Contract Roasting.  There is a 15Kilo wood fired coffee roaster waiting to be put together in Italy that once ordered is 120 days to the dock in Hilo Hawaii.  The cost is about $48,000. inclusive of chaf collector and bean loader, color choice, packing and shipping.  A finished out 40' HiCube container is about $6000 delivered to site.  Some lab equipment, heavy duty shelving, a set up packing station, Generator and solor setup is about $4000.  Start up operational costs and green bean inventory are in there and the ability to service a route until invoicing of customers shows revenue.  Repayment of equipment cost is an early business priority.
  • We are the only wood fired coffee roaster in Hawaii.  Kiawe wood from a sustainable forest and supporting local collectors.  Hawaiian Coffee Beans and blends of Sumatra, Indonesia and New Guinea to round out the Island theme.  Generally low acid, and a sweeter cup with a medium roast.  We plan to roast three roast levels, light medium and dark roasts and make blends from there.
  • It takes family and friends, it takes a community to rebuild a life. I need help and am asking for your help.  Everything and anything you may be able to help with is so greatly appreciated.  And not just the money! 

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • We can produce fine coffees "off the grid" and with Chain of Craters road location showing Hawaii's unique and special A'ina giving the resource of coffee and kiawe to create our product is like no other available.
  • I have been working B2B sales in beverage and coffee for the last 10 years.  There is demand for contract roasting,  the money maker is route sales and our home office can manage our on-line marketplace and shipping.  Down the road I think a coffee Kiosk serving fourth wave coffees would be pretty cool!
  • I need this and I am asking for help.  This is way more than giving a guy a leg up. This is restoring a life.  Helping me directly and making a good investment.  Friends Family and Associates.  Please read through this and ask me to send you a doc. of my business plan for your review.  My whole hearted thank you.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • It's time.  There needs to be a change in the way things are going.  Excuses of the bad economy, life changes and curveballs, low wage jobs and emotional stress'..............................     Get behind me.  It's time to make this happen!
  • The coffee business is a great way to make a living.  Being passionate about food, wine, travel, coffee's.  See it just fits!  Bottom line there is a market and a financial reward.  I have the sales skill, the production ability, the market sense and the drive to find my niche in the coffee roasting world.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Im asking a lot.  You worked hard for what you have.  Its understandable to be reserved when family or friends ask you for money.   The help I need is not all money either.  Many of you have already started your business and have ideas and suggestions that would be helpful,  Website development, design and set up,  QuickBooks or other, Construction and build out, Sales lead generation and so many more ways to be of support and encouragement.
  • This website, Indigogo, has other ideas if you would brouse around here.

And that's all there is to it.

Other Ways You Can Help Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:  Im asking a lot.  You worked hard for what you have.  Its understandable to be reserved when family or friends ask you for money.   The help I need is not all money either.  Many of you have already started your business and have ideas and suggestions that would be helpful,  Website development, design and set up,  QuickBooks or other, Construction and build out, Sales lead generation and so many more ways to be of support and encouragement. This website, Indigogo, has other ideas if you would brouse around here.   And that's all there is to it.

story:
Cosmic Bikes needs your help creating its home on the northwest side of Chicago. This humble bicycle store has an ambitious vision: to create a place where the the bikes and products we sell are exciting, but never as exciting as what what they do for people; where we don't define what a cyclist should be, but rather open up the possibilities of what she or he could be; a place where retail goes beyond the simple exchange of goods and services for payment, and becomes a hub and heart of community.

In creating this new space, we will pay tribute to our history as cycling advocates while also renewing our present and ever more urgent mission: to carve out a space in our congested neighborhoods and in our hurried and isolated lives to bring together cyclists of all kinds -- new, experienced and would-be, moms & dads, teens, children and grandparents -- to create, share and enjoy community.

Our History

We have a long history of serving the needs of the Chicago's cycling community. In 1994 we opened an alternative urban bicycle store, which is often credited for being the first home to the nascent urban bike culture in Chicago. At the time, the idea came out of frustration that our industry failed to recognize the fantastic potential of bicycles for urban transportation. Bicycle shops treated utilitarian cyclists like second-class customers, and virtually every bike on the market had to be significantly modified to optimize it for street use.

We seized this opportunity and set about creating a store that would invite, not intimidate the beginner, listen, not preach to the curious, and salute, not marginalize the commuter. 

In over two decades we had the privilege of interacting with thousands of customers, who brought us their dreams of independent travel. Each had a vision of doing something extraordinary, something that maybe others thought could not be done. They came to trust us to understand and validate their dreams, and help make them real.

In doing that we tried to live our own dream: to be self-employed, autonomous, doing what we believed in, and rooted in the community. We felt keenly the peaks and valleys of the national economy, eagerly reaping the fruits of the good years, and struggling, worrying and losing sleep through the recent, leaner seasons. Finally, faced with aggressive gentrification of our neighborhood, relentless pressure from online retailers, and continued effects of the depressed economy, we were forced to close our doors for good.

The Plan

The threat of online and other mega-retailers, and their tactics to undermine the local economy, create an urgent need to reevaluate the relationship between the local business and the community in which it is based. We need to re-imagine our brick-and-mortar spaces and reaffirm their importance. Our plans to make  our new family business, Cosmic Bikes, both relevant and sustainable include:

1. A renovation of a vacant storefront to include:
  • A spacious showroom for a carefully assembled selection of items which are difficult to source locally, such as folding bikes, cargo bikes, recumbent bikes and trikes, as well as a sensible selection of transportation-focused products.
  • An open bicycle repair area that encourages communication between technicians and customers.
  • Sufficient number of repair bays to ensure quick turn-around in peak season.
  • A bicycle wash-station.
  • A child-friendly community area for events and classes, and for waiting customers.

2. Community services and events:

  • Pick-up and delivery.
  • Social rides.
  • Classes and workshops including women's classes, teen repair nights, demo rides, and children's how-to-ride and safety rodeos.
  • Social events including movie nights, visiting speakers, kids' story-time and more!
  • Bicycle-focused reading area and bookstore.
  • Display of local art.
  • Seasonal festivities including potlucks and children's crafts.

The Future

H.G. Wells said: “Every time I see an adult on a bicycle I no longer despair for the future of the human race."

Bicycling puts us in touch with our surroundings and with one another. It helps diffuse stress, build empathy, see what is great about our neighborhoods, and what still needs fixing. We know from experience that bicycling changes individual lives, and can alter entire neighborhoods.

Similarly, supporting local merchants humanizes us, reinforces our interdependence, and encourages communication and understanding. We believe that a vibrant local business community can also change lives and alter the character of our neighborhoods for the better.

Building a business from the ground up is difficult. So, we've rolled up our sleeves and gone to work:

  • We've put all available personal resources into play.
  • We've mobilized our family and dedicated friends to help with the build outs.
  • We've called on our industry partners to secure inventory.

Building a business is also expensive. We are in need of $30,000 to complete our vision, and that's where we need your help. By supporting Cosmic Bikes, you show your solidarity with the belief that collectively, we have the capacity to change the nature of our interactions, and better the character of our neighborhoods, and that good and vibrant small businesses are a benefit to all.

    Risks & Challenges

    Independent businesses everywhere are under threat from online retailers and mass merchants. Our society's quest for more goods at the lowest price has broken the vital link between local merchants and their communities. We believe that as social beings, we forsake that link at our own peril. As a business, we are willing to fight to restore that link, and offer experiences and relationships that can't be found online.

    But bicycling season is short. Our showroom, repair shop and inventory must be in place before the crush of spring, and we must be able to make a running start to ensure a successful launch.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Money is necessary, but it's not everything! If you're not in a position to donate dollars at this time, there are other ways to contribute to Cosmic Bikes:
    • Help us spread the word! Tell your friends and family. Do you know any cyclists or active families on the northwest side of Chicago? Tell them too about our fundraising campaign. There are few bike shops in this part of town. Encourage your friends to donate and receive one of our fabulous perks!
    • Help with physical labor! Throughout April, we can use handy friends to help us with painting, cleaning, and general tasks during the renovation.
    • Other skilled help. We can also use help with setting up certain aspects of our website and social media, as well as some photography or videography.
    • If you are interested in volunteering your skills, please shoot us an email at reply@cosmicbikes.com.

story:
First there was a dream. Next came a shared vision. What followed was careful planning and hard work, fueled by passion, optimism and creativity. The result? 

Fish & Bicycle, a bar/café & small grocery slated for a late-summer opening in the charming hamlet of Narrowsburg, situated along the majestic Delaware River in upstate New York.

Our menu of cocktails and small plates will feature the bounty of our farms, fields and forests. Nettles, elderflower, wild mushrooms, field garlic, black walnut and sweetfern are just a few of the native flavors you will discover. Fish & Bicycle's fresh, herbaceous Catskills cuisine places an emphasis on integrity and pleasure. Our goal is to provide you with options, expand your palate and entice you with deliciousness.

We can't wait to throw open the doors to our 1920s industrial building and welcome our extended community into a beautiful, comfortable and sustainably designed gathering place. You'll be able to enjoy craft cocktails, beer, cider and coffee, and have a casual bite or a feast! We'll also host workshops led by local artisans and experts on topics including permaculture, foraging, beekeeping and preserving.


But first, we need your help to complete our funding! We're about to go into construction on a totally raw space. In addition to the entire infrastructure, we are building out a full kitchen and our ideal horseshoe bar. It's a major undertaking, but we have solid plans, the right permits and the stamina to see it through. We know we can do it with a little help from our friends.

The Founders

We are Laura Silverman (left) and Juliette Hermant (right), transplants from New York City and Paris, respectively, who have put down roots in the Catskills. We are dedicated to helping revitalize our local economy by creating a business rooted in the bounty of our region, and we're excited to celebrate the stunning natural beauty with visitors and residents alike. (Read more about Juliette here; read more about Laura here and here.)


Your Contributions

Your contributions to our campaign will go directly to this endeavor, joining our life savings, sweat equity, secured bank loans and regional grants to fund the construction and 2016 launch of Fish & Bicycle. We plan to repay your generosity not only through the perks we offer—A cocktail named for you! Dinner for two! A foraging walk!—but by developing an inspiring and enriching destination to enhance our community and where you will be welcome for years to come.

Be an Angel

There is also an opportunity to contribute whatever amount you would like without taking any perk. The sky's the limit! Think of yourself as an angel investor with no strings attached, the kind of generous soul who sees a project worthy of support and has the wherewithal to make a difference. We will think of you whenever we raise a glass and remain grateful until the end of time.


Words cannot express our gratitude to each and every one who helps make our vision a reality. We believe in Fish & Bicycle's potential to make a significant impact on the quality of life and economic wellbeing in our area and we deeply appreciate your vote of confidence. 


Spread the Word

We ask you to please share our campaign with your extended communities, both online and off. Use the tools on this site to promote our campaign on social media, talk it up to your friends and acquaintances or simply email a link to any kindred spirit who might be willing and able to support Fish & Bicycle, including:

  • Nature lovers & fans of the Catskills
  • Food & cocktail enthusiasts
  • Foragers, naturalists & botanists
  • Good-hearted samaritans & philanthropists
  • Hedge-funders, trust-funders & international royalty

Food photos by Steven Randazzo & Bette Blau (@whatbettefound). 
Video by George Billard.

story:
About Us

We are the only coffee company in America devoted to offering all four remaining major coffee species under one roof: Arabica, Robusta, Liberica and Excelsa. We specialize in the rare and extraordinary, like our Nicaragua Catimor variety, Laos Bourbon, and Sparrow Arabica, a single origin coffee unique to Vietnam. Our top-selling coffee is produced in Dota Tarrazu, a region that used to be one of the most prolific in Costa Rica but is today suffering from a number of setbacks. We buy all of our coffee through 100% Direct Trade with the farmer, eliminating brokers, co-ops and the commodities market.

Project Overview

We are once again expanding the land available for our farmer to continue his work (it will be our third expansion). This is a project with impact investing potential for many areas:

  • Re-introduction of a once-great heirloom species of Specialty Coffee
  • Reducing poverty and improving living conditions in a disadvantaged area with a great coffee-growing heritage
  • Establishment of a wildlife refuge for study and enjoyment of natural beauty

Not only can we improve the local community by supporting the re-cultivation of a wonderful coffee, but we can also "export" these plantings, knowledge, and techniques to other locations in Central American, having a lasting impact on thousands of lives. We can also protect a key location on the migratory path of endangered species and provide habitat for hundreds of indigenous plant species.

What We Need & What You Get

The first phase of this project is to improve access to the new land and begin the plantings on about 10-15 acres of this 45-acre property. The farmer has 15,000 seedlings in his nursery that need to be put in the ground this season. Getting the farm to a producing stage with 2-3 seasons will be key to making it self-sustaining with revenue.

  • Currently the land needs path and road improvements to be able to move materials around and terrace the farm acreage. We need small all-terrain vehicles to traverse the difficult wet areas during the rainy season. This is the initial goal of this project... to have it cultivated and planted this season.
  • The Villalobos heirloom coffee is already in (limited) production on previous acreage; we can offer immediate rewards to supporters who love premium specialty coffee, as well as deferred rewards to any supporters who would like to follow this project through to its later stages of development
  • This project exceeds our ability to fund alone, which is why we have come to Indiegogo. But whatever funds we raise, whether they reach this goal or not, will be added to our own support to make good things happen in developing the farm and wildlife refuge.

To thank you for your support, we have a number of Perks to interest coffee lovers, coffee shops and tradespeople, supporters interested in the wildlife preservation program, people who would mostly like to visit the area and be a part of the activities there, or supporters who simply would like to follow the project as it develops. Some rewards are immediate, and some earn Points that can be redeemed for visits to the farm and attendance in programs. Points can be added to at a later time for larger stays or programs at the farm.

An Out-Sized Impact

La Roya is a coffee leaf rust disease causing widespread crop loss and poverty in Central America. Our farmer in Costa Rica uses a comprehensive set of ecologically sound practices that make his varieties resistant to the leaf rust. And in the last three years he has embarked on a project to bring back the heirloom subspecies of Arabica called Villalobos, a coffee with a superb, chocolatey taste profile and excellence resistance to the leaf rust at high altitudes.

With our assistance and support over the last 5 years, our farmer has expanded his farmland and enhanced his processing technique to become a model farm - possibly the first zero-carbon farm in the region. Operating in a decentralized manner frees him from dependence on local co-ops and brokers who currently operate in a way that keep the region’s farmers in perpetual debt and poverty.

By purchasing our farmer’s crops at Direct Trade prices far above what other sources offer, we enable him to expand his work and provide employment at higher wages to dozens of residents in this small county. Our financial support helps children realize the dream of higher education, and can help establish medical and other community services where there are none. And linking coffee production with wildlife preservation is a practice that has been very successful in South America and can provide a wonderful model moving forward for this region.

Decentralizing Coffee Production and Sale

Few coffee consumers realize that by engaging in Direct Trade with small farmers, it's possible for the purchase of one bag of coffee to have a significant impact in the world. Coffee as a commodity ranks second only to oil. Where we fill up our gas tank has little impact on people's lives or the environment, but where we buy our coffee does.

Regional coffee co-ops and brokers no longer serve a helpful function to small farmers; in fact, the relationship is best described as predatory. Portable coffee mills and better processing techniques help farmers free themselves from these predators by enabling them to process their coffee locally, instead of hauling it, at high cost, to expensive remote mills. In our video below, you can see our farmer using his simple and inexpensive portable milling machine. It is mounted on a trailer that allows it to be toted from farm to farm, sharing the benefit of the machine with neighboring farmers and increasing its impact on the entire region:

  • Farmers who rely on regional co-ops and distant mills make less than 5% as much profit on their crops. And "fair trade" only guarantees a small differential over what these sources offer. Direct Trade lets the farmer set his own price and receive 10-20X more profit, enabling them to invest in their farms and provide better education and health care for their children and workers, and helping to keep farming communities whole
  • Having the ability to mill on their own land cuts costs considerably, and raises the quality of the coffee. Pride in producing Specialty Coffee quality is a wonderful motivator and reward.

Future Developments

As the new farm becomes self-sufficient, we will erect buildings to support the farmer's educational programs, community resources, and wildlife studies and projects. Supporters can be rewarded with guest lodging in this beautiful mountain region for attendance in programs or just for the fun of visiting the coffee farm and wildlife refuge. Currently the farmer is operating several of these programs, such as his "Seed to Green" course in which attendees participate in all stages of coffee farming, but he needs more facilities to be able to offer and host more activities. The future is brighter for Dota, Tarrazu!

story:
Downtown Yoga was formed in Hartford, CT in 2011 with a mission: to make yoga affordable and accessible to everyone. 

The centerpiece of Downtown Yoga's commitment to the community is the Yoga in the City program, which offers 200+ free yoga classes all year long in parks, rec centers and libraries across the City of Hartford. Thanks to the commitment and support of Downtown Yoga's members and partners like the City of Hartford, ConnectiCare, UConn Health and Athleta, Yoga in the City gives everyone the chance to enjoy the many physical and mental health benefits of practicing yoga.

Due to budget cuts, City funding for this annual program has been eliminated. While our popular series of outdoor parks classes has only just begun, the year-round Yoga in the City program is in jeopardy. Additional funding is needed to continue to pay our teachers a fair wage, support the studio and administrative costs to run the program and help spread the word to build awareness about free yoga classes across Hartford.

Here's where you come in.

Now in its 4th year, we want to grow the Yoga in the City program—not cut it back. Last year we worked with UConn Health to conduct an independent performance evaluation of our program, and we're working to implement many of those changes to make our free classes more responsive to the community's needs. For the first time ever, we're offering a bilingual community class at Pope Park, taught in both English and Spanish, to serve Hartford's Latino population. With your help, we can continue and improve this program and make a happier, healthier Hartford.

Please support the Yoga in the City program to keep yoga accessible to everyone and save an important community asset.

story:
Introduction

We are a team of two who love coffee. Hardy Helburn and Sarvesh Makthal Founded Bright Light Coffee in New York City so more people try the freshest, best tasting coffee around. We've been roasting on a small scale for years, and in the past 6 months began distributing samples to friends and family. We have gotten a tremendous response. This campaign will take us to the next level by either securing us a spot with a local roasting co-op or setting up our our roastery in Westchester County, New York. Extensive experience in consumer products, engineering and business development is helping us put together the right ingredients to make some wonderful tasting coffee!

What is good coffee?

The answer, surprisingly, depends on whom you ask. Some people swear by their cans of ground coffee while others must have their daily fix of low-fat-skinny-vanilla-frap before doing anything in the day. We are creatures of habit and most of us like to maintain a routine that we have kept for years. If it isn't broken, why fix it? 

But the coffee you have been drinking is burnt, and you probably didn't realize it. You're not alone. Coffee companies and consumers alike have been driving this trend. You may love your "dark roast," or you may want to try something different and not even know it.

For years coffee companies have been getting bigger and striven to offer beans of uniform flavor and quality across the market. Coffee is an organic product and it doesn't all taste the same. Some beans are fruity, some nutty, some taste sweet and some just boring. Many coffee companies offer a uniform product by over-roasting.

Dark Coffee might make sense when you're adding cream, sugar or hazelnut syrup but that may not really be necessary. It turns out coffee beans have a great natural sweetness, a delicious richness, and a nuttiness that many haven't discovered yet.

We were in a similar boat before we discovered 3rd wave coffee, the style that has risen in the past decade highlighting the natural and often subtle qualities of a coffee bean. As we explored this wonderful new world of coffee, we realized that it was also too complicated to enjoy consistently. 

Our way is simple: We source our beans from growers who share our passion for quality. Our beans are roasted just enough to bring out the sweetest, most delicious flavors. To achieve consistency, we work extra hard to pick beans that everyone will love - sweet, clean tasting beans that will taste like COFFEE every time.  We ship our coffee the second it's cool so it will always be the freshest cup around. 

What We Need & What You Get

We’ve fine-tuned the signature Bright Light coffee style and identified great beans. We need funding in order to build out our own or access an existing roastery.

If we meet our funding goal, we will join a local commercial roasting co-op and use their equipment to roast top-quality beans.

If we exceed our goal, we will consider investing in our own roasting equipment and building our own roaster.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • We would love your support in sharing our campaign with your family and friends. Please share this page using your favorite social media!

  • Give these perks as gifts!
